story:
CLOOUDIE - wireless storage keychain

You certainly have gone through situations when your mobile phone is running out of storage and you really, like seriously, need it. Do you need to take some important photo? Do you need to take some interesting video? Are you on vacation and seeing something amazing? Is there a one-of-a-kind moment to be captured? With CLOOUDIE, you will never have to worry about your phone storage again! We've got your back.

 

How does it work?

CLOOUDIE is primarily a wireless storage hidden inside a keychain.

What makes it special is that it is really simple to use, and it allows the user to have a powerful external storage with him all the time. In fact, it is a kind of "cloud" right in your keychain without the need for Internet access.

Move your photos quickly, wirelessly and safely to free up your memory. How cool is that?

 

Videos

How to send photos to the CLOOUDIE? Easy!

 

How to get data from the CLOOUDIE? Easy too!

 

Keep it simple

When needed, you can transfer photos from the device by pressing one button, and voilà. That's it. It's that simple.

 

When design matter

We designed CLOOUDIE for all of you who use the handheld devices; thus, we designed it for everyone. However, technology addicts will appreciate it a little bit more. No matter how old you are, if you are studying or working in a high position, CLOOUDIE is really cute but elegant and looks amazing when you pull it out of your pocket.

 

Always with you

CLOOUDIE unites the modern lifestyle of those who like to share their lives with others. It does not matter where you are; CLOOUDIE works offline, so you don't need to be connected to the internet to transfer your photos.

 

Advantages of CLOOUDIE

CLOOUDIE provides WiFi by itself, so you just need press wake up button, connect, and transfer. After the transfer, CLOOUDIE will automatically go into sleep mode and wait for the next time you need it. Even if you need to charge CLOOUDIE itself with the standard MicroUSB cable and recommended 2.1A charger, it only takes about 30 minutes to charge fully. Also, a colorful LED light is included, which also works as an indicator of the battery status.

MicroSD cards are replaceable, so you can plug in any card with different storage sizes!

 

What is .HEIC?

HEIC is the file format name Apple has chosen for the new HEIF standard. HEIF stands for High Efficiency Image Format, and, as the name suggests, is a more streamlined way to store image files. Using advanced modern compression methods, it allows digital photographs to be created in smaller file sizes, all while retaining higher image quality than its JPEG alternative. For more info about .heic, read this article: http://www.macworld.co.uk/feature/iphone/what-i...

However, what's important is that CLOOUDIE is supporting it!

 

Manufacturing

We have signed a memorandum of understanding with our manufacturing partner and have outlined the work ahead of us. We've agreed to a schedule and are confident in our ability to deliver on time.

They are experts in producing high-quality products for multiple industries.
Our manufacturing partner is on standby, ready to produce CLOOUDIE and help distribute it worldwide.

 

Prototypes

The prototyping happened in Chaihuo X. Factory (Shenzhen, China), Hacker Dojo (Silicon Valley, USA), Tokyo HackerSpace (Tokyo, Japan), and Oasis office (Sliema, Malta).

Big thanks to everyone for their support :)


What's inside?

- WiFi module

- 300 mAh battery

- electronic monitor

- slot for Micro SD cards

- Micro USB port for charging

 

Charging

If you need to charge CLOOUDIE itself with the standard MicroUSB cable and recommended 2.1A charger, it takes only about 30min to charge fully. Also, a colorful LED light is included, which also works as an indicator of the battery status.

 

SDXC MicroSD support

SDXC MicroSD UHS-I specification defines two bus architecture options for up to 50MB/s (UHS-50) and 104MB/s (UHS-104) data transfer rates. These are theoretical maximum limits and actual maximum performance for a specific card is defined on its label or in advertising.

And CLOOUDIE is supporting it!

 

More information

Just plug & play. It works like magic. Seriously!

 

Rewards

All CLOOUDIE keychains ship without Micro SD cards.
If you have your own card, you can use it, if no, you can add some to your order.
(Adapter included)

 

Shipping time and price

Early-bird backers will receive their CLOOUDIE within 30 days after the Indiegogo campaign ends. Others will get theirs within 60 days. We are ready for production so that we can ship more quickly than 90% of all Indiegogo campaigns, and shipping is FREE!

 

Our Team


Pavol Bujna - Founder/Hardware design
Takashi Kudo - Director/iOS engineer
Ysuke Kon - CTO
Chihiro Hashimoto - Embedded system engineer
Yuichi Hirano - iOS engineer
Koichi Tanaka - Supporter , iOS engineer

 

Our history

We have already built and successfully delivered our last project to customers—the CHAARGO wireless charging wallet. If you are interested in this project, see http://chaargo.com

 

Why we need your support

We are almost on the finish line of our startup race. Our team was working so hard and was even personally in China, so we managed to contract all essential partners and finally prototyped a stable version. We need your support in the form of buying the CLOOUDIE itself. We are not asking for money in return for useless t-shirts or mugs. We are ready to deliver a fully functional product. We decided to launch this campaign mainly for the following reasons:

To certify the products (CE) and ensure safe operation

To procure materials and components to meet our timeline

To update the packaging to make sure the products arrive safely


Warranty

CLOOUDIE will have a standard two-year limited warranty.

 

Powered by

story:
AmbiVision Moto is a new approach to entertainment and notifications that creates an astonishing viewing atmosphere. This technology enlarges the screen by projecting a glow of light from all four sides of the back of the screen onto the surrounding surface.

Most smartphones today offer light notifications, so when you get a new message or an incoming call, a colorful LED will start blinking. However, LED notifications can be too subtle to notice. Look how we solved that problem!


Compare the difference - This shows how AmbiVision can extend your screen.

 

During dark to bright scene changes, the pupil of the eye reacts by decreasing its diameter twice within 5 seconds. When the scene changes from bright to dark, your pupil needs to increase its diameter for up to 180 seconds for clearer vision in the dark. In every movie, scenes switch from dark to bright hundreds of times, creating constant tension in your eye muscles which can lead to vision impairment.

Minimum luminosity level decreases the contrast between wall and screen content to let your eyes relax.


With AmbiVision Moto, the muscles of your eyes are less strained, so your eyes don't get tired while spending long periods of time in front of the screen.

 

Whether you prefer rock, classic, or jazz, with AmbiVision Moto, your music sounds better. Liven up your parties by making the beats match the visual effects.

 

That’s not all. AmbiVision Moto doubles the working time of your Smartphone. Inside the Mod, we include LiPo battery, an advanced, fast-charging and managing battery IC from Texas Instruments, and a dual mode (Qi 1.2 or AirFuel) wireless power receiver/transmitter from STMicroelectronics.

It can be used as a wireless power bank or it can be charging wirelessly (and your Smartphone if connected) .   AmbiVision Moto takes care of your Smartphone using a smart charging algorithm. Power flows between the phone battery and AmbiVision’s battery to keep it working as long as possible.


AmbiVision Moto is designed to be an extension of your phone, rather than being a separate, bulky, and unattractive device.  We offer three colors to match your phone: Black, White, and Gold. The final design can changed if the change is requested by Motorola.

We used the newest 48 digital LEDs (APA102-2020 for you super techy types) on the AmbiVision Moto. It provides lightning fast data speed with excellent colors.

 

An intuitive and powerful app allows you to manage the lights. You can turn on a specific mode manually (screen capturing, mood lamp, or music visualization) or connect a specific mode with a current working app. That means if you play a game, watch the news, or play a video, the screen capture mode is automatically activated. If you listen to music from the radio, the sound visualization mode can be activated.

Thanks to our advanced software, we can capture the screen while achieving about 25-45 FPS with under 3% processor usage.

With AmbiVision Moto, you can also take your notifications to a whole new level. Instead of (or in addition to) buzzing or chimed alerts, the bright LED system indicates all notifications with a wide range of colors and patterns, making your Smartphone truly unique.

Any types of notifications can be completely customized.

We also included infrared transmitter to use your smartphone as a remote control for most of consumer devices.

 

We created the device in response to the “Transform the Smartphone Challenge” by Motorola. To be able to ship our product to customers, we decided to get straight to the final mod design.



3D printing allows us to check the mechanical design before tooling. The hardware contains the latest technology – a very low power microcontroller, advanced LEDs, and innovative power management units.



Key components.

 

Currently the device is production-ready. We have selected electronics components and finished the firmware. Thanks to the DFU mode, when we provide a new feature, you will need to allow firmware updating. Thanks to our previous projects, we have a trusted and fast manufacturer selected. They are capable of making about 1000 devices within 2 weeks (awesome, right?). Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates on this page or our social media.



Our team has already created AmbiVision and AmbiVision PRO, which raised about $200.000 in total, and was delivered almost on time. We are a young, energetic, and-fast growing team of experienced R&D engineers. We would love to deliver another product that reaches people all over the world.


 

 

Robert Jaszczyk.  He created the idea of screen backlighting in 2009. The first prototype was shown during the first year of studies in Wroclaw University of Technology. Now it is time for crowd-founding to show the next release of AmbiVision to customers around the world. He is responsible for hardware and firmware design. He always tries to keep everything profoundly simple.

Robert Mielnik is the software engineer who likes to invent and test new things. He is an experienced developer of mobile, games, and other desktop applications.

Izabela Tereszkiewicz is the designer and manufacturing expert. A graduate University of Economy, she controls all the manufacturing processes from the start to the end of the product. She covers all financial topics as well as the enclosure design.

 

Jaclym Zhang. She is responsible for the whole production process in China. We have worked with her for 8 years without any failures in several different projects. She also creates   amazing enclosures projects and covers the whole enclosure manufacturing process
   
   

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments, or suggestions!

Email support, press etc. at  support@ambivision.tv
Press resources:  Media
AmbiVision official website:  ambivision.tv

 

Q: Where do you ship?
A: Everywhere. We offer free priority shipping for all backers regardless of the destination.  We include a 2-year warranty card.

Q: Which phones are the devices compatible with?
A: We are taking part in Motorola’s “Transform the Smartphone Challenge” and have already made it through the first phase of the competition. Therefore, now Ambivision Moto is designed for smartphones which support the Moto Mods™​: Moto Z, Z Force, Z Play, Droid, etc. If you need AmbiVision Moto for a different device, consider a $10 donation for our development team to show your interest.

Q: How Does Ambivision Moto affect Smartphone power consumption?
A: It depends. You can select the low-consumption profile or the high-consumption profile. In the low-consumption profile, the lights are on only at dark, only for selected notifications, and screen capturing works only with some multimedia-oriented apps (i.e. YouTube, Gallery, etc). In this mode, the AmbiVision's battery charges the phone’s battery more frequently. The higher consumption profile increase brightness and is always working when the phone is in use. To recap: the AmbiVision Moto can extend working time or decrease it based on your settings.


Q: Does the screen capturing work with all apps and games?
A: It sure does! Thanks to some software tricks, we got an access even for locked content.

Q: Does AmbiVision Moto have to be charged only by wireless?
A: No, if you charge your Phone using a USB cable, it also charges AmbiVision Moto’s battery.

Q: Is there an open API to control the light however I want to?
A: Yes, it will be provided.


Q: Does it support Philips HUE?
A: Yes, the app provides support for Philips Hue in the fast mode (Entertainment mode), so you can easily move action on your Smartphone screen to a whole room!

story:
We had a working prototype in the first 4 months of hard work, however the design was only would operate with IOS and some select Android devices. Android phones and tablets posed wide dynamic range in terms of the juice one could extract from Audio. However, we wanted to make something universal to allow most coverage with most phones and tablets; be it Android or IOS. After 7 months of tens of different microelectronic technology trials we had reached a unique design that we could claim the most coverage with in the whole world. It can literally light up the special laser LED with even trickles of energy from the standard audio port of a phone or tablet. A short journey of MiPointer is pictured below...

 

MiPointer is a smart laser pointer for presenting professionals, academicians, students, cat lovers and for all at large who may like to keep a smart laser pointer with them conveniently all the time in their keychain. It is smart because it does not use battery and allows your phone to be your presenting device.

 

      A slick high-end aluminum body handcrafted in local craft shops in Europe...

In addition to laser activation utilizing audio port, it also uses Bluetooth or WiFi connection to control the presentation remotely just like in a regular high-end pointer. The free software and user interfaces are being designed for both Android and IOS devices with connections to both PC and MAC machines. 

 

                                         We target production in multiple colors...

It is not only what is inside that makes MiPointer cool. Elegant Aluminum body with a catchy keychain hook and special metallic color plating makes it quite slick and fashionable. Every curve and texture in the body involves touches from engineers with artistic skills. One can pick it conveniently from the keychain on the spot and start presenting…

 

Elegant fully-metal body attaches to a keychain conveniently, one can always be ready to present.. Just plug it into your audio jack and move the slides back and forth...

Risks & Challenges

We have quite number of risks associated in converting this prototype device into a product but none are that vital at this stage of the game. Just to mention couple, the yield loss due to nonuniform handcrafting action and high production cost for the same reason are the top ones in the list. While assembling the LED and microelectronics into this metallic body, the laser head or the legs tend to break away leaving the device dead during installation. Since it is not machine assembly, the production yield levels as well as cost may end up significantly lower. Being hand-assembled in Europe, cost factor is also high with comparable products from Asia not only due to the country of origin but also due to hand machining of the metal pieces in the body. We will be focusing on the both items to relieve the mentioned risks without sacrificing its privileged elegance and slick metallic sensation.

story:
Introducing the Snappy Mag ANCHOR!

The Snappy Mag ANCHOR gives you the coolest, most stylish way to hold your phone!

After our experience with magnetic phone cords, we've decided to take it up and notch and introduce a clever magnetic phone holder.

Made from solid metal, with hidden, embedded neodymium magnets.

Forget about ugly, bulky phone holders of the past. The ANCHOR is a cool piece of solid metal that has a hidden trick up its sleeve.

Because of its unique shape, it can hold tablets and phones at different angles. Perfect for you if you are the most clever, most stylish one in your group!

Four hidden magnets work like magic.

A solid metal accent piece with a surprise

Quickly snap onto your keychain!

It weighs only 26g (less than an ounce!)

Please pledge today and help us bring the Snappy Mag ANCHOR to life, pledge now!
story_txt:
Introducing the Snappy Mag ANCHOR!
The Snappy Mag ANCHOR gives you the coolest, most stylish way to hold your phone!

After our experience with magnetic phone cords, we've decided to take it up and notch and introduce a clever magnetic phone holder.

Made from solid metal, with hidden, embedded neodymium magnets.

Forget about ugly, bulky phone holders of the past. The ANCHOR is a cool piece of solid metal that has a hidden trick up its sleeve.

Because of its unique shape, it can hold tablets and phones at different angles. Perfect for you if you are the most clever, most stylish one in your group!

Four hidden magnets work like magic.

A solid metal accent piece with a surprise

Quickly snap onto your keychain!

It weighs only 26g (less than an ounce!)

Please pledge today and help us bring the Snappy Mag ANCHOR to life, pledge now!

story:
Our Story

SteadyStraps® started as a burst of God-given inspiration after dropping my phone way too many times.  I thought to myself: “There has to be a better way of holding my phone!”

As it turns out, there was. I decided I could just wrap an elastic strap around the case and attach it with some hook and loop closures on the inside. 

So, I went to a local fabric store, purchased some material, and cut it to the lengths I thought would work. My wife helped me stitch it together and I put it on my phone.  And wouldn't you know, it worked! I couldn’t believe how much easier it made both holding and using my phone. It was comfortable and I could touch the full screen with my thumb while using just one hand. I also haven’t dropped my phone since I have been using the strap. 

Our daughter, who was in college in Brooklyn and riding the subway all the time, found the strap enabled her to hold her phone much more securely and use it more comfortably. Other people started asking about it and where they could get one. So, she encouraged me to start it as a business. SteadyStraps® was born, and, as they say, the rest is history.

Everything is USA sourced and made and we worked hard to get the product just right. We custom source the elastic material, which is super thin, strong, comfortable, and non-allergenic, and we use Velcro® Brand hook and loop fasteners for secure closure. We use dye sublimation printing for colorfast designs so the straps are durable and washable. 

Since SteadyStraps® is especially effective for one-on-one, local marketing, we initially launched the product in the B2B market helping companies to better promote their brand and advertise their products and services at the grassroots level. SteadyStraps® is a versatile accessory and makes a great promotional product in the business and professional world.

We then moved into the consumer market, and now have an e-commerce store at www.steadystraps.com with more than 50 fun designs people can collect and easily change depending on their preference or activity. SteadyStraps® really shines in these casual, everyday settings.

SteadyStraps® is Unique!

There are lots of ways to hold your smartphone and even more products on the market to help you do it. All of them try to help you hold and operate your phone better. However, SteadyStraps® is different. We’re not a “me too," but a “me better.”

We’re different! Check us out. Here is what you will find:

No Adhesives – It’s the only hand grip mobile accessory that does not rely on adhesives for attachment (great for people who don’t like to glue items to their phone or have their accessory always in one position). SteadyStraps® securely attaches to the phone’s case with high quality, low-profile Velcro® brand fasteners.

100% Wireless Charging Ready - Without removing or adjusting it first; very convenient and reliable, the way wireless charging should be. 

Pocket-Friendly and Streamlined - Low profile design, less than 1 mm, holds snuggly to the back of your case, so it’s there when you need it and out-of-the-way when you don’t.

Adjustable – Quick and easy to adjust anytime to desired tension or move to a new holding angle.

Comfortable for Long-Term Use – Comfort is critical to enjoying long term reading, watching videos, shopping, etc., and SteadyStraps® provides maximum comfort with its ergonomic design, comfortable elastic, and many holding positions.

Works With One Finger or Your Whole Hand –  Active lifestyles require different ways to hold and use your phone and our flexible elastic allows you to easily and seamlessly switch from one position to another using any combination of fingers or your whole hand, so you don’t have to hold your phone the same way every time.

Almost Hands-Free Eases Hand Fatigue – Soft, custom-made, high-quality Spandex elastic is flexible, yet strong, and helps to hold the phone to your hand, so you don’t have to grip your phone as tightly or sometimes, even at all (virtually eliminates face-drops).

Full Screen Thumb-Touch With One-Handed Use – Your thumb can now easily reach all four corners of your screen enabling improved control, speed of use, and comfort with a steady grip.

SteadyStraps® can also be used in other helpful and creative ways. It works with car and bike mounts, and can fasten around other objects or be hung on hooks for temporary holding or viewing purposes. There are so many ways to use SteadyStraps® and people tell us all the time the different ways they find to use it. As an example, for on the go, some people flip the phone around to the back of the hand and use it while biking, kayaking, and everything in between  - see below. 

Write us at sales@steadystraps.com and tell us - How are you using your SteadyStraps® today?

 

Note: SteadyStraps® are not for sale, resale, distribution, or use in and/or importation to Canada.

story:
What is NEX1 magnetic cable?

Nexide NEX1 is a new generation of magnet cables that you need for all your devices. Our improved magnet cable supports all electronic devices with 8 pin, Micro-USB, USB-C charging port. In fact, you don't need any other charging cables anymore. NEX1 charge and transfer data with 3A technology which means you can charge and transfer data faster than before.  

How to use:

1- Plug the pin which is suitable to your device.
2- Connect the cable to the pin.
3- Sit and enjoy your tea.

 

High Density Braided Cable Exquisite Workmanship:

Cable is made of high quality nylon, which has the stronger toughness and high density braided craftsmanship, making the cable more durable. 

Aluminum Metal Shell:

Aluminum metal shell, smooth hand feeling, you deserve to have, smooth in surface, quality and beauty in one.

 

Anaerobic High Purity Copper Core Faster Charging:

High purity copper core, better conductivity and 22AWG wire specification, with 3A output three times faster than other cables to ensure quickly charging speed and 480MBPS data transmission.

 

Smart Chip:

When your device is fully charged, chip automatically stop charging and when cable is disconnected, chip will be powered off automatically for maximum safety protection and rejecting short circuit happening.

 

Innovative Upgrade Interface Better Charging Experience:

The bottom of the connector were reinforced to protect the magnetic ring from breaking, the iron piece connected with the TPE head, which is more firm and without fell of.

Special Flame Retardant Wire To Prevent Fire Hazards:

Made of flame retardant material, can not be ignited, prevent potential fire from improper charging. Effectively prevent file source, more safe when charging.

 

Fashion Design, More Stable Charging:

NEXIDE NEX1 magnetic cable have a nice design, the connector and interface embedded connection are more stable and prolonged use.

 

Protect Your Device From Dusts:

Protect from liquid, sand, dust, grime, pocket lint and more without a bulky case. It's never been easier to quickly and effectively protect the ports of your favorite smart device.

 

LED Indicator Light:

When power on, LED lights up. Gentle light design, easier to get charging and find cable at night.

 

Widely Use Suitable For All Places:

You can have one cable at hand, no matter you are in car, at school, at home, at office or on the trip.

 

Nylon Cable Organizer:

Each cable also supplied with Velcro tape, keep your space tidy from messy wires.

 

Automatic Adsorption Single Hand Operation:

Double-sided automatic adsorption, single hand can let magnetic cable and connector auto connect when you are driving or daily use.

 

 

Colors:

Why to choose NEX1 cable:

Project Timeline

 

Dimensions:

 

Nexide NEX1 got top ratings from top tech news websites 

 

Risks & Challenges

In the world of technology everyone from a child to a boss are using smart devices (Smart phones, Tablets, Smart watches, Laptops and Gaming console, Digital cameras and etc.), and all of us are worry about low battery message on our devices.
Many of us have more than one device and need one cable for their all devices, you can use this cable for charging your smart phone to digital cameras and laptop.
We "Nexide B.V." company had research at our headquarter in Amsterdam to improve current cables to the next level and after 3 month our R&D team succeed in this research and NEX1 PRO begins the journey.
Don't worry about the new virus,  our research completed the project in January and we stopped the production till end of June, and you'll receive the cable directly from the factory to reduce to minimum risk.

story:
Why you want ViCase

Powerful Mini Computer

Imagine a Mini Computer Case that can take powerful standard Desktop Parts, yet remains small and quiet. That is ViCase. It marries the best of both worlds: The small size, good looks and low noise of the Mini PC with the high performance and upgradeability of the Desktop PC.

Beautiful Mini Computer

Our design challenge was to make ViCase small and beautiful, despite housing full desktop components.

All-In-One Conversion

Imagine you can take ViCase and any Display and convert it to the good looks of the All-In-One. This is exactly what ViCase All-In-One Conversion does and but one example how ViCase-Extras take your ViCase Mini PC beyond its competition and your expectations.

Expand & Upgrade easily

Because ViCase uses standard Desktop parts, you can expand and upgrade ViCase just like any other Desktop PC. E.g. it supports up to 7 Displays, all 4k. But you also can upgrade CPU, Memory, GPU, Disks, etc ... whenever it is needed or convenient. Improve your PC's longevity, as you can swap just the one limiting part to bring your PC up to par versus buying a complete new Mini or All-In-One PC. This is very friendly to our planet and your wallet.

Search Picture: Where is ViCase?

ViCase makes it easy for you to make it disappear. E.g. for HTPC you can mount it behind the Display or place it in the shelf. Now you can fit it in any place you wish: Game PC in the living room, Work PC in the bedroom, Cooking PC in the kitchen. Made possible by its diminutive size or the ViCase Extras for All-In-One Conversion. In the above example the Modular BluRay drive and ViCase-Remote makes your ViCase PC fully accessible, even when hidden out of sight.

Easy DIY Custom Mini PC for everyone

ViCase is for everyone: Even the Non-DIY person may enjoy putting together a ViCase Custom PC. It's configurator is so easy that you can check out your PC after two Mouse clicks. The expert can dig in and customize every detail. Now you can have it all: Same simplicity of buying Custom Build ViCase PC versus buying an off the shelf PC and yet you can dive in to the full customization power of a Custom PC. The check out procedure is very clear about which parts you buy with us and which parts you buy with your favorite PC shop. For more details, please scroll down to the chapters: "How it works" and "How to buy ViCase".

Elegant

Simply beautiful!

Quiet

We went to great lengths to give you a choice to build a ViCase Custom PC so quiet, that a Mosquito at 1m (3 feet) distance is louder! (Snapshot from the upcoming Movie)

Connectivity

Since you put a full Desktop into ViCase you are blessed with the full connectivity power that comes with your ITX Mother Board. Your exact connectors depend on what motherboard and what PCIe Add-In-Card you insert. You actually get more than with a regular Desktop PC: Kensington Lock, WiFi Antenna mounting holes and ViCase-Access Port.

ViCase Extras make the difference

Above you can see 4 key Extras of ViCase. Top left to bottom right: (1) ViCase-Stand is the luxury version of the All-In-One Converter. It joins Display + Keyboard + ViCase into one unit with a grip to carry. (2) ViCase-Access-Plus gives you access to USB ports, Status LEDs and Power On / Off to your ViCase in All-In-One configuration (3) ViCase-Cooler gives you more CPU cooling power at less noise than the boxed cooler (4) ViDock gives you 3 size options if you want to connect a Full Profile PCIe Add-In Card to your Mini PC. Full support of PCIe Expansion sets ViCase apart from other Mini PC solutions. — All cases are made of Aluminum, sandblasted and anodized for a consistent high end appearance.

Easy Assembly

Assembling a ViCase custom PC is child's play, because we designed ViCase giving you full access from all sides during assembly and testing. (Snapshot from the Movie)

Quality

ViCase is designed and built to last decades: The case is CNC carved from solid Aluminum, then sandblasted and anodized. All threads are CNC carved from solid brass. Never again suffer loose screws. Disks are protected with vibration absorbing rubber grommets (red). Even the rubber feet are screwed instead of glued and are made of Silicone, so they do not leave marks or glue to your furniture. Replace over time your aging Desktop components, but keep the timeless ViCase.

PCIe Expansion

Add a PCIe Add In Card to your Custom Build PC and your application can be 1000% faster. The most common examples are GPU / Graphics Cards. ViCase supports Low Profile Cards directly and Full Profile cards via PCIe Expansion Enclosure ViDock. (1)(2) Workstation GPUs or High end Gaming GPUs such as GTX Quadro or GTX 750 Ti fit directly into ViCase. (3)(4) Ultra High End Cards can be added with PCIe Expansion using ViDock. Please see the sister campaign → ViDock G6 Campaign.

Easy to clean

Literally in seconds you can snap off the Air Intake of ViCase, rinse it with soap and water and put it back. (Snapshot from the Movie)

How ViCase works

3 size fits all

ViCase is the PC case to contain all your Desktop PC components. Use the table above to pick the right size for you or simply use a Ready Made Configuration in the V²Configurator which automatically picks the right size for your Application. All ViCase fit behind the Display in All-In-One configuration using either ViCase-VESA or ViCase-Stand.

How it all fits

The top left shows ViCase Mini with all sides and top removed. The bottom holds two 2.5" disks and provides cable ties and space to organize all your wiring. The secret why ViCase with top cover removed looks so tidy. Above you see the Mini-ITX Motherboard. Most of the top space is taken up by the two cooler. The CPU cooler in this image is ViCase-Cooler-L. The other big cooler is for the GTX 750 Ti Graphic Card. What makes ViCase Mini significantly more quiet versus a desktop is the design approach that both cooler suck in cold air from the outside, thus less fan speed is required which in turn reduces the noise. To further reduce the noise by reducing wind speed we made the entire top and all sides one big perforated air exchanger. And the pATX power supply works without a fan too! The image to the right shows the very same ViCase with mounted sides and top cover. The top cover snaps on, so you have very fast and easy access to your PC for service or to the top cover for cleaning.

V² Open Modular PC System

ViCase is part of the V² Open Modular PC System. It is powerful yet as easy as ABC. If all of this does not say much to you, you are safe to ignore it. Just use the Configurator which will make the right choices for you. If you are a technical person, you will notice that in essence there are thee groups: 1) ViCase is the PC case to contain your PC parts. 2) Standard Mini-ITX / ATX Desktop parts that make up any desktop PC 3) ViCase Extras which add features, such as All-In-One Conversion, PCIe Expansion, Color choices, etc ... Together they make the V² Open Modular PC System, giving you the benefit that you can grow or upgrade your ViCase Computer whenever you want or need to. A fun way to explore the V² System is by browsing the V²Configurator. See the movie below for more details.

How to make Custom Build PC easy

A PC custom build for your application always had the edge over an off the shelf PC, but they were either too complicated to build or too expensive to buy ready made. ViCase solves this problem with the V²Configurator. Our team of experts created 30 ready made Custom Build PC configurations for you. Our non technical approach makes it easy to find your configuration, and then tune it. Please see the movie on how it works. Use the V²Configurator to configure your ViCase. How to buy ViCase with the Configurator is shown in the Movie "Easy buy ViCase" below.

How All-in-One Conversion works

All-In-One Computers are elegant in their appearance. The All-In-One conversion of ViCase takes this elegance and adds to it the performance and upgradeability of the desktop. Best of all, you can convert Displays you already own into All-In-One. For more details please check out the chapter: "3. All-In-One Converter" in the V²Configurator

How to assemble ViCase

After you receive the parts for your ViCase Custom PC you will assemble it. The detailed movie's instructions and the ViCase's unique design that gives you access from all sides will make the assembly process very easy.

The ViCase Story

V² Story

Our story of ViCase started as a side project to ViDock: We needed a Host-PC for our Open PCIe Expansion Enclosure. But soon ViCase took on a life of itself. Michael and Tim loved the new case so much, they simply converted their own PCs to ViCase, until all our in-house computers were ViCase PCs. Even the CNC machine that cuts the ViCase prototype is driven by a ViCase PC. Every time something was not right, we designed and build a new version to fix it. Within a year we build an endless number of ViCase prototypes, slowly evolving it to a computer that is simply a joy to use.

V² Team

We all come from the ViDock Community with a love for small and quiet computer systems that pack a punch. Together we have over 150 Years in Computer experience. Some of us are working together for over a decade. We all wish you as much joy using ViCase as we had in developing it.

ViCase Development Photos

How to buy ViCase

Perk Discount Options

There are three Perk Discount options: Early Signature, Early Bird and Indiegogo. Multiply this with 4 Product Options: Tiny, Mini, Mini Value and Ultra and you get the full names of the 12 Product Perks. Please use the Configurator to build yourself a working ViCase configuration and use the Indiegogo Checkout Button to calculate the cost of the ViCase Extras you may need for your ViCase Custom PC.

Easy buy ViCase

Use the V²Configurator to check out your Perks on Indiegogo, as well as all needed parts with third party. The movie shows how.

Shipping

Thanks to ViDock we have great experience in world wide shipping. Giving precise shipping cost for all configurations and all countries is not practical. Expect about $20 ... $30 US shipping cost. For some countries, such as in Europe, additional tax need to be paid. You can choose to pay this tax with us and we will do the complete import procedure up to your door. Once we get ready to ship we will contact you on the details.

(1)(2) Workstation GPUs or High end Gaming GPUs such as GTX Quadro or GTX 750 Ti fit directly into ViCase. (3)(4) Ultra High End Cards can be added with PCIe Expansion using ViDock. Please see the sister campaign → ViDock G6 Campaign.
Easy to clean

Literally in seconds you can snap off the Air Intake of ViCase, rinse it with soap and water and put it back. (Snapshot from the Movie)
How ViCase works
3 size fits all



  ViCase is the PC case to contain all your Desktop PC components. Use the table above to pick the right size for you or simply use a Ready Made Configuration in the V²Configurator which automatically picks the right size for your Application. All ViCase fit behind the Display in All-In-One configuration using either ViCase-VESA or ViCase-Stand.

How it all fits


  The top left shows ViCase Mini with all sides and top removed. The bottom holds two 2.5" disks and provides cable ties and space to organize all your wiring. The secret why ViCase with top cover removed looks so tidy. Above you see the Mini-ITX Motherboard. Most of the top space is taken up by the two cooler. The CPU cooler in this image is ViCase-Cooler-L. The other big cooler is for the GTX 750 Ti Graphic Card. What makes ViCase Mini significantly more quiet versus a desktop is the design approach that both cooler suck in cold air from the outside, thus less fan speed is required which in turn reduces the noise. To further reduce the noise by reducing wind speed we made the entire top and all sides one big perforated air exchanger. And the pATX power supply works without a fan too! The image to the right shows the very same ViCase with mounted sides and top cover. The top cover snaps on, so you have very fast and easy access to your PC for service or to the top cover for cleaning.

V² Open Modular PC System

ViCase is part of the V² Open Modular PC System. It is powerful yet as easy as ABC. If all of this does not say much to you, you are safe to ignore it. Just use the Configurator which will make the right choices for you. If you are a technical person, you will notice that in essence there are thee groups: 1) ViCase is the PC case to contain your PC parts. 2) Standard Mini-ITX / ATX Desktop parts that make up any desktop PC 3) ViCase Extras which add features, such as All-In-One Conversion, PCIe Expansion, Color choices, etc ... Together they make the V² Open Modular PC System, giving you the benefit that you can grow or upgrade your ViCase Computer whenever you want or need to. A fun way to explore the V² System is by browsing the V²Configurator. See the movie below for more details.
How to make Custom Build PC easy


  A PC custom build for your application always had the edge over an off the shelf PC, but they were either too complicated to build or too expensive to buy ready made. ViCase solves this problem with the V²Configurator. Our team of experts created 30 ready made Custom Build PC configurations for you. Our non technical approach makes it easy to find your configuration, and then tune it. Please see the movie on how it works. Use the V²Configurator to configure your ViCase. How to buy ViCase with the Configurator is shown in the Movie "Easy buy ViCase" below.

How All-in-One Conversion works


  All-In-One Computers are elegant in their appearance. The All-In-One conversion of ViCase takes this elegance and adds to it the performance and upgradeability of the desktop. Best of all, you can convert Displays you already own into All-In-One. For more details please check out the chapter: "3. All-In-One Converter" in the V²Configurator

How to assemble ViCase


  After you receive the parts for your ViCase Custom PC you will assemble it. The detailed movie's instructions and the ViCase's unique design that gives you access from all sides will make the assembly process very easy.

The ViCase Story
V² Story


  Our story of ViCase started as a side project to ViDock: We needed a Host-PC for our Open PCIe Expansion Enclosure. But soon ViCase took on a life of itself. Michael and Tim loved the new case so much, they simply converted their own PCs to ViCase, until all our in-house computers were ViCase PCs. Even the CNC machine that cuts the ViCase prototype is driven by a ViCase PC. Every time something was not right, we designed and build a new version to fix it. Within a year we build an endless number of ViCase prototypes, slowly evolving it to a computer that is simply a joy to use.

V² Team

We all come from the ViDock Community with a love for small and quiet computer systems that pack a punch. Together we have over 150 Years in Computer experience. Some of us are working together for over a decade. We all wish you as much joy using ViCase as we had in developing it.
ViCase Development Photos



How to buy ViCase
Perk Discount Options


  There are three Perk Discount options: Early Signature, Early Bird and Indiegogo. Multiply this with 4 Product Options: Tiny, Mini, Mini Value and Ultra and you get the full names of the 12 Product Perks. Please use the Configurator to build yourself a working ViCase configuration and use the Indiegogo Checkout Button to calculate the cost of the ViCase Extras you may need for your ViCase Custom PC.

Easy buy ViCase


  Use the V²Configurator to check out your Perks on Indiegogo, as well as all needed parts with third party. The movie shows how.

Shipping

  Thanks to ViDock we have great experience in world wide shipping. Giving precise shipping cost for all configurations and all countries is not practical. Expect about $20 ... $30 US shipping cost. For some countries, such as in Europe, additional tax need to be paid. You can choose to pay this tax with us and we will do the complete import procedure up to your door. Once we get ready to ship we will contact you on the details.

story:
Godbless your friends, godbless the World

The idea

Godblessyoo is the first mobile application which enables you to bless your friends.

Select or take a photo via the application and make the sign of cross on the tactile screen of your Smartphone or your tablet.

Your picture will be shared  on Facebook and Twitter and saved on our server, whose particularity is to be blessed by a catholic priest.


How does it work ?

The user takes a photo or selects one from their internal gallery of his smartphone via Godblessyoo application. Once the picture is taken (or downloaded via his own personal gallery), the user (or “GodblessR”) can “bless” the selected picture by drawing a cross on the tactile screen of his Smartphone.

A truly unique function, the blessed picture can be shared on social media (Facebook, Twitter etc). The photo will then be automatically downloaded and stored on the blessed server .


70% of the benefits are given to charities.

The main interest of “Godblessyoo” is that 70% of the benefits from the application will be directly given to charities.

The user (or “GodblessR”) in turn become a benefactor.

“Godblessyoo” is much more than a mobile application, it is a technological and spiritual way to“protect” the one you love, close relatives (family, friends, fans…) while helping people in need.

Godblessyoo will be free to download.

A Godbless, what is it ?

The “Godbless” is a small positive visual message which can can be used to say hello, thank you, good luck, as well as to protect or encourage the person you are getting in touch with, in anticipation of a major event (birth, wedding, baptism, job interview, graduation ceremony, convalescence…). The reasons of “godblessing” a close relative are unlimited.

Godbless your friends,  family, fans of your music band, team mumber and more...

“Godblessing” can be a beautiful way of showing your affection or commitments towards somebody before God. An excellent example would be “godblessing” a selfie for your engagement wishes/announcement.

As for Twitter, Godblessyoo also offers the opportunity to add a small text of 140 characters (“PrayR” : available on the Godblessyoo V2).


where does your money go to ?


Dear donators, dear friends,

Because we really have the possibility to change things, we need you all to make this exceptional project come true.

Reaching the goal of 10,000 $ will enable us first to develop our application.

Nevertheless, Godblessyoo will require a much more important investment.

If thanks to you, we can surpass our target, your money will be exclusively used for our moderation system,   the costs due to our future server,  our communication and press relations as well as the other costs.

Dear friends, thanks a lot for having read these lines

In these difficult times and via Godblessyoo, let's show to the world our unity, and our spirit of innovation, modernity and brotherhood.

Sébastien PONCELET (Founder)

Contact press : press@godblessyoo.com

We need you all friends !

WWW.GODBLESSYOO.COM



Godblessez vos amis, godblessez le Monde


L’idée

Godblessyoo est la première application mobile qui vous permet de bénir vos proches.

Sélectionnez ou prenez une photo depuis l'application et effectuez un signe de croix sur l'écran tactile de votre Smartphone ou de votre tablette.

Votre photo sera alors partagée sur Facebook, Twitter, par MMS ou par mail mais elle sera aussi et surtout sauvegardée sur notre serveur dont la particularité est d'être béni par un prêtre Catholique.

Godblessyoo est également la première application citoyenne et responsable puisque 70% des bénéfices générés par l'application seront intégralement reversés à des associations humanitaires.


Comment ça marche ?

L’utilisateur prend une photo ou sélectionne l’image de son choix depuis la galerie interne de son smartphone via Godblessyoo.

Une fois la photo prise (ou téléchargée via sa galerie personnelle), l’utilisateur (ou « GodblessR ») peut alors « godblesser » l’image ainsi sélectionnée en faisant un signe de croix sur l’écran tactile de son Smartphone.

Du jamais vu en termes de fonctionnalités : La photo sera alors partagée sur les réseaux sociaux (Facebook et/ou Twitter) et directement enregistrée et stockée sur le serveur béni « Godblessyoo ».


70% des bénéfices reversés.

Outre l’action d’effectuer un signe de croix sur l’écran tactile de son smartphone pour envoyer une photo vers un serveur béni, le principal intérêt de Godblessyoo réside dans le fait que 70% des bénéfices générés par l’application sera directement reversé à des associations caritatives.

Les utilisateurs (ou « GodblessR » deviennent pour ainsi dire des bienfaiteurs. Godblessyoo est bien plus qu’une simple application mobile, c’est une façon technologique et spirituelle de « protéger » ses proches (amis, famille…), tout en venant en aide à ceux qui en ont besoin.

Godblessyoo sera téléchargeable gratuitement.


Un Godbless, c’est quoi ?

Le « Godbless » est un petit message visuel positif pouvant servir à saluer, remercier, souhaiter bonne chance, protéger, encourager son interlocuteur en prévision d’un événement important (Naissance, mariage, baptême, entretien d’embauche, remise de diplôme, convalescence…) Les raisons de « Godblesser » ses proches sont illimitées.

Godblessez vos amis, votre famille, votre public, vos collaborateurs...

« Godblesser » peut-être une jolie façon de témoigner son affection ou son engagement envers quelqu’un devant Dieu. Par exemple, « Godblesser » un selfie (autoportrait) de ses vœux de fiançailles.

A l’image de Twitter, Godblessyoo offre également la possibilité d’y ajouter ou non un petit texte de 140 caractères (« PrayR »).


Où va votre argent ?

Chers donateurs, chers amis,

Ce projet hors norme ne se fera pas sans vous !!

Atteindre l'objectif de 10 000 $ nous permettra dans un premier temps de développer notre application et de poursuivre cette grande Aventure.

Bien-sûr, Godblessyoo nous demandera un investissement bien plus important par la suite.

Si grâce à vous nous dépassons cet objectif, l'argent récolté sera exclusivement dédié à la modération, aux frais inhérents à notre futur serveur, à la communication et relations avec la presse ainsi qu'à nos divers frais de fonctionnement.

Merci infiniment d'avoir pris le temps de lire ces quelques lignes et de vous intéresser à Godblessyoo !

En ces temps difficiles et à travers Godblessyoo, affichons aux yeux du monde notre unité, notre esprit d'innovation, de modernité et de fraternité.

Godblessyoo all !!

Sébastien PONCELET (Fondateur)

Contact Presse : press@godblessyoo.com


Nous avons (gravement) besoin de vous !

WWW.GODBLESSYOO.COM


Godblessyoo - A applicação que abençoa os seus próximos

Godblessyoo é uma aplicação móvel ofereçendo a possibilidade ao usuário (ou GodblessR) de partilhar as suas fotografias nas redes sociais, por MMS ou por e-mail,

Transferindo-as em direcção de um servidor cuja cuja originalidade é ser abençoado por um padre católico de uma manipulação ainda inédita que consiste em efetuar osinaldacruz sobre oecrã táctil do seu Smartphone ou da sua Tablete.

Um evento importante da vida ( casamento,compromisso profissional,um exame,um evento desportivo etc…) as razões por « Godblessar » os seus familiares próximos são numerosas e ilimitadas.

« Godblessa seus amigos – Godblessa o Mundo »


O grande interesse de Godblessyoo reside sobretudo no facto que a maior parte dos beneficios (70% ) gerados pela a aplicação são diretamente restituídos as associações humanitárias.

Os fundadores estão convencidos, Godblessyoo responde a um verdadeiro pedido: Uma acção espiritual, cidadania que tende a ofereçer aos católicosdo mundo inteiro, uma maneira mais moderna de viver a sua fé na vida quotidiana.


Godblessyoo é uma estreia mundial que ofereçe uma experiencia utilizador ainda inedita em matéria de interacção com o ecrã tactil do seu smartphone ou da sua tablete (sinal da cruz para enviar uma fotografia).


Amigos, precisamos da sua ajuda !

WWW.GODBLESSYOO.COM

story:
•Janta Choupal-World's first Political Social Media application, acts as a communication platform for actual voters/electors, public administrators & Leader representatives.

•Through this app, users of certain geographic location can report social issues/views through text, photo or video.

•Users can also vote, comment and share issues/views posted on the timeline by existing users

•All the posted issues will be assigned to elected representatives notified through SMS & E-mail.

•Leader can take public opinion on any topic without incurring any operational expenses.

USP/Differentiator/Advantage:

•Registration : With basic credentials user need to enter State-Constituency-Legislative-Ward, this will assign the hierarchy of elected representative to user pertaining to his location.

•My Friends: Through this user can see or chat-with other fellow users of the same ward/area.

•Support for Issue: Issue will get endorsed by fellow ward users who are facing same problem by a simple click or a comment.

•Impact on Elected Representative: As issues are being endorsed by actual or potential voters they are to be resolved at the earliest.

•Unlike facebook & other social media it creates connected local society for better social governance.

•We are operational in the cities of  Indore & Nagpur (Beta Version).

•As on date, there are 2000+ users on the app.

•All 85 Corporators, 3 MLA’s of Indore have enrolled on Janta Choupal alongside several local public administrators.

•The application got official support of Govt. Of Maharashtra and directions to all concerns will be rolled out very soon.

Social Impact Of Janta Choupal in India:

•It will bring stake holder of society e.g. voters, elected representatives and bureaucrats on common platform.

•It will help to ensure better governance through individual participation of all stake holders.

•This will enhance public responsibility towards society through “Citizen Journalism”.

•Leaders hierarchy would be inter connected through this app to ensure transparency and accountability.

•Common voters can directly associate themselves to elected representatives from Corporator to CM.

•Leaders/bureaucrats will work more efficiently by focusing on the crux of the issue without any deviation.

•Competitiveness among leaders will lead to better decision making and implementation.

This is a social enterprise or a Social Start-up but both scalable and sustainable in India and will increase citizen participation in local governance. The objective of this fund-raising activity is to have money for spreading Janta Choupal to as many Smart Cities of India as possible in the next year and have a better tomorrow with accountable leadership.

Please contribute towards this initiative to make India better.

story:
After you’ve found a buyer for your gun, you’ll need to legally and safely transfer your ownership to the buyer.  Gun Transfer is the first and only web-based gun transfer service.  It’s easy, inexpensive, and legal in all 50 States*

We love our guns and take pride in responsibly using them for sport and protection. We believe in taking precaution when it's time to sell a gun. You can’t control what happens to your gun after you sell it but you can control who you sell it to. What happens if your gun is used in a crime? Are you prepared for the responsibility?

Gun Transfer helps gun owners pass their gun ownership to a new buyer through an easy to use digital service. Sellers can verify their buyer state residency, check their background, and use our online bill of sale with digital signatures. We even offer safe locations to exchange the gun through our authorized dealer network. 


It starts with the right question – Where do criminals get guns? While there are many ways to purchase a gun in the US, it’s easy to see how a criminal would make a purchase. Purchasing through a licensed gun dealer is the most common. This includes traditional gun dealers and pawn shops that are licensed to sell guns. A private party sale is the next most common. This includes buying or inheriting a gun from family or friends and purchasing from classified ads. The last method is purchasing from a gun show. This is often referenced as the Gun Show Loophole and includes both licensed gun dealers and private transactions.

Where do criminals get their guns? Many people argue that most of the guns are stolen. According to the Bureau of Justice Statistics, stolen guns account for less than 1% of thefts. It makes sense too, as most gun owners are responsible and lock their guns. Since gun theft is not a significant source, most criminals purchase their guns like the rest of us. It’s common sense that they would purchase guns from people who use the least invasive method.  Criminals  avoid full background checks.


Hi, I'm Randall Gorham.  The idea behind Gun Transfer started several years ago when I sold an AR-15 pistol – a very serious firearm. I listed the gun on a local gun classified website and a potential buyer contacted me. We negotiated price and a meeting place over text message. The buyer showed up on time but I was immediately uncomfortable with the sale. His appearance made me question his character. What were his intentions with this gun? Was he a criminal? If not, could I trust him to not eventually sell it to a criminal?

I was not prepared to take the responsibility for selling my gun but I felt I was too far into the transaction. The buyer paid me in small bills and we went our ways. I wished for the ability to verify the buyer’s background prior to meeting him.

When Randall first approached me about Gun Transfer I was ecstatic because it’s so close to my heart. My cousin was gunned down and killed in front of his young family by a drug addict and repeat criminal offender. It’s been 15 years and the details are still very painful. What’s worse is the long-term affect of this person’s reckless action. It’s destroyed many lives and caused unimaginable pain.

I’m 100% pro-gun. I love shooting and will defend our 2nd Amendment rights. A gun is a powerful tool and in the wrong hands it can cause more devastation than anyone is willing to accept. I’m thrilled to be a part of Gun Transfer and provide a pro-gun solution to reducing gun crimes. It’s a cause that everyone (liberals and conservatives) can get behind.

We invite everyone to join our effort to reduce gun crimes through responsible gun ownership.  Gun Transfer donates 10% of all profits to support our cause. 

We believe in reducing gun crimes. We’re a group of people that have always fought to defend our family, friends, property, and beliefs. Now it’s time to take action against gun crimes  without infringing on our second amendment rights. Transferring firearms responsibly is just the beginning. Gun transfer donates 10% of profits to help stop gun crimes. Those funds are dedicated to support victims of gun crimes and addressing the root causes of violent crimes.

We pledge to support charities and efforts that help stop gun crimes without infringing on our 2nd amendment rights, support the victims of gun crimes, help reduce gang involvement, minimize drug and alcohol abuse, improve mental health, and support our veterans.

Join us and fight against gun crimes.

Purchasing one of our perks or donating to our cause is the best way to support us.  Some perks include our exclusive t-shirts – not your average promotional swag. These are comfortable, proper fitting shirts you’ll want to wear everyday. In fact, we wear them all the time and love the way they feel.

Risks and challenges

The technology and development behind Gun Transfer is well on its way. With a successful funding, we’ll be able to deliver the web-based products. The most significant risks for Gun Transfer are changing laws. Changes in the gun laws are expected and we can quickly adapt to most changes.  

Gun Transfer is developing a gun dealer network throughout the country. Our Safe Location Exchanges must be done by an authorized gun dealer. It will take time for us to build partnerships in every location throughout the US. We plan to move as quickly as possible. The more funds we get the quicker we can build our gun dealer partnerships. Please note that none of our perks include the Safe Location Exchange (which is the only product available in all 50 states). We cannot guarantee that we’ll have a partnership near your location.

After you’ve found a buyer for your gun, you’ll need to legally and safely transfer
your ownership to the buyer.  Gun
Transfer is the first and only web-based gun transfer service.  It’s easy, inexpensive, and legal in all 50
States* We love our guns and take pride in responsibly using them for sport and 
protection.  We believe in taking precaution when it's time to sell
 a gun. You can’t control what happens to your gun after you sell it but
 you can control who you sell it to.  What happens if your gun is used 
in a crime?  Are you prepared for the responsibility? Gun Transfer helps gun owners pass their gun ownership to a new buyer through 
an easy to use digital service.  Sellers can verify their buyer state 
residency, check their background, and use our online bill of sale with
 digital signatures.  We even offer safe locations to exchange the gun 
through our authorized dealer network.  It starts with the right question – Where do criminals get guns?  While 
there are many ways to purchase a gun in the US, it’s easy to see how a 
criminal would make a purchase.  Purchasing through a licensed gun 
dealer is the most common.  This includes traditional gun dealers and 
pawn shops that are licensed to sell guns.  A private party sale is the 
next most common.  This includes buying or inheriting a gun from family 
or friends and purchasing from classified ads.  The last method is 
purchasing from a gun show.  This is often referenced as the Gun Show 
Loophole and includes both licensed gun dealers and private transactions.
 Where do criminals get their guns?  Many people argue that most 
of the guns are stolen.  According to the Bureau of Justice Statistics, 
stolen guns account for less than 1% of thefts. It makes sense too, as

story:
We provide the charger, and you only need a single plug!

Your Apple Watch should have a place to charge that's as beautiful as the Watch and iPhone themselves. We've put in a lot of late nights and have focused heavily on functionality and cost to make sure this is the most useful and affordable dock and charging solution for your Apple Watch and iPhone. Unified design. Unified placement. Unified charging. All of your wearable needs, solved. In one place. Don't settle for an injection molded plastic stand that robs you of the charging disc that came with your Apple Watch. You can be sure that Unify Dock fits your Watch perfectly, 42mm or 38mm. 

Unify Dock with iPhone 6 Plus and 42mm Apple Watch Sport

We need your support to start production and we want to get a Unify Dock on your desk or night stand!

With Unify Dock we have created an elegant way to display your devices while also providing the following:

  • An additional genuine Apple Watch Magnetic Charger. Keep the charging cable that came with your Watch in the car, at the office, or in your computer bag so you're never left high and dry without a charge.
  • A low friction Apple® MFi lightning connector. Our connector ensures your iPhone docks and undocks effortlessly. And have confidence that you will be charging and syncing your iPhone though an Apple approved connector.
  • Adjustable phone support. Unify Dock fits iPhone 5, 5S, 5C, 6, and 6 Plus with or without genuine Apple cases and with most third party cases.
  • A single cord to charge both devices. No need to search for double the outlets or double the USB ports We've developed Unify Dock to handle both your Apple Watch and iPhone at the same time.
  • Aircraft grade 6061 Aluminum. Don't settle for plastic or bargain basement aluminum alloys. Unify Dock is made from a solid block of billet aluminum with the same finish as the Apple Watch Sport.
  • A product that is designed, machined, and assembled in the United States of America. With our team having a background in manufacturing, it is important to us to support American industry.

From the beginning, Unify Dock has been designed with precision to ensure a perfect fit...


for not only your Apple Watch...


but your iPhone as well.






Retail price for Unify Dock will be $119, so please show your support and get a great deal in the process!  And make sure to send us a message with your Pledge ID and color choice!


As Seen On


Development

Unify Dock has gone through an incredibly rapid development cycle. Moving from the initial idea to the machined aluminum prototype and PCB assembly took our dedicated team less than 4 weeks. In that time frame we worked with multiple industrial designers, graphic designers, rapid prototypers, and both domestic and international manufacturers. Pledge at the $25 Designer Kit level and we'll send you the whole story complete with photos of the early stage models, mistakes, and 3D printed prototypes.

We're excited and can't wait to get this dock in your hands!



Schedule, Risks, and Challenges


At this stage we already have a functional prototype built. The biggest risk that we're anticipating is manufacturing lead time. We have a manufacturer selected to machine our solid blocks of aluminum into the beautiful final product, but until we start with the first large batch we won't know the possible issues we may have to deal with.

Fortunately our team is a pair of engineers that has experience manufacturing both mechanical and electrical systems in large quantities. We're ready to jump on any issue and get things rolling to ensure the fastest possible delivery time.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you don't have an Apple Watch, or you would rather wait for us to hit production. Either way we would really appreciate it if you could tell your friends about Unify Dock, especially anyone who loves to be the first in line for the latest and greatest Apple accessories! Send them to our website, or send out a tweet!

story:
The Ideal World…

You’re out for a run, removed at least a beat from all the distractions of everyday life, transported to a world where you are in absolute control. This is what you live for. You are a runner to begin with, and everything else that you do is secondary.

The music playing through your headset provides an incentive to keep going.  Your feet pound in time to the music and each beat brings you one step closer to your goal.

The Real World…

One misplaced step. You slip on uneven ground. An unexpected obstacle. Whatever the reason, you’re down, injured and in need of help.

It’s dark; and sooner than you expected. You’re on an unlit road and that last car got pretty close.

You’re alone on your run and feel like someone is watching you. You’re aware of being followed.

"1 out of 3 women harassed while Running", BBC.com

"More than half of young women joggers get harassed", nydailynews.com

"Running Safety Tips For Women Because Harassment Is Alive And Kicking." huffingtonpost.com.au

The Campaign

Whilst we can't stop injuries or the problem of harassment, we want to provide new features that gives the runner extra precautionary measures.

Our latest project aims to bring additional safety features to JS Running.  JS Running is a popular user-friendly iPhone app. It’s designed to complement your run by measuring your performance to help you reach your goals; listen to your tunes and control their playback safely using glance free gestures; taking away all distractions so you can concentrate on your run.

-    We want to start with a feature we believe should be part of every runner’s kit; an alarm function that could attract the attention of passers-by in case of an emergency or could be a deterrent to a would-be harasser. 

-    In addition to the alarm, we want to make it possible to make emergency calls or message someone, to tell them you are out running, with a simple gesture within JS Running, removing the need to switch apps and lookup numbers. 

-    Also, we want to improve your visibility to passing traffic or other runners at night via a flashing screen.

This is an app that every runner will want to have installed for short runs, long runs, and everything in between.

Main Goal $10,000

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising $10,000. This operating capital will cover the costs of developing and marketing the features above:

-    Alarm function

-    Call & message with simple gesture

-    Flashing screen to improve visibility to passing traffic

By backing this campaign, you will help us to include these important features for free in the next version of JS Running.  You can also support by choosing one of our amazing and exclusive perks.

Stretch Goal $20,000

Additional $10,000 stretch goal will help build an Android version bringing this highly functional and must have app to an even larger audience all around the world.

The Impact

We at JS Running want to improve your running experience, provide features that give you peace of mind and extra precautionary measures on your beloved trails and sidewalks. By backing this campaign, you are helping runners everywhere to be safe and potentially helping save lives.

You Can also Help by Simply…

Beyond contributing to our campaign, you can help us by:

-    Downloading the free JS Running app and telling your friends about it. This will help us grow and become more visible on the App Store. You can download the current version here

-    Sharing the campaign URL on your Facebook timeline, Twitter feed, or any other social media platform you use.

We want JS Running to become an integrated part of running culture. Your support means the world to us. Thank you for your time.

The PERKS

We are offering 2 great own branded items (with a selection of color/size choice) that we selected to keep you cool when running and improve the usability and access to the JS Running app.

The cooling towel is made of special microfibre fabric that cools down dramatically by simply damping it with water and squeezing the excess out. Great to use after a run.  The extra long size we have chosen can make it multi use; as a simple towel, to wear as a scarf around your neck (SPF 50), or as a headband.  We have specifically chosen the high visibility green and electric blue colors as we feel these increase your visibility to others.

The armband is specifically selected as a 2 in 1 design; a case and a holster.  This design keeps the screen, headphones outlet and speakers open to maximize the operation of the app by gestures and the use of the safety features stated above.  

 

Badge of Honor! Become immortalized by having a JS Running in-app badge named in your honor. Runners earn badges for various milestones achieved while using the app.  Users can go on to share these on social media. Have one of these badges permanently promote your logo and brand.
You'll also receive combo case & armband, branded cooling sport towel and we'll list your name on our website as contributor.

story:
Impacts & Benefits

  • Anti shattered glass and anti-collision design for durability
  • Compatibility with the latest iPhone and Samsung smartphone models
  • All-inclusive soft cover for easy usage and storage
  • Water resistance
  • Non-slip material for easy grip
  • PCBA Circuit 9 protection
  • The top quality polymer battery
  • Easy to read power display
  • Compatibility with any USB device
  • Dual device charging potential

 

We know you can’t control the schedule in front of you out on the road. We don’t believe your travels should be controlled by the needs of your electronics; it should be the other way around. With Astracase, the world is your oyster. All you need to do is snap your phone to the magnetic and keep on moving. It’s as easy as that.

 

 

We wanted to come up with a portable solution that is so slight and lightweight that users won’t even know it’s with them. Forget about the outlets, forget about the charging stations, and forget about your phone’s battery charge with Astracase.

 

 
Astracase is a simple, curved edge magnetic charging pack that can be used with smartphones, as well as any USB device. With dual charging functionality, snap it to your phone and charge your camera at the same time. Built with durability in mind, the Astracase comes with anti- shatter glass and an ergonomic curved design that ensures it can withstand rain, falls, and wear-and-tear over time.
 

Our Team

Astracase was designed and developed by a team of three: Shin Kang, Steve Lim, and Veronica Kwon. Working together to come up with the world’s first magnetic portable electronics charger, they spent months prototyping and testing new models, arriving at Astracase.

In order to complete production and ensure the best quality manufacturing as possible, the team is using IndieGoGo to spread the word and curate a community around their new cord-less and convenient future with Astracase. All three are based out of New Jersey today.

story:
I want to plug you into the future...but first a little about my past.

I started my professional career as a Software Engineer at IBM because I was passionate about technology. I went to law school and became a prosecutor in NYC because I wanted to help people. Now I am turning my attention back to technology so I can help solve a problem we all experience -- dead battery anxiety.  

As a cell phone geek I have more than my share of charging cables, wall warts, docks, battery packs, battery cases and all the rest. I knew there had to be a better way. I want the Plug Pack to be the (better) way people use and charge their phone. Let's ditch the charging cables once and for all. 

Where we're going we don't need cables.

The single biggest failure point in any mobile device is the battery. When the battery dies the phone is completely useless. Do we have to carry charging cables everywhere we go? Not if you have a Plug Pack.

We believe the ultimate phone accessory is one that allows you to maximize the use and enjoyment you get from your phone. The Plug Pack let's you use your phone without a single cable or adapter, ever. The Plug Pack's built in AC prongs allow you to charge your phone virtually anywhere. Its built in  back-up battery allows you to charge it separately from your phone so you are never tied down by a charging cable again.Keeping your phone charged isn't the Plug Pack's only superpower, it also is an amazing way to hold and view your phone. Just plug it in above the kitchen counter, your workbench, vanity or wherever you find yourself. Our unique plug design pivots 90 degrees and gives you the ability to use and view your phone in portrait or landscape mode. Look up recipes without spilling ingredients all over your phone. Watch that YouTube tutorial without covering your phone in sawdust. Listen to the morning news or play some music in the bathroom without draining your battery or accidentally drowning your phone.

When staying charged is this easy and using your phone is more fun, you will use your phone more often -- and that is a very good thing.

Help us, help you. 

As finalists in the Indiegogo/Motorola Transform the Smartphone Challenge we are benefiting from guidance and technical support directly from the Moto Mod team at Motorola. We are working hard, but need your help to cross the finish line. Join us and help make Plug Pack the (better) way people use and charge their phone!
