I want the Plug Pack to be the (better) way people use and charge their phone. Let's ditch the charging cables once and for all. 

Where we're going we don't need cables.
The single biggest failure point in any mobile device is the battery. When the battery dies the phone is completely useless. Do we have to carry charging cables everywhere we go? Not if you have a Plug Pack.
We believe the ultimate phone accessory is one that allows you to maximize the use and enjoyment you get from your phone. The Plug Pack let's you use your phone without a single cable or adapter, ever. The Plug Pack's built in AC prongs allow you to charge your phone virtually anywhere. Its built in  back-up battery allows you to charge it separately from your phone so you are never tied down by a charging cable again.Keeping your phone charged isn't the Plug Pack's only superpower, it also is an amazing way to hold and view your phone. Just plug it in above the kitchen counter, your workbench, vanity or wherever you find yourself. Our unique plug design pivots 90 degrees and gives you the ability to use and view your phone in portrait or landscape mode. Look up recipes without spilling ingredients all over your phone. Watch that YouTube tutorial without covering your phone in sawdust. Listen to the morning news or play some music in the bathroom without draining your battery or accidentally drowning your phone.

When staying charged is this easy and using your phone is more fun, you will use your phone more often -- and that is a very good thing.
Help us, help you. 
As finalists in the Indiegogo/Motorola Transform the Smartphone Challenge we are benefiting from guidance and technical support directly from the Moto Mod team at Motorola. We are working hard, but need your help to cross the finish line. Join us and help make Plug Pack the (better) way people use and charge their phone!

story:
The gamepad found in ProjectPlay™ has been manufactured from a custom formulated magic material that allows your device’s screen to detect input from it, just like it does with your sausage fingers!

All you have to do is FLIP the case to the front side of your device, LAUNCH our specially designed emulator application and GET GAMING!

We have developed a specially designed Emulator Application (check FAQ for more info). This application supports games in the form of ROM digital format. Specifically, GBA (Game Boy Advance) ROMs.

 

!PLEASE KINDLY NOTE! that we CANNOT provide you with digital copies of ROMs (for the sake of copyrights). Each user will have to legitimately source their own ROMs of licensed/unlicensed games. Hint: Google is your friend :)

 

ProjectPlay™  currently supports:

 

 

Surprisingly enough, manufacturing incurred costs inhibit us from providing a wider range of supported devices.

OUR FIRST PRIORITY once we get up and running will be the EXPANSION of this list.

We've engineered ProjectPlay™ with one thing in mind: EASE OF USE

And in order to achieve that it DOES NOT USE BATTERIES / CABLES / BLUETOOTH

As slim as it gets, without compromising on clickyness!

ProjectPlay™ only adds 3mm of thickness to your device. As slims as it gets!

ENGINEERED TO THE MAX FOR THE MOST COMFORTABLE GAMING EXPERIENCE

We Built ALL THE PROTOTYPES

ProjectPlay™ has been in development for over 2 years! Countless prototypes and design iterations have been tested! All just so that we could GET YOU THE BEST ONE!

We Built not 1, but 2 Sets of Molds just to do the prototyping of the buttons!

 

We 3D Printed again.... and again... AND AGAIN!

During its development, we've shipped ProjectPlay™ all around the world to be tested from lots of different people! We then asked them to send us a photo... and ProjectPlay™ WORLDWIDE was BORN!

 

In order to ensure that all deadlines will be met on time and that the final product will look and work as intended, we

-> Traveled All The Way To China<-

and went through countless manufacturing partners before finally picking one!  And the one we picked has had a great track record of producing smartphone cases. 

DON'T FORGET TO

->Check Out This In-Depth Post<-

our of travel so far!

We've taken place in numerous competitions during the development of ProjectPlay™ (flunked at most) but managed to to win some as well!

 

The U.S. Ambassador to Greece Gaming on ProjectPlay™ !

We have presented ProjectPlay™ to lots of different events, expos and people which gave us valuable feedback and helped us further develop our product!

In the (hopefully) likely scenario that the campaign is overfunded, we plan to use the available funds to expand the supported devices!

 

Should we get this far, we will further cover whichever devices our backers vote for!

ProjectPlay™ Family

The people behind ProjectPlay™

A HUGE THANKS to the companies that made this happen!

 

ProjectPlay™ ships globally*!

The estimated Delivery Time to first shipments is ~ 6months. This is so that we can ensure the perfect condition of the final product (also see: Risks and Challenges). Once a product has shipped, it should take a maximum of 14 working days to reach even the most remote countries.

 

DO NOTE: Shipping costs of ProjectPlay™ DO NOT COVER VAT/GST that might incur at local customs. 

*restrictions may apply for countries under embargo and/or warzones.

The team behind ProjectPlay™ is working tirelessly to ensure that deliveries will be made on time. Nevertheless, developing neatly working hardware and software can be much harder than it may initially appear.

Also, it is quite time consuming to test the two together, isolate a bug and fix it, especially when the bug is a hardware one. On top of which we also expect the Chinese new year to set us back a little, but that too has been taken into account when calculating the delivery timeline.  

 

-Woah! 6 months to first shipments?! Aren't you afraid that you might get copied like it happened with >insert name -of every brand to have ever existed probably- here< ?

Short answer: No

Long answer: Would you really, really, REALLY buy a knockoff?!

What is it?

ProjectPlay™ is a smartphone case that besides offering protection to your device can also convert it to a portable retro gaming platform. ProjectPlay™ has integrated physical buttons that can be used to game on your device once you place the case on the front side of your device.

 

How does it work?

In order to remain slim, light and discreet, ProjectPlay™ does not use cables, batteries or Bluetooth. Instead, the physical buttons are made of a magic material that allows the screen to receive input just like it would from your sausage fingers.

 

Who built it?

ProjectPlay™ has been designed and developed by Turnand Peripherals®, a hardware start-up located in Thessaloniki, Greece that designs and develops smart peripherals for smart devices.

 

Why should I use it?

Because you’re the cool kid of the block whose heart beats at an 8bit rhythm.

 

Where can I buy it?

ProjectPlay™ is currently only available right here on Indiegogo, get yours NOW and be one of the first in the world to get to game with it!

 

How much does it cost?

ProjectPlay™ Early Bird starts at a heavily discounted $29 LIMITED to the first 300 backers, after that it is available for $39. The price includes the case itself and the emulator application that will allow you to play retro games on your device. The price DOES NOT include shipping expenses and VAT/GST that might incur during shipping.

 

Why are you crowdfunding?

We are crowdfunding because Indiegogo is a great tool to fund the production costs of ProjectPlay™ and at the same time build the core of our community.

 

Supported Devices

ProjectPlay™  currently supports Samsung Galaxy S9/S9+ models and the iPhone X/Xs & Xs Max models. Surprisingly enough, manufacturing incurred costs inhibit us from providing a wider range of supported devices.

 

This is something that is our first priority to solve once we get up and running.

 

Why do you feature a Samsung Galaxy S7 edge on your video?

You might have noticed that the demo device is a Galaxy S7 edge. Even though we won't be supporting this device. We chose to use this one to test our prototypes solely for the reason that it was the most accessible to us.

 

Software Features

ProjectPlay™ comes with an accompanying Emulator Application. Such an application allows your smartphone to emulate the digital environment of older gaming handhelds such as Nintendo’s Game Boy. You can learn more about Emulator Applications here:

(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emulator )

 

In order to use the Emulator Application you have to load legitimately acquired digital copies of games, also known as ROM files. WE CANNOT PROVIDE you ROM files as copyrights prohibit us from doing so, IT IS UP TO THE USER to source their own ROM files (Google is your friend). You can learn more about ROMs here:

(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ROM_image )

 

Where do I download the accompanying emulator application from?

The emulator application is undergoing development (currently in closed beta for Android and early Alpha for iOS). Once it reaches open beta stage it will be made available on Google’s Play Store and Apple’s App Store.

 

Is it protective?

ProjectPlay™ is built with high quality shock absorbing materials in order to ensure great drop protection attributes. Of course, your phone is still prone to denting and shattering as sir Isaac Newton’s laws apply everywhere*.

*we might be proven wrong in the future, plz don't hold us liable.

 

Is it Grippy?

Oh my yes! The physical buttons are made from extra grippy silicone, meaning your fingers wont slide out of place while gaming, but your device will also not slide away on slippy surfaces.

 

Can I still use my device while gaming?

ProjectPlay™ has been designed to keep your device as accessible as possible even while gaming. All ports are accessible during all times so you can still charge your phone and have your earphones (should you have a headphone jack) plugged in. Moreover, ProjectPlay™ allows the use of all of your device’s side buttons even while gaming.

 

Where is ProjectPlay™ manufactured?

ProjectPlay™ is manufactured and shipped out from China, the manufacturing capital of the majority of tech products, your iPhone, and their peripherals.

 

Will Wireless Charging Work with ProjectPlay™ ?

Just like nothing in life is perfect, so are we. The protruding buttons of ProjectPlay™ increase the distance between your device and your wireless charger to the point that your device will not charge. Or just let it rest face down and it will charge ! :)

 

Will ProjectPlay™ Work with Screen Protectors?

ProjectPlay™ has been tested extensively with screen protectors. The vast majority of the tests were successful in working to the fullest of our expectations.  Although the added thickness of the screen protector (.3mm) might stress the case bezels in the long run.

*You still using a screen protector? Take a chance!

Where do you ship?

ProjectPlay™ ships worldwide*

 

*restrictions may apply for countries under embargo and/or warzones.

Shipping Costs

ProjectPlay™ has a worldwide flat shipping rate of $9.

 

Is VAT/GST covered?

Shipping incurred VAT/GST is not covered for ProjectPlay™ . Please check with your local customs authorities.

 

When will it ship?

We estimate that the first production units will ship out approximately 6months post the campaign’s conclusion, with shipping taking a maximum of 14 working days to reach the most remote countries.

 

Why 6 months?

We understand that you may be anxious to get your hands on ProjectPlay™ as soon as possible. And we are working at full capacity to ensure that this happens. ProjectPlay™ is in pre-production prototyping phase.

Some minor bugs still need to be worked out on both hardware and software levels and as we would like to refrain from over promising and under delivering we’ve chosen a safe period of 6 months to do so. Most importantly, all of our backers will be kept updated of the current status of ProjectPlay’s production/shipping timeline.  

 

For any further questions you can e-mail us at: info@turnand.com

(please keep in mind that due to high influx, reply times may widely vary)

 

DISCLAIMER

All product names, logos, and brands shown in this video are the property of their respective owners and are used for identification purposes only.

story:
Creating a mobile App is very complicated, expensive and takes a lot of time?

 

With Decebalus App builder you can develop an app in hours without Coding at the cheapest price on the market! Everything is set up, you just have to customize the features, menu and preferred design.

 

The never-ending question

IOS or Android? 

    You get both!

Coding in IOS is different than Android.

That's why Decebalus is giving you the possibility to develop once and download both App kits for each system you need without extra effort! In this way, you can connect with a  higher number of users.

 

Benefits

 

Develop by yourself

Unlimited updates 24/7

End-user automatic App update

Cheapest on the market

Quick development

Dedicated server for apps

Integrated security

Boost your income

Online support 

Add Free platform

and many more!

 

Develop by yourself without coding!

using our features & templates

 

 

Our features available on the platform are covering a wide diversity of activities as :

 

 

Because everything isn't enough!

we are offering

lifetime free premium features!

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

Besides the presented features we share some already made templates to create your App even quicker, having more time for customizing your favorite design.

 

Do you need custom features or templates?

No Problem!

 

With our Code Page feature, you can create your template, page or feature.

 

 

In-App Purchase

Sell your products or services in your App without any commissions. 

Periodical Subscription: One Time Payment, Monthly Subscription, Yearly Subscription

 

Monetization 

Get passive income with AdMob already integrated on the platform. All you have to do is to add your ID number.

AdMob is one of the world's largest mobile advertising platforms and claims to serve more than 40 billion mobile banner and text ads per month across mobile Web sites and handset applications.

 

In-App payments method

Paypal, Stripe, PayU, PayFast, Velocity

Android Payment Credentials

IOS Payment Credentials

 

Edit your app as many times as you want!

 

   Regularly, a developer has to do the changes, recompile the code and upload it to the Play Store or App Store. All of this takes a lot of time, right? 

   With our platform, you do the changes online by yourself,  save them and re-open the app on your phone.  That's it!

Because the apps are running on our servers, every single App will open on all mobile phones with your latest updates. Because of this, you don't need to update your App in App Store or Play Store and also your users don't need to manually update it.

 

Push notifications available

 

The push notifications may be used to speak directly to a user. This way you can avoid getting filtered out by spam filters or the possibility of lying forgotten in a user’s inbox and they boast of a click rate that is many times more than that of a traditional email. Push notifications come in real handy as it can remind users to use an App, even when the App is closed. The push notifications may also be used to drive the following actions:

 

  • To increase the sale, push notification may be employed to promote the products, new launches, or any other kind of offers.
  • Push notifications may be employed to enhance the customer experience.
  • Push notifications help convert unknown app users to known consumers.
  • They also help send transactional receipts immediately.
  • They can also be employed to drive the users to other marketing channels, for example, the different social media channels at the users’ disposal.

 

Check your App online

 

When you want o check your design it takes time and gets frustrating doing it on a real device.

That's why you can do all of this live, online.

 

When you want to check the functionalities is recommended to do it on a psychical device. 

To avoid spending time transferring the App manually on your device, we will send you a link where you or your friends, can download it, without using the App Store or Play Store.

 

Lack of inspiration regarding your design?

 

We shared the most common icons and pictures to boost your App appearance.

 

Do you need specific videos, pictures or logos?

Based on your needs we can guide you or recommend different websites or apps to solve them as soon & as cheap as possible.

 

App submission support

 

We will guide step by step how to upload the Apps on Play Store or App Store. The Store fee is supported by the user. One time payment of 25 $ for Play Store and Annual fee of 100$ for App Store.

 

Lowest Price on the Market!

 

Our first mission is to give you access to all features available and the second one is to drop the price as low as possible, that's why we are offering full access to all features for just 9.99$/Month/App or 99.9$/Year/App !

 

What's next?

 

Help us spread this platform and together we can build the best online App development platform. We will continue to develop more features and better service because in our mind perfect isn't enough!

 

Share campaign link:        https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/decebalus-ap...

 

 

Thank You !

story:
The New Generation of All-in-One Mobile Power

provides all charge ports you need; DC, USB-C, USB-A and Wireless Charging.

  • Flight Friendly 
  • 20,000mAh Large Battery
  • For Laptops, Smartphones, Tablets, USB Devices
  • Charge Anywhere Power Everything
  • Charge 3 Devices Simultaneously
  • Fully Charge for Surface Pro or MacBook Pro Once

Optimal Charging Efficiency

Simultaneous charging for 3 devices

2 Wired Charging + 1 Wireless Charging at full speed ​

​

10W Wireless Charger

Power Up Your AirPods Efficiently

Power On The Go, Music Non-Stop 

Turbo Recharging Speed

In less than 2 hours with PD3.0 60W Input

Save Your Time and Ready to Go

Note: it is recommended to recharge via ENERGIEMAX Add-ons Fast Charging Wall Charger 

 

Universal Compatibility

Supports multiple devices to stay fully charged

Capable of 60W charging speeds to power USB-C or DC Laptops

 

 

How it Powers?

Charging to Fully Charged 

With full capacity, it can fully charge your device once or even more times.

 

NOTE: Charging times based on laboratory testing, actual results may vary.

 How to Add-ons?

Before CHECKOUT, you may see the Perks you may also like below the page.

If you need some Add-ons, DO NOT CHECKOUT with Apple Pay.

 

With the best engineering and product development team, ENERGIEMAX is  specializing in high-end power adapter, notebook adapter, power bank, and a series of solar-powered products.

Renowned for its franchised technology and design, as well as high quality assurance which exceeds various worldwide safety standards, ENERGIEMAX has expanded its market to US, EU, Brazil and Asia. All of our products are approved by CB, CE, FC, FCC, PSE, UL, BSMI certificates.

Optimal Charging Efficiency

Simultaneous charging for 3 devices

Power Up Your AirPods Efficiently

story:
Hello World, my name is Micah Miller. I'm the owner and inventor of the Mo Charge Vertex 1. From as long as I can remember, I have been extremely good with my hands and always had an exceptional innovative mind. I was so advanced but didn't realize until I got older. My parents enrolled me in a hands-on vocational school on weekends whiles I was still a full time high school teenager. Surprisingly, I excelled and came first in the class where I was the only child among adults. As I got older, I always thought of great ideas and wondered why someone has created it or how cool it would be to have such an amazing product if it was available. Then I decided to make that product available. 

My inventor career started in 2016 when I committed to pursue the idea of creating this amazing charger that I was extremely happy to gift the World. Months later after creating my first fully functional prototype, I realized that it would be too costly for me to create that specific charger for all the top phones in the World. I would have had to make more than 30 different chargers to accommodate the wide variety of phones on the market. I went back to the drawing board, thinking of ways of how I can make a universal charger that can charge all the top phones. As time passed and passed, prototype after prototype I finally created the perfect charger. Not only did I make a charger that can charge all the 'top' phones, I created a charger that can charge every single phone on the planet. I created the MOST Versatile Universal Portable Wireless Charger ever made.

I am extremely satisfied with this accomplishment, but I know the work has just started. I've been committed to bringing my dreams to life. My four-year journey consisted of three different prototypes, and now, we have the best charger in the World. This journey had many financial difficulties. Having no investors, I borrowed money from family members and close friends and pumped all my salary into this venture. This is my love, this what keeps me passionate and going, despite this long journey, I am so happy to have this opportunity to finally make my state-of-the-art device available for the World to obtain and benefit from its many features and capabilities.

I want to thank all my contributors/backers and all my customers in advance. Without your support this journey means nothing. Your support will help me to reach my goal of successfully starting my business and supplying the World with my industry changing device. Your support will help me to provide a better life for my family and most importantly to persons who are less fortunate. My company Mo Charge Inc has a lifetime partnership with a brand-new Non-Profit Organization to continuously assist persons who are less fortunate. Yes, a lifetime partnership. This Charger will not be the only product that my company Mo Charge invents. We have more great products to bring to life that do not exist. Every time one of our products are sold, we will contribute a significant percentage to assist others. Not only do you get an amazing device that will bring you many personal benefits, but you will also get to help persons all around the World. We thank you in advance.

 

 

 

Your 'greatly appreciated' funding will be used for a variety of things. We are currently in a position for mass production and distribution of our chargers. All the necessary stages in starting a company and preparing for mass manufacturing has already been accomplished. In the business of selling a product, advertisement is key. It is nearly impossible to sell an item to a customer if the customer doesn't know that it exists. Some Funding will be used in marketing/promoting our brand and product. By doing this, we get the word out, we get to educate people on our brand and what we do. We educate persons on our product and all its unique features and capabilities. Some Funding will be used to mass produce our products in advance prior to a customer's purchase. Some Funding will be used for research and development (R&D) to start the process of creating our next state-of-the-art device. Some Funding will be used on our overhead expense and monthly bills. Some funding will be kept aside for unseen events. To summarize, your Funding will be used to advance Mo Charge Inc and put us in a position to move in a positive trajectory to have ultimate success.  There are many valuable unique perks such as, express free shipping, free colored skins, key chains, discounted chargers in bundle deals, coupons/gift cards to use on our website and becoming the first set of customers to have access to our new amazing products prior to their official launch date (Year 2021).

 

 

 

 

At Mo Charge Inc, we specialize in the art of versatility, bringing many important valuable users’ needs together and assembling into one, industry changing, state of the art device, the Vertex 1. Our project provides each contributor with the most versatile universal charger ever made. The Vertex 1 is a combination of all charging devices available worldwide and other devices such as a speaker and phone stand all in one. We provide our customers with more options than our competitors at nearly half the price. Purchasing the Vertex 1 is the best long-term investment. When you think of charging cases, they are only designed to charge one specific phone because they were only made to that specific dimension. On the other hand, the Vertex 1 is a universal charger that can charge every single phone on the planet and it can also charge phones that has not been made yet! (Great Long-Term Investment with an abundance of features and benefits)

In 2017 we made a charger that we were excited to make available for all mobile device owners. Shortly after that development we were back at the drawing board to make a more dynamic version and that is exactly what we did. We are extremely excited to offer the world a product that every mobile device owner deserve & truly need.

 

 

 

 

This Journey started in 2016 and we encountered challenges along the way. We overcame all those challenges in dominant and impressive fashion. We rose to the occasion time and time again and always came out victorious.  We have an amazing team of individuals who always stayed composed and prepared to continue a positive trajectory of our company and its advancement. We are greatly appreciated for each contributor/backer and we assure you, that you are contributing to a group of winners and investing in the best charger ever made. We are very confident that there is no major risk ahead in providing our chargers to the contributor/backer.  We have worked hard on this journey to get to this point. Unlike most campaigns, contributors and backers DO NOT have to wait through a research & development stage (R&D) which includes trials and errors and can be a lengthy period. All the groundwork is completed, and we are ready for mass production! The only foreseeable challenge that may arise, is possibly shipping, due to the worldwide effects of the present pandemic. With that being said, shipping or arrival date may be slightly off, nothing to unbearable. 

 

 

 

 

 

Being a contributor/backer does not only involve money. You can also 'contribute or back' our project by sharing our campaign or product and help to get the word out.  We welcome you with open arms, to join us on our journey as a new and rising company and help us educate the masses and show that a product like ours is available with its many capabilities and features. It is nearly impossible to sell a product if nobody knows that it exists. Purchasing a charger or any of our perks available for donating and sharing the word about our product is the ultimate support. However, if you're unable to contribute financially, you can share our campaign or product in any way you can. Whether that is by sending around informative text messages and/or utilizing your social media platforms. You are free to use any of our pictures, videos and/or wording content found on our website (www.mocharge.com) or on our official social media platforms as apart of the content you will used in helping us get the word out. Your support is greatly appreciated and goes a long way. You will always have a hand in helping us build a strong foundation to deliver world class products to people all around the world. Thank you in advance.

story:
With its simple and modern design, it can go with any smartphone and fit in any space. I wanted the design to be simple, clean, and sturdy to match my iPhone's design.

As I tried to come up with an idea, I wanted something that would look good in my space as well. The original i Speaker design from 2009 maintains the the C-shape dock design, but with the light function added.

The design includes the bottom for charging, the middle for a speaker, the top for the light and the added front part for making an impression as if the light and the docked smart phone seem connected.

Because the surface area is small, it's easy to place other items next to it like the latest book you're reading, your glasses, or even your laptop. After the original design came out in 2009, a number of well-known manufacturing firms have mimicked its design with similar products of their own.



  • Touch Switch – turning the device on and off is easy. simply touch the top of the device.
  • 4 Step Dimming – you can adjust the brightness of the light with 4 levels; 20%, 40%, 60% and 100%.
  • Seven colors – you can change the color to 1 of 7 different options to change the color or atmosphere depending on your preference.
  • Sleep mode – when you go to bed, you can choose the Sleep mode option for turning the light off automatically after 30 minutes.


                             "Top 10 iPod Docks for Gadget Geeks" - Infoniac

                        "15 Best Designed iPod and iPhone Docks" - DigsDigs


Back in 2009 while listening to music in bed, I researched vigorously for a docking speaker that was convenient to charge my phone while playing music. I looked around my room trying to think of the best place to put, but I couldn't.

Now there were two problems to solve: choosing the right docking speaker, and where to put it.

Since I always go to bed listening to music, I thought my nightstand would be the perfect place to put it, but not next to my lamp because it would clutter up the whole space. And placing it far from the bed would be too inconvenient to control and turn off if needed.

It all came back to the same thing. Having it next to my bed would be the most convenient, but having a separate lamp seemed redundant. So why not simply combine the two? This is how the concept of i Speaker Light came to be.



i Speaker Light can be used anywhere you desire and in any situation. 

When I started designing i Speaker Light in 2009, people had just started to really embrace smartphones and I questioned whether a product like i Speaker Light could be commercialized. But ignoring those questions, I decided to upload my design just for fun. I received a ton of unexpected, but welcome feedback. I received suggestions and inquiries from all around the world about mass production, distribution, investments, and even interviews. 

At the time I didn't think much of it. We'll call it being naive.

However, after 6 years, I'm still receiving countless requests from all around the world and got to seriously thinking about commercializing i Speaker Light.

After deciding to finally make i Speaker Light a reality, I realized how difficult it was and different it was from simply designing a product. Despite all these difficulties, I finally completed a working version of i Speaker Light after dozens of trial and errors. 


It's designed for any smart phone. Users can charge their phones by simply plugging their charging cable in the cradle then installing it into the dock or by connecting a charger to the USB port on the backside of the device.


Additional devices can be charged using the USB ports on the back of the product. Port 1 is for the dock and port 2 can be used to charge another smartphone or larger device like a tablet.


Your music will sound even better because of the built-in amp. Play and control music wirelessly through Bluetooth, or, if your device does not support Bluetooth, there is an additional AUX port on the back of the device as well. 


"Delivery of perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."


Where will the funds go? The funds we collect through Indiegogo are necessary to make i Speaker Light a reality. Funding will go towards to finalizing molding and electrical components with the best manufacturer we can find. We don't want to cut any corners with our product because we believe in great design and great construction. 

The name of our company is ZED, an abbreviation for Zero Base of Design. The logo was designed and inspired from an hourglass with the foundation being rooted in our name, Zero Base. We believe that if you come across obstacles, go back to the beginning and design again, but keeping it simple. 

For the past 5 years, various media outlets have introduced i Speaker Light and a lot of customers sent us manufacturing and purchasing inquiries. Despite this, our product was unable to be developed due to various factors including insufficient funds, performance dissatisfaction, low quality, rapid change of smart phones (change of charging cables), etc.

We want to be able to manufacture i Speaker Light and accomplish our goals and deliver to those would have appreciated our design for the past few years. Please help us in attaining our goals in order to develop the next generation of i Speaker Light and other products.

Aside from i Speaker Light, we have created several other designs and received recognition from the online tech community as well. We have created designs like the Chocolate folder, Digital dumbbell, Stacking dock, Apple hairband, Shrek MP3, and the Smart Tray from sources like Stuff, T3, Jack, Peclers Paris, Monsa, etc.

When developing a product, you face a number of risks. I don’t know for certain how many people will actually like and purchase our product once it gets commercialized. 

I think crowd funding is a great place where a product's marketability can be tested and judged by customers before being released.

The speaker is being introduced via crowdfunding at a lower cost than retail as a way of showing thanks to those that back our speaker early and for those that believe in us.

Despite our inability to lower manufacturing costs through mass production just like conglomerates do, we are going to offer high quality products at a low price in order to reward our valuable customers who like our design, disregarding the drive to make a large profit through our campaign.

Like a lot of other companies today, we could manufacture in China to lower costs. However, high quality details are necessary for i Speaker Light’s design. We are going to try our best to satisfy backers with our products with strict examinations and management by manufacturing domestically and keeping it local.



1. How is i Speaker Light different from other products?

  • Difference in design: An original design (2009) that other products have followed.
  • Convenience: The functions might be the same, but thoughtful consideration was put in for ease of use.
  1. A light button for usage in a dark place
  2. A wide touch area on top to easily turn on/off the light
  3. Can be used for every type of smart phones (charging/Bluetooth)
  4. Charger for users that own both a smart phone and a tablet
  5. Digital amp for better sound quality

2. How is i Speaker Light 2010 different from i Speaker Light 2015?

The design remains the same but there are big differences in functionality and usability.

  1. 2010: Docking for Apple products only / 2015: Docking for every type of smartphone
  2. 2010: Simple smartphone charging / 2015: charging power for not only smartphones, but also tablets
  3. 2010: Analogue amp, music playing through docking / 2015: digital amp and Bluetooth
  4. 2010: Simple bed light / 2015: mood lighting, book reading lighting, 7 different types of color a user can change depending on his/her preference and change in touch sensor for light usability.

3. How do I get it fixed when broken?

If there is a branch store in your country, you can get it fixed or exchanged 1:1. If not, please email us and we will exchange or fix your product via mail.

4. What else is in the package?

The package consists of:

  1. One i Speaker Light
  2. One 8-pin cable and One 5-pin cable
  3. i Speaker Light manual
  4. 2 cradles for cable
  5. DC adaptor (multiple)

5. I am interested in retail/partnership

For business inquiries in purchasing our product or hopes to open up your own branch, please send us an email at sales@ispeakerlight.com and we will get back to you.

Charger for users that own both a smart phone and a tablet
Digital amp
for better sound quality



2. How is i Speaker Light 2010 different from i Speaker Light 2015? 
The design remains the same but there
are big differences in functionality and usability.

2010: Docking for Apple products
only / 2015: Docking for every type of smartphone


2010: Simple smartphone charging /
2015: charging power for not only smartphones, but also tablets
2010: Analogue amp, music playing
through docking / 2015: digital amp and Bluetooth


2010: Simple bed light / 2015: mood
lighting, book reading lighting, 7 different types of color a user
can change depending on his/her preference and change in touch sensor for light
usability. 

3. How do I get it fixed when broken?
If there is a branch store in your country, you can get it fixed
or exchanged 1:1. If not, please email us and we will exchange or fix your
product via mail. 
4. What else is in the package?
The package consists of:

One i Speaker Light
One 8-pin cable and One 5-pin cable
i Speaker Light manual
2 cradles for cable
DC adaptor (multiple)


5. I am interested in retail/partnership 
For business inquiries in purchasing our product or hopes to open up your own branch, please send us an email at sales@ispeakerlight.com and we will get
back to you.

story:
Good Evening All IGG Backers!

We have been silent for a very long time focusing on getting things done. We do apologize for the long period of silence, and now I am extremely excited to announce that we've finally emerged from the BatCave ready to accomplish what we've set out to accomplish so long ago. The Live TV Hostile Takeover is officially about to begin!

As many of you obviously know, our efforts to get Nuclius into the mainstream by way of crowdfunding were thwarted due to the stonewalling efforts of our Cable/Satellite competition, the media companies they own and now even the banks they deal with. But they all doubted our resolve! We have all worked tirelessly and pursued on relentlessly to get the job done and now our final Release-to-Market (RTM) Nuclius Ursa Rhodium, is finally coming to a TV near you in the next few weeks with the Live TV portion going Live this fall! It's all in motion! Take a look at the official photos below.

Over the last few months, we began shipping several dozen Ursa Rhodium devices to the field for final testing. The results have been stunning. We have produced the best, most powerful, premium, portable 4K streaming device on the market... hands-down. A product that has impressed everyone that has experienced it. Take a look at the video below. A link to the official Nuclius page on our Corporate site is below for your review so you can see the dramatic improvements we've made between the IGG Campaign and our RTM version. Also, FYI, the Gold-printed box and Ursa device pictured above is the special Limited Edition device reserved specifically for IGG Backers, investors, etc as promised.


Since our crowdfunding efforts failed, we decided to form a relationship with several private investors/lenders who are providing us with the capital we need to get things done. Obviously, we missed our planned launch date of 2/17/2016 due to many unforeseen issues including both hardware and software related. But now, that phase is behind us and we're finally shipping devices. Nuclius Orders from all sources will resume in June following a major DRM/Security firmware update that needs to be installed by the manufacturer. This is a critical update that is designed to protect both ours and other's Live TV and exclusive content. IGG Backers will get theirs first followed by everyone else. And several IGG Backers will receive their devices prior to that time so you can begin spreading the word and your experience with Nuclius.

We've also completely removed ourselves from our former MLM roots and have converted to a new hybrid Referral-based business model fully positioned to allow all Consumers to capitalize on the Tsunami of customers that will flood into Triniti as a result of people hearing about Nuclius for the very first time. Like Nuclius, this system is a first of its kind and will change the way products/services are introduced to Consumers. The timing couldn't be better because people are ready to make the mad dash from Cable & Satellite as fast as they can. We're paying $100 for each Subscriber Household that Locks-In their Nuclius Order as we prepare for launch. Yes you read that right. $100 Cash for each Nuclius Offer Lock-In and it's paid Lightning Fast... every week. You also make money off of your Referrals' Referrals and we share a portion of the Monthly Service Charges with you as well. And we've paid out thousands in Commissions already and it's growing weekly. This is the only system in existence where regular Consumers can spread the word and actually earn enough income to get your TV, Wireless and other digital services from Triniti at no-out-of-pocket expense.

To make sure you understand, our new Lightning Referral System puts you as a Nuclius Backer in a very unique position. Since you are a Nuclius believer and have expressed such an early dedication to Nuclius by committing funds to the project, we will allow you to get signed up in the Lightning Referral System without an Order Lock-In, so you can make the $100+ on each Referred Subscriber. That means free of charge. The Limited-Time Nuclius Offer Lock-In Details, updated videos and a ton of other information can be found here: http://Triniti.IDitchedCable.TV. Read up and get involved. All you have to do is click the Lock-In link at the bottom of the page, choose Option A and enter your information using the same email address you use for IGG. For the CC/DC info, just provide any card and you will not be charged since you are signing up under the main Triniti account. You will get your own personalized links and Social Media Share Widgets as soon as you signup so you can immediately begin spreading the word. Processing will verify your information and give your account full Lock-In access to make Referral Income to your heart's desire. So feel free to spread the word on Social Media and however else you see fit.

It's time for us to work together unrestricted to let the people of this great nation know that they can finally Switch & Ditch Cable & Satellite and even make some really good money doing it. Long Live the Revolution!

Thank you for your patience, continued Support and Happy Referring!

Darin Miller
CEO

story:
Katana: Plug into the cloud!


Background

Cloud storage is big. Organizations and consumers are both jumping on it as a secure, controllable file storage medium. But what if you want to use the cloud with a non-internet connected device, a game console, etc? You're out of luck. And then there's that awkward moment after you've sat there on a client's PC for an hour waiting for your file to upload, and then realized you forgot to log out.

What if there was some way to combine the security and connectivity of cloud storage with the speed and convenience of a flash drive?

...WELCOME TO KATANA!


Katana

Katana is a highly encrypted flash drive that's paired to your mobile device. The mobile device provides Katana with a direct connection to your favorite cloud storage service, and Katana's onboard battery allows the drive to sync after being disconnected. You can even use your Katana to sync files to/from your phone.

Katana makes cloud storage faster and easier!

Katana can also be used as a standard encrypted flash drive. The internet connection provides the Katana with optional advanced features such as remote wiping, device management, usage logging and even using geo-fencing to control encryption. Because the drive depends on the mobile device to be unlocked any organization's existing MDM solution (Airwatch, CA, EMS, etc.) automatically extends to Katana.

At our goal the prototypes for this campaign are essentially offered at cost. What this campaign is enabling us to do is to develop the next generation of the device and help us prove to potential investors that interest exists in the product.


The Technology

So far we have several prototypes and an alpha version of the software. Through this Indigogo campaign we'll be offering our easy to use Katana devices, but we'll also open source the designs and source code for all of the hackers out there.

The current platform contains upgradeable eMMC flash memory, a programmable ARM MCU with hardware encryption, and a bluetooth chip for pairing to a mobile device.

It's easy to use. Just pair it to your mobile device and set it up with the app. You can set up your Katana to lock and unlock in a number of different ways:

  • Flip a switch in the app after unlocking your mobile device
  • Enter a password
  • Enter a pin code
  • Unlock whenever it's paired with your mobile device
  • Unlock in certain geographies (like when you're at home)
  • Unlock when connected to certain WiFi networks

Katana is a cloud connected platform and also contains the following features:

  • Remote wiping (through your remote wipeable mobile devices)
  • Direct uploads to your mobile device from the Katana - syncing happens even after the device is disconncted
  • Direct uploads to an incorporated cloud service (Dropbox and Google drive at the least, but we're sure the open source community will add others)


Katana Rendering With Case


Katana in Prototype 3D Printed Case


Prototype Katana Board


iOS App Prototype


Prototype Operational Demonstration


Open Source

We'll provide the source code for both the MCU and for the Android and iOS applications to pair to the device (could be an SDK but will likely be the full app).

The goal of this platform was to create a secure cloud-enabled flash drive. But imagine all of the other hacks you could create with this! You'll get an awesome way to protect your data out of the box, but also a cool hackable platform. And you'll be helping us start our company.


What We Need & What You Get

We set the campaign for a very small, reasonable goal. At this level we're providing Katana devices at cost, but the effort helps us move forward on the next generation of the device. You'll be helping to make our Katana dream come true :)

At our current fundraising level we can't afford an injection mold so plastic cases will likely be prototype molded or 3D printed and will be expensive. That's shy we're offering two versions - with and without a case. For all the makers out there we'll post a free case model on Thingiverse.


Risks & Challenges

There are no significant technical challenges. The device exists. It works. All necessary features on the next generation device have already been proven. We're only facing minor challenges in two areas:

Manufacturing:

While custom PCB manufacturing is a very mature industry, we need to find a good quality manufacturer that can build working prototypes and keep the device costs low enough to match our funding goals. Luckily we've brought in a team member, Gabriela, with a great deal of supplier quality experience to help vet potential manufacturers.

App Development:

Our goal is to allow users to copy files to the Katana and then have them sync on the go. We're running into some limitations with iOS regarding the amount of time an app can run in the background for syncing, as well as limitations with other features. We're confident, however, that most of the critical functionality can exist in the iOS app.


Target Timeline

November 2015:
  • Complete next generation prototype builds
  • Confirm new manufacturer
December 2015: 
  • Finalize SDKs
  • Ship prototype devices

January 2015: 

  • Finish beta testing
  • Start manufacturing

February 2016: 

  • Ship production devices


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us get the word out. We're trying to launch our initial hackable product with this crowd funding campaign, but we're also interested in finding partners to help continue it's evolution. Check out our pitch deck on SlideShare or our website for more information.

And we're always looking for great people to join our team - especially anyone with previous fundraising or sales experience.


FAQ

  • Bluetooth doesn't have much bandwidth. How can you upload to the cloud?
    Katana has on board flash memory and a battery. Files will be copied to the Katana, then copied to the mobile device, then uploaded to the cloud. Small files will appear to upload almost instantly but larger files might take some time to synchronize. Note that we're using Bluetooth instead of other technologies like Ad-Hoc WiFi for simplicity and reliability. Plus, the Bluetooth link allows the device to work closely with the mobile phone and allows lots of other great features such as geo-fencing to control encryption.
  • Why make a Japanese video?
    We wanted to make something fun and were aiming for a Manga but this was the closest we could get on our limited budget :)


Other Relevant Campaigns:
  • Flex-Card
  • Symlis
  • iKlips
  • OTG
  • AllBe1
  • Buddy

story:
The Garda Privacy Screen Protector for Smartphones and Tablets is a thin film filter that protects your phones viewing and prevents others from seeing what is on your screen. 

Help protect your screen info from prying eyes and CCTV Camera’s or Surveillance Cameras in stores, cafes, public transit and other public areas.

The Garda Privacy film adopts world leading advanced micro-louver privacy technology, making the viewable angle at 30 degrees. Your screens content can only be seen when viewed directly in front of the screen. When viewed at an angle, the screen appears dark and blurred – preventing others from seeing your screen.

Thickness of the Garda Layered Film is ~.125mm for the Smart Phones and Tablets.

High Quality Film for Smartphones and Tablets.
-No interference with Touch-Screen responsiveness
-Easy to Install Garda Privacy Screen Protector with premium silicone adhesive and bubble free application
-Dust and Fingerprint repellent
-Marks and fingerprint wipe away easily

Smartphones:

  • iPhone 6, 6 plus, 5, 4
  • Samsung Galaxy S6, Note, Note 4, S5, S4
  • Sony Xperia M4, Z3
  • BlackBerry Passport, Leap
  • Other models

Tablets:

  • iPhone iPad Air, iPad mini
  • Samsung Tab S 8.4, Tab S 10.5
  • Sony Xperia Z2 Tablet
  • Other models

story:
Do you constantly have to convince someone else to scratch your back?
Do they always try to bail on you in only a few minutes?
Do you have to bargain your back scratch for something in return?

Well, you won’t have to anymore. Meet Scratchilla: An application designed to help you get your own Scratchilla - a person who comes to your office or home and scratches your head or back. Anywhere and anytime. Think of Scratchilla as your own personal scratching service.


Imagine you’re sitting in your office, home, library... Your productivity is decreasing and the level of serotonin, the happiness hormone, is quickly reaching the bottom. You switch to the Scratchilla app and immediately see  a couple of Scratchillas are within 30-minutes of you. You choose which one you like most and then… your personal Scratchilla comes to you and scratches your head or back. Ahh! Feels so good. Finally you pay with Scratchcoins - credit units that you bought via your cell phone.

  

“Dr. Gil Yosipovitch, a professor of dermatology at Wake Forest University in Winston Salem, N.C., found scratching activated areas of the brain associated with memory and pleasure.” January 31, 2008


It’s true. Scratching your back and head:

  • reduces stress
  • relieves fatigue
  • relaxes your muscles
  • increases focus, energy
  • improves quality of sleep
  • activates your nerve endings
  • improves your lymphatic system
  • makes your blood circulation more efficient
  • releases a decent amount of serotonin and…

...makes you feel awesome.

“Neuroscientists at the University of Minnesota report that specialized cells in the spinal cord appear to be critically involved in producing the sensation of itch and the feeling of relief after the application of fingernails, at least in healthy individuals.” April 6, 2009


  • Intuitive searching system will help you find the nearest Scratchillas according to their location, ratings, price or photo
  • Pre-order a back scratch for a specific date and time
  • Sophisticated safety system that will protect each Scratchilla in case that some back scratcher would tend to behave inappropriately. Safety for each and every Scratchilla is our top priority!
  • Rating function so you can rate each Scratchilla’s skills

This is just the very beginning of the Scratchilla line of products because we have a strong vision and big dreams. In future versions we plan to add many more features including gamification or a chat window for chatting with your Scratchilla…

NEW! Scratchilla Coolmax® T-shirt

Do you prefer an outdoor T-shirt that keeps you cool and comfortable? Try our Scratchilla Coolmax® T-shirt with funny design that will make every back scratching easier - we spent weeks to find best backscratching fabric for you. 

Coolmax® by Sensor actively suppress the growth of bacteria which are the root cause of body odour and related smells and is perfectly adapted for applications such as sportswear. And now Coolmax® comes with a new benefit: Freshness. Let’s keep you fresh and feeling good whatever you’re doing.

Bunch of people voted for the best design and this is it! What do you think?

Our price is much lower than the retail price and perfect for Christmas!


"I’m Your Scratchilla" Voucher

Surprise your loved one by becoming their Scratchilla for a moment! We will send you a link to a personalized voucher that you can either print or forward to your beloved as a Christmas e-card.


Early Bird Scratch Credit Voucher

Once we release the app, the scratching service will never be the same price again. Don’t fall asleep and get your voucher in advance.


Lifetime 20% Scratch Discount

It's because of backers like you who make project's like Scratchilla happen. Therefore, we're offering a LIFETIME discount of 20% for all scratching services to the first 99 backers. Lock in this deal before we realize we've lost our minds ;-)



Badge, size 40 mm

Support our unstoppable scratching movement by proudly wearing a Scratchilla badge.

   


Scratchilla T-shirt

Comfortable material (100% Cotton), clever design and the perfect Christmas gift!


 



May 2016

First public release for iOS and Android.


This isn't our first project, we've successfully launched couple of applications for the App Store and we also run one of the biggest European websites for videomakers - www.videoflot.com. We've formed a team that truly wants to make the Scratchilla app a reality. If we reach our campaign goal, rest assured that our development team won't disappoint you. We'll create an app for you with the love and passion for back scratching ;-)

1. When will you release the app?

May 2016

2. Where did you get the idea? 

As mentioned in the video, all of us (David especially) love to have our backs scratched. In these days it’s normal to invite a masseur/masseuse to work, so why not invite someone who would scratch your back or head.

3. What are the Scratchcoins mentioned in the video?

Scratchcoins are the name of the credit units you will use to pay for scratching services. You can either buy scratchcoins with real money or gain them in a game. 

4. Can Scratchillas be men?

Of course! Ladies will be thrilled!

5. Couldn’t  the Scratchilla services be misused to endanger  someone?

We are aware that there may be some undesirable people who would try to misuse the app. That’s why we designed a sophisticated safety system to protect each Scratchilla. When activated, the application sends text messages to emergency contacts with the Scratchilla persons's current location.

6. Do you have more questions?

Don't hesitate to email us at info@scratchilla.com (in English or Czech). We'll get back to you as soon as possible.


With any software development, there are potential risks with unforeseen variables which could cause launch delays. While this is always a possibility, we don't expect this to play a significant role given the stage we're at.

We will keep our backers up to date with our progress and let you know if we encounter any setbacks.


Video made by Videoflot

Royalty-free music from bensound


Thank you and… scratch you later!

Think of Scratchilla as your own personal scratching service.




Imagine you’re sitting in your office, home, library... Your productivity is decreasing and the level of serotonin, the happiness hormone, is quickly reaching the bottom. You switch to the Scratchilla app and immediately see  a couple of Scratchillas are within 30-minutes of you. You choose which one you like most and then… your personal Scratchilla comes to you and scratches your head or back. Ahh! Feels so good. Finally you pay with Scratchcoins - credit units that you bought via your cell phone.
  

“Dr. Gil Yosipovitch, a professor of dermatology at Wake Forest University in Winston Salem, N.C., found scratching activated areas of the brain associated with memory and pleasure.” January 31, 2008





It’s true. Scratching your back and head:



reduces stress


relieves fatigue


relaxes your muscles


increases focus, energy


improves quality of sleep


activates your nerve endings


improves your lymphatic system


makes your blood circulation more efficient


releases a decent amount of serotonin and…



...makes you feel awesome.

“Neuroscientists at the University of Minnesota report that specialized cells in the spinal cord appear to be critically involved in producing the sensation of itch and the feeling of relief after the application of fingernails, at least in healthy individuals.” April 6, 2009






Intuitive searching system will help you find the nearest Scratchillas according to their location, ratings, price or photo



Pre-order a back scratch for a specific date and time


Sophisticated safety system that will protect each Scratchilla in case that some back scratcher would tend to behave inappropriately. Safety for each and every Scratchilla is our top priority!



Rating function so you can rate each Scratchilla’s skills




This is just the very beginning of the Scratchilla line of products because we have a strong vision and big dreams. In future versions we plan to add many more features including gamification or a chat window for chatting with your Scratchilla…





NEW! Scratchilla Coolmax® T-shirt

Do you prefer an outdoor T-shirt that keeps you cool and comfortable? Try our Scratchilla Coolmax® T-shirt with funny design that will make every back scratching easier - we spent weeks to find best backscratching fabric for you. 
Coolmax® by Sensor actively suppress the growth of bacteria which are the root cause of body odour and related smells and is perfectly adapted for applications such as sportswear. And now Coolmax® comes with a new benefit: Freshness. Let’s keep you fresh and feeling good whatever you’re doing.
Bunch of people voted for the best design and this is it! What do you think?
Our price is much lower than the retail price and perfect for Christmas!





"I’m Your Scratchilla" Voucher
Surprise your loved one by becoming their Scratchilla for a moment! We will send you a link to a personalized voucher that you can either print or forward to your beloved as a Christmas e-card.




Early Bird Scratch Credit Voucher
Once we release the app, the scratching service will never be the same price again. Don’t fall asleep and get your voucher in advance.



Lifetime 20% Scratch Discount
It's because of backers like you who make project's like Scratchilla happen. Therefore, we're offering a LIFETIME discount of 20% for all scratching services to the first 99 backers. Lock in this deal before we realize we've lost our minds ;-)


Badge, size 40 mm
Support our unstoppable scratching movement by proudly wearing a Scratchilla badge.

   

Scratchilla T-shirt
Comfortable material (100% Cotton), clever design and the perfect Christmas gift!




 




May 2016

First public release for iOS and Android.







This isn't our first project, we've successfully launched couple of applications for the App Store and we also run one of the biggest European websites for videomakers - www.videoflot.com. We've formed a team that truly wants to make the Scratchilla app a reality. If we reach our campaign goal, rest assured that our development team won't disappoint you. We'll create an app for you with the love and passion for back scratching ;-)



1. When will you release the app?
May 2016
2. Where did you get the idea? 
As mentioned in the video, all of us (David especially) love to have our backs scratched. In these days it’s normal to invite a masseur/masseuse to work, so why not invite someone who would scratch your back or head.
3. What are the Scratchcoins mentioned in the video?
Scratchcoins are the name of the credit units you will use to pay for scratching services. You can either buy scratchcoins with real money or gain them in a game. 
4. Can Scratchillas be men?
Of course! Ladies will be thrilled!
5. Couldn’t  the Scratchilla services be misused to endanger  someone?
We are aware that there may be some undesirable people who would try to misuse the app. That’s why we designed a sophisticated safety system to protect each Scratchilla. When activated, the application sends text messages to emergency contacts with the Scratchilla persons's current location.
6. Do you have more questions?
Don't hesitate to email us at info@scratchilla.com (in English or Czech). We'll get back to you as soon as possible.




With any software development, there are potential risks with unforeseen variables which could cause launch delays. While this is always a possibility, we don't expect this to play a significant role given the stage we're at.
We will keep our backers up to date with our progress and let you know if we encounter any setbacks.







Video made by Videoflot
Royalty-free music from bensound

Thank you and… scratch you later!

story:
Smartphones have revolutionized our lives. They have allowed us to connect to the internet, play games, and keep in touch with each other all without needing a bulky PC tethered to a power outlet. Smartphones are getting more and more powerful each month, and advancements such as fingerprint readers, force-sensitive displays, and faster operating systems have made them fast, secure, and powerful devices that everyone use.


Despite all these advancements, battery technology has remained the same. Smartphone makers have had to make tradeoffs between form and function. On one hand, it's possible to make devices with massive batteries. But this makes them huge and bulky. It's also possible to make extremely slim devices with tiny batteries. But these devices dont't last typical users through even one day. 


Mobile battery packs have risen in popularity to address this problem, but they need to be charged before use. We already have enough devices that need to be charged, why have one more?


LifeCable is a power-sharing cable that allows you to transfer battery power between any two mobile devices, whether they're iPhones or Androids.


Connect LifeCable to the device you want to take power from.

Connect the other end of LifeCable to the device you want to transfer power to.

Power is transferred between the two devices.

We researched many different cable designs and we settled on the flat design. It's simple, easy to manufacture, looks good, and it results in significantly fewer tangles than a standard round cable. 

LifeCable will be manufactured with the highest quality aluminum Lightning and Micro-USB connectors, ensuring that nothing cracks or breaks from every-day use.

We made LifeCable 25% longer than other cables so you and your neighbor have complete freedom to move around and use your devices while transferring power. 

LifeCable is Apple MFi certified, meaning it's certified by Apple to work with any iOS device. This certification ensures that you don't have to worry about LifeCable damaging your Apple devices.


Using our patent pending power sharing technology, power flows from one side of the cable to the other, allowing you to transfer power to other mobile devices directly from your own. This technology is able to quickly and safely take power from almost any smartphone, so there's no need to worry about potential damage to your device or your neighbor's device. Power flows at a rate that is about the same as a standard charging cable plugged into a computer USB port, allowing for fast and hassle-free charging.


Yes, it will!

LifeCable is the only power sharing cable on the market that features both a Micro-USB and a Lightning port on both sides of the cable, meaning that almost every mobile device currently on the market is compatible. 

But what about USB-C?

We realize that USB-C is rapidly taking over the smartphone industry, and we're developing a version of LifeCable with USB-C that'll be available soon after this campaign ends.

Thanks to some early supporters, LifeCable is almost ready for full production.

We've completed almost all of the electrical, industrial, and mechanical design and we have several working prototypes(one of them is in our video!). We've spent many months refining LifeCable to be functional, user friendly, and beautiful.

To be able to manufacture LifeCable, we have to purchase several molds. Molds are used in almost every consumer product you can buy. They take 6-8 weeks to produce, and the ones we need cost about $14,000. 

We also have to make optimizations and refine our power sharing technology to make it smaller and more efficient. Producing this technology also requires funding - another reason we need your support!



The LifeCable campaign isn't just about raising funds. We value our early adopters and we want you to help us shape the final version of the product! Our stretch goals will be based on your suggestions from Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

Your contribution is extremely important to the success of the product. Have something you'd like to see in the campaign? Tell us about it! We hope you share our ideas with us and help shape the final version!


We're a team of individuals dedicated to making lives easier through technology. All of the team members involved joined because they are extremely passionate in what they do and because they genuinely believe in our product and our vision for the future.

Thank you to everyone who helped make this a reality.




Our team has faced a number of risks and challenges throughout the development of LifeCable. Our first challenge was with manufacturing. After months of searching for the perfect factory(we've reviewed hundreds), we think we've found the perfect manufacturer for our product. We've established a close relationship with this factory throughout the last 6 months, and we are certain that they can meet any production demands we present them with.

For shipping, we are aware that unexpected delays occur all the time. For this reason, we will make absolute sure that the cables are shipped ahead of time so that everyone receives their perks by April.

We estimate that LifeCable will begin shipping to backers in April of 2016. 

Keep in mind that Indiegogo isn't like other online stores. When you fund our product, you're paying for our engineering, design, manufacturing, and shipping. In other words, you're not just paying for the product itself - you're paying for everything needed to make the product.

We've been developing LifeCable for over 8 months now, and we've gone through many iterations to find the perfect balance of aesthetics and functionality. We already have several working prototypes, and we've been able to prepare detailed CAD drawings and electrical schematics. 

Our manufacturer has sent us product samples of other mobile accessories they produce, and based on these samples we're confident in their ability to make any sort of charging cable quickly and and with high quality. They've also evaluated our CAD files and electrical drawings and have given us a full estimate of how long it will take to manufacture the tooling necessary for our product. We've been in contact with this manufacturer for over 6 months now, and the only thing holding us back from a full production run is funds. 

In our testing, we have not observed any significant drop in battery health for any devices used with LifeCable. The rate that power is taken from a device used with LifeCable is only about 0.6amps, which is only about a third of the maximum discharge rate that even the smallest Li-ion batteries can handle. To put it simply, your devices are guaranteed to be safe with LifeCable.

Yes, it is!

We know how frustrating it can be when you have to take your phone case off to fit a charging cable into the port. The LifeCable in the video is a pre-production prototype and the housing pieces were made by a 3D printer. Injection molded parts and downsizing of our power sharing technology will make the final version of LifeCable much slimmer. We'll make sure it fits every phone case we can get our hands on before we ship it to you.

LifeCable is not waterproof, and we strongly advise staying away from water especially while using LifeCable. If your cable does happen to get wet, letting it fully dry should make it safe to use again.

We will contact all backers a few weeks before shipping with a survey. This survey will include a confirmation of your shipping address, as well as an option to change your address if you need to.

Our video was made entirely by Daniel and Adlar(the founder and cofounder) with the generous help of a few of their close friends. The actors in the video are Nathan Skinner and Michael Paz and the video was shot at the home of Chase Hornsby. The cinematography was mostly done by Nathan Skinner, and the motion graphics were done by Daniel.

15% of our profits will be donated to the American Red Cross from LifeCables sold AFTER our campaign ends. We are fully supportive of donating to a good cause, but we would have to raise our funding goal significantly if we donated 15% of the funds from our campaign to the American Red Cross. Keep in mind that we also have to allocate a percentage of our funds for Indiegogo fees, product tooling, and product development as well. In addition, a significant portion of our funding will go towards advertisement and promotion. After this campaign ends, these categories will no longer present a funding challenge, making a donation to a charity more viable. 

  • USA shipping is $2, except for the 10 pack and up.
  • International shipping is $6, except for the 10 pack and up.

Have questions or comments? We're always here to help at support@lifecableus.com
