story:
About Funny Guide and the funny guys

We are a group of funny guys, now building a studio – Funny Guide, a community where you can embrace the fun, experience different culture in China, and enjoy service you can and even can’t imagine.

We are in Guanzhou. Where are you?

Our founder Jingfeng Lai, with a group of funny guys is creative, passionate. We are also planning to attract more brilliant college students with passion, new ideas and excellent technology in creating video to join us.

We are endeavoring to let more people over the world to have more ideas about China, more common people can buy products of China, the so-called “world factory”, and will have the chance to communicate with friends in China about culture, language studying, and so on. Although we locate in Guangzhou, we want to serve people all over the world

Please help us the spread the words out by Facebook, Twitter, Instagram ......

What makes Funny Guide sooooo special?

Besides of a group of funny guys, our studio has very unique features. Our service comprises two aspects, on-line service and off-line service concerning funny news happened in China, Chinese customs and culture, on-line Chinese learning, study tour in China, shopping for products of China, booking service for trips in China, etc. Apart from the services mentioned above, we also have other services. Please follow our Facebook (vivfeng@yahoo.com.hk) to experience more.

We offer on-line service mainly based on our Facebook which is regularly updated and contains FOUR sections:

  1. Funny’s News

Everyday we will update any funny, odd news happened in China with pictures, news about social phenomenon. Together with Funny Guide, let’s guide you to have more fun, to have more ideas about Chinese society, various yummy Chinese food and tips about beautiful sites in China. Just relax guys!

  1. Funny’s Video

It’s just like a CLOSE-UP.

Through the videos, you can not only enjoy fun, but have more ideas about China visually and get more chance to learn very local Chinese. We will regularly release some novelty, funny, amusing videos happened in China and some videos on the social phenomenon in China.

  1. Funny’s Trip

Do you want to have study tour in China?

Do you want some guys to get everything ready for you before you come to China so that you just enjoy the nice trip? Like booking tickets, hotels, allover local travel guide.

Do you want to live with the local Chinese family during traveling?

Do you want to take your wedding photos in China?

……

Let Funny Guide be your guide in China. Now you can visit our Facebook to get some traveling tips in China.

For more services, consult us via Facebook. The above services can be paid by the day or by the time.

  1. Funny’s Gadgets 

A large number of various gadgets, novelties will be posted at the Funny’s Gadgets part on our Facebook regularly. In fact, to buy the Chinese product on-line at very low price, the delivery destination must be within China. That’s why we are here. We are offering a delivery address in China for you, like a TRANSFERRING WAREHOUSE. And then the goods will be delivered to your destination. You may wonder:

-- How much does this service charge?

--NOTHING. Yes, NOTHING! As long as you’ve contributed $50, $100 or $180 to our project, you will enjoy this service within the corresponding period, no times limited. That’s to say, when you browse the products on our Facebook, you just have to pay for the low price and shipping cost and wait for the parcel at home.

This service is bilateral. Besides of the goods posted on our Facebook, we also offer purchasing service for almost everything you want to buy from China. Once we get your requirement of the goods, we will translate them into Chinese and search on the shopping websites and wholesale markets, and then inquire, and buy. 

This service can be experienced on our Facebook already. GO! GO! GO!

What we need & what you get

With $20,000 as our goal this time, all money from the perks will go towards “studio development”. We deeply understand the most essential things for our studio are our team (the funny guys) and the tools and facilities we can use (electric facilities, computers, etc). If we can meet our goal with your help, the fund will go towards mainly two parts.

About 35% will be used to buy computers (about 3 to 4 pcs), electric facilities (webcams, speakers, microphones, etc.) and office appliances. The other 65% will enable us to get a space for Funny Guide studio, to pay other team members and maintain our studio.

If you have any computers or electric facilities no longer needed, as long as the usage period is within 3 years and they can function well, please contact us to contribute to building our studio. We will really feel grateful and we would give you one of our perks as thanks according to the value of your contribution. On all accounts, any of your contribution will be spurs for Funny Guide to grow.

In exchange, we've got some fantastic perks in return for helping us out.

For the first 1000 contributors, you will enjoy a 5% discount in your subsequent buying of our service after the first service period ends.

* At $5, $10 and $18 level, you can enjoy free viewing of all information posted on our Facebook for correspondingly THREE months, SIX months and ONE year. If you also want to buy the products posted on our Facebook under these 3 perks, NO problem! Just pay us 10% of the trade amount as commission and enjoy this service.

* * If you jump to $50, $100 and $180, apart from free viewing at corresponding period, you can also enjoy unlimited purchasing service.

*** At $850 level, you enjoy a study tour. The primary part of this study tour is that you can learn Chinese in a very good atmosphere. This is exactly the same with our teaching principle “Learn from doing”. We supply board and accommodation for free for 10 days. During the tour, you can experience the local culture and customs; visit the historical sites and creative parks and enjoy the local yummy Chinese food and so on.

After the campaign, we will contact you and make adjustment to the study tour arrangement. Before contribution, you can contact us about the details.

****With contribution of $850, you will have to get ready for a Chinese learning course of 80 hours, on-line, one-to-one teaching. The courses will be at elementary and intermediate level. The hours can be shared with friends and families or be given as gifts to friends, kids in need. That’s to say they are TRANSFERABLE. Due to time difference between China and your local place, the learning time can be booked and adjusted according to learners’ need. We insist on “LEARN FROM DOING”. Situation-based teaching, oral practice, teaching cards, we will use many tools and methods to teach you Chinese and how to learn it. Let’s enjoy the fun in learning and using Chinese.

* * * * * With contribution of $1,500, you will have to get ready for a Chinese learning course of 160 hours, on-line, one-to-one teaching. The courses will be at elementary and intermediate level. The hours can be shared with friends and families or be given as gifts to friends, kids in need. That’s to say they are TRANSFERABLE. Due to time difference between China and your local place, the learning time can be booked and adjusted according to learners’ need.

If you are not sure to get started with a course for such long time, choose the $35 perk to experience first.

****** $9500    Early-bird chance

Besides of the perks above, you can first enjoy life-time purchasing service. Meanwhile, we will assist you on your trip in China, business tip, or any business activities. We strongly suggest you contact us first before contributing for this perk. You will find the absolute value for the contribution.

Your worries, we know!

With fixed funding, once we reach our goal with your help, we will be able to keep all donations and put them toward the project. Funny Guide will honnor all perks. If unfortunately we fail, all money will be returned to you guys.

We know your worries. Welcome to experience first on our Facebook (vivfeng@yahoo.com.hk). If you have any ideas with it, welcome anytime to talk with us. Hey guys! Be our guys!

Our service will be available and the service period will be counted from the 1st of the next month after this funding project is done

We are looking for you!

To be Funny Guide’s PARTNERS

No matter individuals or companies can join us to be a partner to promote our Facebook, to market our services under this crowd funding project. Any ideas or suggestions, welcome to share with us! We are also inviting friends to help us maintain our Facebook and the page.

Concerning the future plan of our studio, we are also planning to develop on-line oral English teaching. Please contact us to have more ideas.

Once we get your requirement of the goods, we will translate them into Chinese and search on the shopping websites and wholesale markets, and then inquire, and buy. This service can be experienced on our Facebook already. GO! GO! GO!What we need & what you getWith $20,000 as our goal this time, all money from the perks will go towards “studio development”. We deeply understand the most essential things for our studio are our team (the funny guys) and the tools and facilities we can use (electric facilities, computers, etc). If we can meet our goal with your help, the fund will go towards mainly two parts.About 35% will be used to buy computers (about 3 to 4 pcs), electric facilities (webcams, speakers, microphones, etc.) and office appliances. The other 65% will enable us to get a space for Funny Guide studio, to pay other team members and maintain our studio.If you have any computers or electric facilities no longer needed, as long as the usage period is within 3 years and they can function well, please contact us to contribute to building our studio. We will really feel grateful and we would give you one of our perks as thanks according to the value of your contribution. On all accounts, any of your contribution will be spurs for Funny Guide to grow.In exchange, we've got some fantastic perks in return for helping us out. For the first 1000 contributors, you will enjoy a 5% discount in your subsequent buying of our service after the first service period ends.* At $5, $10 and $18 level, you can enjoy free viewing of all information posted on our Facebook for correspondingly THREE months, SIX months and ONE year. If you also want to buy the products posted on our Facebook under these 3 perks, NO problem! Just pay us 10% of the trade amount as commission and enjoy this service.* * If you jump to $50, $100 and $180, apart from free viewing at corresponding period, you can also enjoy unlimited purchasing service.*** At $850 level, you enjoy a study tour. The primary part of this study tour is that you can learn Chinese in a very good atmosphere. This is exactly the same with our teaching principle “Learn from doing”. We supply board and accommodation for free for 10 days. During the tour, you can experience the local culture and customs; visit the historical sites and creative parks and enjoy the local yummy Chinese food and so on.After the campaign, we will contact you and make adjustment to the study tour arrangement. Before contribution, you can contact us about the details.****With contribution of $850, you will have to get ready for a Chinese learning course of 80 hours, on-line, one-to-one teaching. The courses will be at elementary and intermediate level. The hours can be shared with friends and families or be given as gifts to friends, kids in need. That’s to say they are TRANSFERABLE. Due to time difference between China and your local place, the learning time can be booked and adjusted according to learners’ need. We insist on “LEARN FROM DOING”. Situation-based teaching, oral practice, teaching cards, we will use many tools and methods to teach you Chinese and how to learn it. Let’s enjoy the fun in learning and using Chinese.* * * * * With contribution of $1,500, you will have to get ready for a Chinese learning course of 160 hours, on-line, one-to-one teaching. The courses will be at elementary and intermediate level. The hours can be shared with friends and families or be given as gifts to friends, kids in need. That’s to say they are TRANSFERABLE. Due to time difference between China and your local place, the learning time can be booked and adjusted according to learners’ need.If you are not sure to get started with a course for such long time, choose the $35 perk to experience first.****** $9500    Early-bird chanceBesides of the perks above, you can first enjoy life-time purchasing service. Meanwhile, we will assist you on your trip in China, business tip, or any business activities. We strongly suggest you contact us first before contributing for this perk. You will find the absolute value for the contribution.Your worries, we know!With fixed funding, once we reach our goal with your help, we will be able to keep all donations and put them toward the project. Funny Guide will honnor all perks. If unfortunately we fail, all money will be returned to you guys.We know your worries. Welcome to experience first on our Facebook (vivfeng@yahoo.com.hk). If you have any ideas with it, welcome anytime to talk with us. Hey guys! Be our guys!Our service will be available and the service period will be counted from the 1st of the next month after this funding project is doneWe are looking for you!To be Funny Guide’s PARTNERS
No matter individuals or companies can join us to be a partner to promote our Facebook, to market our services under this crowd funding project. Any ideas or suggestions, welcome to share with us! We are also inviting friends to help us maintain our Facebook and the page.Concerning the future plan of our studio, we are also planning to develop on-line oral English teaching. Please contact us to have more ideas.

story:
​

 

Let's accept the fact that keeping the earphones/USB cables tangle free is always an inextricable problem and we all struggle everyday to keep them tangle free. The task of untangling could be very exhausting and frustrating if you have to do this multiple times a day and it always takes ages to unravel them.

 

  

 

 

Rewinders saves time and effort in untangling the earphones/USB cables.

 

Rewinders will save your cords from getting damaged.

 

Rewinders will keep you productive and organized.

 

Rewinders can be used as an accessory.

 

 

 

How the product is developed and what is it made from?

Products are made out of top grain vegetable tan leather. All the pieces are handcrafted and for locking we are using metal snap button which not only gives a  beautiful look to the product but also gives a satisfactory click every time you open and close it. 

 

 

What are the current challenges? 

Since we have our own well-established production unit and support staff we are not worried about the deadlines in shipping the finished products but to bring the price of REWINDERS down and provide it at a reasonable/affordable rate we need to procure raw material in bulk. With your support we will buy raw materials in bulk which will bring down the overall cost of producing Rewinders. 

 

Please make some noise about our campaign and help us turn this innovative product into a success. You can also use Indiegogo share tools to get the word out.

 

We appreciate all your help and support.

 

Thank You!

Threadler

story:
Introduction about ECG/EKG Smartphone

A heart beats 100,000 times per day. Along with blood, each beat is rich with information. ECG/EKG Smartphone allows you to quickly access, track and analyze your heart's health, giving you and your doctor a proactive, clinically-proven way to care for your heart

ECG Smartphone is the world first Smartphone which supports Inbuilt capability of recording electrical and muscular functions of the heart and help in diagnosing the heart related problem at a very early stage in few minutes of time and that also with your Smartphone.

ECG  Smartphone is not only records the ECG but it also uploads the report on clouds and apply smart analytics to give you accurate diagnosis. This reports can be accessed any time any where



  1. Easy to use: It only takes 60 seconds to record your ECG.
  2. It does it all: you can take ownership of your health from your smartphone with it’s built in functions like the pedometer, pulse oximeter and calorie counter.
  3. Prevention: at it’s best. Our main goal is to ask people to take care of their heart and body before it’s too late.
  4. Real time capturing: of your ECG and evaluating the risks of a sudden cardiac arrest and afib-related stroke.


 

About Stroke and Sudden Cardiac Arrest

  • According to WHO (World Health Organization) 15 million people suffer from a stroke wolrdwide each year.
  • Out of them 5 million die and other 5 million becomes permanently disabled.
  • CVD (Cardiovascular Disease, a class of diseases that involve the heart or blood vessels) is the leading cause of global mortality, accounting for almost 17 million deaths annually (30 % of all global mortality).
  • 40-50 % of these are Sudden Cardiac Death (SCD) and 80 % of these are Ventricular Fibrillation/Tachycardia (VF/VT)

How ECG gets Recorded

Electrocardiogram can gets recorded only in few minutes with the help fingers  touch steel touch point present on the bar of the Smartphone 

How ECG Smartphone Provides Reports

Electrocardiogram which is recorded with help of ECG Smartphone gets uploaded into the cloud after which there is big data which gets generated and with the help of advance algorithms analytics is applied and reports gets reflected into the ECG application which gives details analysis and reports

Importance of ECG Smartphone In Day to Day Life

People with family history of heart disease ,smoking habits ,overweight, have diabetes, high cholesterol or high blood pressure, by growing age  have the maximum possibilities for the hearth disease. ECG Smartphone can help the people to monitor the Cardiac event regularly anytime and anywhere

Cardiac events can occur irregularly and not during the doctor's office. or pathology. By the help of ECG Smartphone ECG monitoring, the condition can be captured and saved on Cloud for future reference 

Who is For ECG Smartphone

For Working Persons

Stressful days, working late and having less and less time. ECG Smartphone only takes a minute to take care of your health and it tells you if there is something you should deal with now

For Athletes


Just going forward, keep getting better and better and no time for stopping or letting loose. You can use ECG Smartphone any-time, anywhere to make sure, that your heart keeps up with you.

Health Concious Persons

ECG Smartphone shows us that we did enough for our body at the end of each day. Tracking how many calories you burn and how many steps you take has never been so easy.

For Seniors

As we grow older so do the risks of Heart Diseases. With ECG Smartphone it's easy for anybody to check if everything is fine.

For Persons Who Want to take-care of Elderly 

Taking care of our elderly even if we can't be with them. With a built-in option to share it's easy to see our parents’ recordings from afar.

For Caring Mothers
 

Knowing that we can take care of our children for a long time still. Because ECG Smartphone helps us to prevent serious Heart Diseases.

Advance Feature of ECG Smartphone

ECG Smartphone is not only a ECG Machine but it is inbuilt with many other exciting feature which can monitor your health along with all the advance feature of Smartphone which is currently present in the Global Market

ECG Smartphone Big Front Screen


ECG Smartphone Capable of Video Call and FHD Video Recodring


ECG Smartphone Comes with Advance SOS Key Feature which helps in providing the precise location in emergency


ECG Smartphone has Inbuilt 3 GB RAM For Fast Processing and 32 GB Internal Memory  


ECG Smartphone Comes with Real Time Pedometer

  
ECG Smartphone with Many Other Advance Feature



Technical Specification

Platform
Operating system  Android 5.1
Processor
CPU MT6735 1.3GHz
RF Specification 
Mode  GSM/WCDMA/TD-SCDMA/TDD/FDD/LTE
SIM card slot  Dual SIM
SIM Band (Cellular)  FDD：B1+B2+B3+B4+B5+B7+B17+B20
TDD：B39+B40
WCDMA：B1+B2+B5+B8
TD-SCDMA：B34+B39
GSM：B2+B3+B5+B8 
Display resolution  HD(1280*720)
Display technology  IPS
Display touch screen YES
Camera
Front Camera Yes 5 MP
Rear Camera Yes 13 MP
Storage
RAM  3GB
Extended Storage  Yes upto 128GB
Internal Memory  32GB
Bluetooth 
Bluetooth revision  4.0
Bluetooth power class  Class 2
Support profile GAP,GEOP,SPP,HFP,HSP,A2DPP,AVRCP
FM Radio Yes
WLAN
WLAN revision  IEEE 802.11b/g/n
Wi-fi Router Yes
GPS
AGPS  Yes
GPS Yes
Sensor
G-Sensor Yes
Light sensor Yes
Proximity sensor Yes
Battery
Battery technology Polymer battery
Battery capacity  2500mAh
Standby time 300h
Charging time  <5 hours
Audio/Video
Playback Support AMR,MIDI,MP3,AAC,MPEG4,H.263,H.264
3D Yes
Recorder Support MPEG4
Personal assistant
Calendar Yes
Alarm Yes
File Management Yes
Messaging
SMS Yes
MMS Yes

About Our Project

The ECG Smartphone is an exclusive production run, available  through Indiegogo. All of the funding we receive goes directly towards producing the device for expected delivery in October 2016.

A lot of people around the world have collaborated to get us this far. We have a beautiful prototype ECG Smartphone handset, we have experienced  manufacturing partners in place, and we have incredibly talented and passionate people to put it all together.

All we need is you

Risk and Challenges 

 

Although our core business is to develop Innovated products which will help the people to keep their life healthy, we know the phone and medical device industry pretty well too. We’ve been working with manufacturers , so everything we need is already in place. We also have a team based in china where the bulk of the production will occur; and we have engineers in China and India who have built this kind of product before. We’re well prepared for the journey ahead.

Finally, the very nature of this concept device means the exact component list is fluid until we enter production to ensure we’re picking the best available part at the time.

Project Plan Schedule



FQA

What all Certification for this Device ?

As we are going to Sell this product worldwide So all the necessary Certification are applied and we will be getting by April  also as FDA Clearance in September 

IS this only Records ECG ?

No ECG Smartphone is not just recording the ECG but we  have developed an application which does the smart analysis of your ECG reports. This application is developed with very complex algorithm which helps to provide accurate reports of your ECG Smartphone.  In this application you all gets the facility to stores all lab test reports which get stores into our cloud server and  can access from any where any time. 

What Countries and Mobile Network will support the ECG Smartphone ?

ECG Smartphone is Dual SIM open device, not locked to any particular network. It works in all countries that provide GSM/3G/LTE-based network services. It will also support the two LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity around the world (subject to network availability and data fees). Before launch we will conduct interoperability testing with networks in Europe, the US, South America, China, India, the Middle East and Africa. This is a normal step in the process of developing a mobile device.

Will the phone receive updates after launch?

Yes  ECG Smartphone will received OS in an update shortly after launch. The OS will also receive daily developer images and frequent stable releases. 

What warranties apply to the ECG Smartphone?

A standard manufacturer warranty will apply. If you are not happy with the product, you may return it within 28 days of receiving it for a full refund. Please note, Shipcells Technologies Pvt Ltd can not cover the cost of the return postage and packaging.

What if my question isn’t answered here?

We’re happy to respond to any other queries you might have about the ECG Smartphone, the Indiegogo campaign, and our company as a whole. Email us at indiegogo@shipcellstechnologies.com

story:
Why?

This is probably the question in your mind right now.

Because I'm a young designer and want to produce more and better works. The thing is that my current laptop is quite old and sometimes I'm wondering how is it even supporting the programs that I put on it.


Really?

Totally. Yes, it may sound strange, but that's the truth. I've collected some money on my own for the past 2 years, but with the pace I'm moving there will be two more years to wait for the MacBook. 
All this without counting my upcoming prom (may 2016) and also university.


So, yeah...

It's strange, really strange, quite unordinary and I hope it will be successful.


If I can't donate to your idea, is there something else I could do?

Yes, there is! Share it. Share it with friends, share it on social media, and hopefully the people that can help me will see it. Thanks in advance.

Thank you for your time and suport.

Greetings from Bulgaria,

Emil





Wow, you scrolled all the way to here, you deserve an award.

Click this link to see a secret perk.

story:
"TIME 2" is tripod & mount for phones, tablet, gopro and camera.

"Time 2" just likes a little robot can provide more than 30 different ways to hold your camera, smart phone, gopro and tablet. We want to bring more fun to our users. Just set your device with "Time 2" and watch the show.  

One "TIME 2" has 59 spare parts, and takes 262 production process to make it happen.

We want to bring more convinient ways helping you to hold the phone. 

                     

                     

                      

We focus on every detail

                 


Take "Time 2" with you and go travel anywhere you want

               





FAQ

Does this work well with camera,smartphone and tablet?

Yes. 
How big is the "Time 2"？
The size is 3.6 inch. You can just put it in the pocket.

How big size phone it can go with ?

For the phone is 7 inch.

What is your contact info?

Our email is ty@time2selfie.com

story:
Introduction

I am Hani Fardoun, an aerospace engineer and an entrepreneur with a deep passion for hardware and software. I was born in Madrid, Spain by Lebanese parents. I speak English, French, Arabic, Spanish, Russian and some Chinese (to survive in Shenzhen). I love challenging myself and the feasibility of my ambitious dreams, for this reason, I pushed myself to go and live in China and build my own smartphone idea in the world´s largest electronic market. 

I went to Shenzhen with the idea of building a smartphone with a dual-screen. I couldn't afford to hire engineers or design agencies so I had to learn how to do everything by myself.  Here is what I did...

1. Research & Purchasing Components

 

 

2. Factory

 

 

3. Designing

 

 

4. Printing

 

 

5. Assembly

 

6. Turning it on

 

I am creating this campaign in order to get your support in building the Uperscope smartphone. Your support will help us bring an innovative product to the market with a new market niche! Any support from you even your opinion would mean the world to us!

What We Need & What You Get

The cost of making one Uperscope smartphone is €650 and the market price will be €1100.  The price on Indiegogo will be €700 + Delivery cost. 

​

If for any unforeseen circumstances the project is suspended or fails. The entire amount will be returned to you.  

The Impact

The Uperscope will completely reinvent the way smartphones are made and the expectations of the camera capabilities will exponentially increase. Today stabilizers are heavy, uncomfortable to carry and expensive. Many bloggers, video makers, and influencers use their smartphone cameras while walking and the camera quality on all other devices is UNSTABLE.

Uperscope is the first smartphone with an IN-BUILT stabilizer that detects vibrations and stabilizes the motion using a 3D axis Gimball system. 

Risks & Challenges

While we were doing the market research we came across many individuals that told us: "Building a smartphone is IMPOSSIBLE just go and build a gadget". Against all odds, we made our first prototype the "Uperscope Dual" but the smartphone failed because of the sensitivity of the screens on both sides. 

The challenge this time is to prove that the stabilizer concept CAN BE DONE and can withstand stresses, bumps, water, dust, falling etc...  

The only risk is failing to deliver the product on time due to production delays and this risk can be eliminated by offering special extra perks in case of a delay. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people can't contribute financially to this project but that doesn't mean they can't help:

You can support us by getting the word out and make some noise about our campaign. By sharing the link to our Indiegogo campaign with your friends and colleagues. 

You can simply use the Indiegogo share tools! Thank you so much for all the support.
story_txt: IntroductionI am Hani Fardoun, an aerospace engineer and an entrepreneur with a deep passion for hardware and software. I was born in Madrid, Spain by Lebanese parents. I speak English, French, Arabic, Spanish, Russian and some Chinese (to survive in Shenzhen). I love challenging myself and the feasibility of my ambitious dreams, for this reason, I pushed myself to go and live in China and build my own smartphone idea in the world´s largest electronic market. I went to Shenzhen with the idea of building a smartphone with a dual-screen. I couldn't afford to hire engineers or design agencies so I had to learn how to do everything by myself.  Here is what I did...1. Research & Purchasing Components  2. Factory  3. Designing  4. Printing  5. Assembly 6. Turning it on I am creating this campaign in order to get your support in building the Uperscope smartphone. Your support will help us bring an innovative product to the market with a new market niche! Any support from you even your opinion would mean the world to us!What We Need & What You GetThe cost of making one Uperscope smartphone is €650 and the market price will be €1100.  The price on Indiegogo will be €700 + Delivery cost.  ​If for any unforeseen circumstances the project is suspended or fails. story:
Customizable Leather Juul Skins

Add color to your Juul and make it your own

 

 

Having made thousands of exotic leather goods over the last few years, we are ready to begin producing this colorful collection of juul skins. We have all of the raw materials ready to dye, cut, and sew. Order today for A FAST turnaround time! All orders are expected to ship within 3-4 weeks of funding.

story:
WHAT'S THE POINT?

Aside from being a really cool idea, the most exciting thing about the LVX bag is the fact that it combines fashion and technology to create a new breed of accessory that does more. It features a dedicated wireless charging pocket which means that using it is as easy as placing your phone into the bag. It really is that simple and most smartphones are already capable of changing wirelessly so there's nothing more to buy.

WHAT IS MY CONTRIBUTION GOING TOWARD?

Contributions received during this campaign will be used to cover the first production run of the LVX bag. Any additional funds go right back into the project, towards future production and the development of similar products.

The long-term goal is to start here and ultimately end with a wide selection of similar products. This bag may not be for everyone, but if you think it's time we evolved past wired charging, having to keep up with where you left that portable power pack or plugging into an outlet for just enough time to keep your phone alive then this is the start of something wonderful.

ARE THERE ANY RISKS INVOLVED?

With the project at the point of being ready for production, there's not really a whole lot left that can go wrong. There is still always a possibility so if any unforeseen issue were to come up at any time in the future, contributors who do not receive their perks will be issued a full refund.

HOW ELSE CAN I HELP?

Outside of getting a LVX bag or picking up a perk, one of the most important things you can do to help out is to share this campaign. Blogs, social media shares, news or magazine articles-anything to spread the word about this exciting opportunity is greatly appreciated. Seriously.

story:
Professionally engineered, SmartPID Controller is a high-tech product that facilitates temperature and process control. It comes programmed with a ton of functions and features that have otherwise been overlooked by the “thermostat” industry.  

Because SmartPID Controller can control any thermos-regultated process, heating or cooling, it is the only controller of its kind that you need in your name. Throw out your old, clunky thermostat: the time for an upgrade is right now. You can also use SmartPID Controller to control any applications in your home, both locally and remotely. 

Flexible and powerful, this is a device that can be adapted to any number of situation. 

It is compatible with the Arduino ecosystem as well.

Compared to your basic on/off thermostat, SmartPID is a piece of futuristic wonder. This controller can collect temperature from multiple sensors, apply a custom and programmable control logic, and drive different loads (heater, cooler, valve, fan, etc.) with a precise algorithm. 

It is easy to replace your thermostat and use SmartPID to integrate full process control, data logs, and remote management.

SmartPID Controller is going to be a must-have device for do-it-yourself enthusiasts, technology geeks, and consumers who want something affordable that is also ultra-functional.

With SmartPID process automation, everything from homebrewing to wine making to aquarium maintenance to oven temperature is made more precise, more powerful, and more flexible.

In one word make your temperature process control SMART

SmartPID is neither a simple controller nor a themostat: it is an “open platform” in which the resources and I/O can be used for a variety of applications and in a variety of environments. The idea behind SmartPID is to develop an ecosystem of “vertical” applications on top of a common set of features, providing tools for people who would like to develop their own applications or hack existing ones.

Smart Thermostat is the modern standard for any thermal regulated process. It can be used and adapted anywhere a PID control is needed or used to perform a retrofit of a simple thermostat with something more advanced. A typical example would be a fermentation chamber.

This smart homebrewing app is a vertical application that is dedicated to brewing process automation from mashing to boiling, from the addition of hops to whirlpool and cooling, including recipe management.

The video show you SmartPID integration in a commercial pot to build and single vessel all in one automated brewing system

 

 

With your support, we will expand the number of vertical applications on top of the SmartPID platform.

Other applications that are feasible right now include:

  • BBQ temperature controller  
  • Coffer Roaster automation  
  • Food dehydrator control
  • Pot still control

All applications benefit from a full set of common features that are the baseline to developing smart applications.

One of the unique smart features of the SmartPID Controller is its capability to store process log data and then make that data available either locally via USB interface or remotely via the cloud. 

You can easily access your data from the web on a desktop, smartphone, or tablet, which is perfect in case of critical situations that involve alarms and triggers. 

Plus, if your fridge goes into a block stage or your food dehydrator finishes its process, you can set up SmartPID to let you know.

One of the unique and SMART features of the SmartPID controller is the capability to store all process log data and make it available either locally via USB interface or with the cloud.

Among many different possible IoT solutions for SmartPID in this phase is the Thingspeak service. 

Thingspeak is based on a number of useful features that make it easy to use and integrate the SmartPID project.

  • Real-time data collection and storage of process data generated by SmartPID    
  • Simple and effective data visualization in both private and public channels  
  • MATLAB® for data analysis and manipulation    
  • Alerts and triggers for integration with other services    
  • Scheduling    
  • Open API

The relevant code is available on github, and in the future, a dedicated cloud service will be provided (see stretch goal section).

 SmartPID is 100% compatible with the Arduino echo system: you can plug in your PC via USB and program through the Arduino IDE.   

The key benefits of this design choice are

  • SAMD21 processor-based (like Zero or MKR1000)   
  • Dedicated USB bootloader and board definition   
  • Fully programmable via Arduino IDE   
  • Full set of support libraries available

smartPID has been designed by a maker for the maker community

We have developed a mobile app prototype for Android in order to retrieve data from the cloud server and in turn visualize that data on a smartphone.  

SmartPID pushes log data to a remote server so that the mobile app can retrieve it in a secure and encrypted way.

The smart app allows you to do the following:  

  • Login and authenticate user login on the server in order to access it in a secure way  
  • Display and visualize data via a dashboard so that the user can select a specific controller and data (filtered by date/time) and display the data in a graphic or tabular way  
  • Configure the device (this part is still under development)

You can configure all the unit parameters (HW set up, process parameter) via a web interface or mobile app and upload your configuration options on the device. Configuration options can then be stored on the server and used at any time. 

You can also set a temperature threshold and get notifications by local alarm, email, or Twitter.

developing application for both android and IOS and set up all the server infrastructure is complex and requires lot of investment, this is one of the part in scope od the crowdfunding campaing

SmartPID is a masterpiece of engineering. We have done our best to incorporate a ton of advanced features into a single compact box. Below you will find a table with all technical characteristic

SmartPID is powered by SAMD21 32-bit ARM® Cortex®-M0+ by Atmel

This is a simple example of how you can integrate your SmartPID Controller in a typical brewing system with two vessels (mash tun + HLT).

The dual-channel controller makes it possible for you to read temperature from two probes (either DS18B20 or NTC) and drive two SSRs for the heating element control and process automation The 110/220V AC pump is controlled by relay.

The smart homebrewing applications do the rest. Just select a recipe and leave SmartPID Controller to work. 

n this example, you can use the smart thermostat application to build a thermostatic fermentation chamber controlling a fridge motor and heating elements via relay.

Your beer fermentation will run to perfection regardless of the season.

This is due to thermostatic control.

These are a few examples of prototypes made by hacking a commercial product.

This is a prototype of a single vessel all-in-one brewing system in which SmartPID drives the heating element and a 12V pump.

This Kitchen oven has been hacked to build a re-flow oven for SMD component soldering SamrtPID automated temperature ramps and time.

This food dehydrator is hacked with SmartPID Controller, which takes over the heating element and fan speed in order to manage temperature profile for perfect drying.

this are just of the few examples of applications where you can use SmartPID but with your support and pledge we can continue development and grow the number of applications

Let us go over a little project history...

This smart controller design comes from my long-time passions for homebrewing, technology, and engineering. In the course of my brewing “career,” I have found that enthusiasm for DIY is common. Leveraging my engineering skills, I put together several prototypes of a small-scale brewery, eventually expanding into something advanced and professional.

Going pro in HW startup is complex, building hardware is hard, and mass production is demanding.   

The steps from a fully functional prototype to mass production are critical and expensive, which is why I have come to you for help. 

Rewards usage breakdown  

This project is in an advanced phase. To this point, all design work, software development, and engineering has been self-funded, but I need community support to get to the finish line and go live with SmartPID

  • DFM (design for manufacturing). With the help of a professional engineer, I'm reviewing all design work in order to verify product engineering in such a way that the product is easy to manufacture. The DFM phase will focus on cost optimization and potential problems going forward.
  • Certification. I started the certification process (CE marking and FCC), and I have engaged certified laboratory tests to perform test sessions and verify compliance according to international security standards (ECM and LVD)
  • BoM optimization and component sourcing. I'm working to find the best PCB and component supplier with a good quality-to-cost ratio
  • Tooling and mass production setup. Setting up PCB production, assembling process, case print, and front panel digital printing will require some investment.
  • Fulfillment. In order to provide a great delivery service, I'm working with a small distribution chain to arrange all the parcel shipments and management.

I will use part of your pledge to go through these steps, but in order to go live, we must first and foremost fulfill the minimum number of orders as set by the manufacturer.   

Electronic device production entails significant economies of scale, making products such as this one particularly tricky to execute. Plus, because I'm fully committed to keeping the price point accessible to the DIY and maker community, your support as we raise this start-up capital is essential.

 Below a rough breakdown of the reward usage

 

You may be asking yourself right now “What is in the box?” Each perk that includes one or more SmartPID Controllers will also include the following:  

1) A controller box with pre-loaded and tested software. For a few perks, you will need to decide in advance what type of software you want: smart thermostat app or smart brewing app  

2) Downloadable smartphone app for Android (iOS app is under development). With this app, you can connect to the Thingspeak server, retrieve and visualize log data, and configure Wifi and your Thingspeak server parameters. (Note: you need to register for the free Thingspeak service. A valid account is required to define a proper Thingspeak channel. I'm not accountable for Thingspeak SLA and the quality of their free service.  

3) Full set of downloadable manuals (installation manual, configuration manual, and application manual

 

When I set out to design SmatPID, I was trying to incorporate functionalities that are actually not present in low-cost thermostat and that are more typical in professional control devices (PLC) while also keeping it simple and affordable, something that the DIY and maker community would appreciate.    

After going through the first prototypes, I realized the potential of this smart platform, especially as the cloud integration and process data log is perfect for smart applications in the IoT and data analytics area.  

Because complex skills in web service application, system integrations, and cloud service are required to do everything that I want to do with SmartPID, I have decided to postpone development and set some stretch goals

  • Private cloud server development and migration from Thingspeak. SmartPID remote data log and visualizaion is based on the Thingspeak service, which is powerful and free. Moving to a private server would remove certain constrains (e.g. traffic throttling) and open up new development possibilities.

 

  • Remote configuration and setup. SmartPID can be entirely programmed locally by easy menu structure and front panel display and buttons. Moving this level of configurations to a remote device (smartphone, web..) could simplify the user experience. Money will be used to develop web application and smartphone application

risk and challenge

Because this project involves hardware and software development, there is a lot of risk involved.

1) Hardware risks  
I'm making something physical. Engineering or manufacturing problems can occur. These problems may be harder to fix than software bugs, and more time may be required to execute a new production cycle. I have worked (and continue to work) very hard to design with manufacturing in mind alongside professional engineers who are reviewing all design aspects. 
A pre-propduction small batch is planned before mass production. The first unit produced will be part of a beta test and user-friendly trial to collect feedback from field integration. Additionally, I have selected a local Italian manufacturing partner with 30 years of experience in PCB assembling.

2) Software risks  
Application software has been tested on several prototypes. A complete simulation application environment running on a desktop PC has been specifically developed. In case of residual bugs, the user can easily upgrade with a new release. A simple and straightforward software update procedure has been developed. The smartphone app can be updated via the Google Play Store. 
Once the software test is completed for each application, I plan to make a beta-test and user-friendly trial with experienced users.

3) Component sourcing risk  
Most components are easy to source, but a couple of components are more critical and rarer, which could cause a potential delay in assembling. I checked component availability before the start of our campaign, but because this is a brand new product, it’s impossible to secure component stocks before the campaign ends and we know the production volume.

Once we decide to move forward with production, some electronic components may be out of stock, causing up to 6 months of lead time. We shall secure key components supply as soon as possible, but there is always a risk involved with large volume component supply.

4) Certification risk  
The product will go through a complete certification assessment program that includes compliance with international standard regulations performed by a certified laboratory. 
We are confident that we have been careful and effective in the design phase, but only lab tests can prove that. A pre-compliance test will be run during the campaign, and if there is a negative result, the project can be delayed according to the severity of the problem.

5) Fulfillment risk  
Shipping something physical worldwide is complex. Our logistics partner (MBE etc.) is highly experienced, and the warehouse is very close to the manufacturing center in order to reduce lead time. I'm going to set up a logistics platform or use some established service to manage reward deployment smoothly.

Some risks are also inherent to local custom duty regulation and taxation. I will ship rewards with all international document, but it is impossible to predict how local customers will react.

Together we can make SmartPID a reality. Your contributions are greatly appreciated. Thank you for your support.

A complete simulation application environment running on a desktop PC has been specifically developed. In case of residual bugs, the user can easily upgrade with a new release. A simple and straightforward software update procedure has been developed. The smartphone app can be updated via the Google Play Store. Once the software test is completed for each application, I plan to make a beta-test and user-friendly trial with experienced users.3) Component sourcing risk  Most components are easy to source, but a couple of components are more critical and rarer, which could cause a potential delay in assembling. I checked component availability before the start of our campaign, but because this is a brand new product, it’s impossible to secure component stocks before the campaign ends and we know the production volume.Once we decide to move forward with production, some electronic components may be out of stock, causing up to 6 months of lead time. We shall secure key components supply as soon as possible, but there is always a risk involved with large volume component supply.4) Certification risk  The product will go through a complete certification assessment program that includes compliance with international standard regulations performed by a certified laboratory. We are confident that we have been careful and effective in the design phase, but only lab tests can prove that. A pre-compliance test will be run during the campaign, and if there is a negative result, the project can be delayed according to the severity of the problem.5) Fulfillment risk  Shipping something physical worldwide is complex. Our logistics partner (MBE etc.) is highly experienced, and the warehouse is very close to the manufacturing center in order to reduce lead time. I'm going to set up a logistics platform or use some established service to manage reward deployment smoothly.Some risks are also inherent to local custom duty regulation and taxation. I will ship rewards with all international document, but it is impossible to predict how local customers will react.Together we can make SmartPID a reality. Your contributions are greatly appreciated. Thank you for your support.

story:
The Stick Tab has been designed to fit any brand of tablet. The special shape of the handle allows you to hold your tablet in the most ergonomic way for comfort in any position.

The ergonomic shape of the Stick Tab allows you to be in the perfect position for holding your tablet while:

Relaxing in bed

In the garden

At the office

At the kitchen counter or when needing your hands for doing something else

 

 

STICKY PAD

 

What makes the Stick Tab stand out is its support pad which allows it to stick to any device. This revolutionary material is always sticky and leaves no residue on the device it sticks to. And compared to other tablet holders on the market, there's nothing to fix to your tablet.

Just push the sticky pad against the back side of your tablet and you're good to go! Removing it is just as easy. Just hold your tablet or e-reader and gently pull-off the Stick Tab using one of the two curved-shape grips.

A special plastic film is also provided for protecting the sticky pad from dust while not using it. If you're wondering if the pad will stick after months of use, don't worry.  Wash it with water and a drop of liquid soap, let it dry and this very special substance will instantly regain its original stickiness. It's that easy!

IN YOUR HAND OR USE TABLETOP STAND

      

No need for another stand for the tabletop.

The Stick Tab is so versatile, use it for all your tabletop needs; on a desk or a table for your morning news while having breakfast, reading an electronic book, checking emails or surfing the net, or even on your kitchen counter checking your favorite recipes.

Just untighten the ring underneath the support pad, set it to the angle you want and tighten it back so it remains in your desired position. All of that in a matter of a few seconds.

Wondering if your tablet will slide back when using the touchscreen? We got you covered. We've added an anti-slip ring on the bottom of the Stick Tab so you can enter whatever you want on the screen without having to hold your tablet with your other hand. It will stay there and not move back.

RECHARGEABLE AND REMOVABLE OPTIONAL POWER BANK     

We've used the space inside the handle to fit an optional USB Power Bank. This is not a standard USB charger.

Most tablets require a minimum input current for triggering the recharging function. That's why people have a hard time recharging their tablet using something other than the USB wall charger they got with their device.

We've designed our charger to provide a full 1.5 Amp output so it can recharge tablets and e-readers, but also any other USB compatible devices like phones, cameras, GPS, and video cameras. 

We wanted to stress versatility and performance!

Being small and powerful has the advantage of allowing you to carry the battery with you inside the Stick Tab handle.  Always be ready for any charging emergency!

And you don't have a cable to purchase! Just use the one that came with your device and we provide the cable needed for recharging the USB Power Bank which connects to your wall charger that came with your tablet, e-reader or other USB compatible device.

Optional removable USB charger inside the handle has been designed to meet specs that can recharge high demanding iPads as well as any other tablet or USB compatible device.

FOLDABLE AND EASY TO CARRY

Being such a great companion, we've made it so you can carry it with you wherever you go.

We've designed the tightening ring for ease of folding and storing in your purse, brief case, luggage or even in your inside coat pocket.

 

- Universal Tablet Holder

- Charge on the go!

- Comfortable

- Ergonomic

- In Hand or As a Stand Alone

- Affordable

- Optional USB Charger that fits in the handle

 

 

We started around the house

We wrapped everything together to get a basic concept

Next we tried making a prototype out of spare parts and the Stick Tab was taking shape

After hiring an engineer to create CAD spec drawings we printed a 3D version of Stick Tab          and knew we were onto something

Next we sent all our specs, designs and homemade samples to a factory where we finally        had our first functioning Stick Tab

After loads of testing, focus group analysis and product improvements, including adding an optional rechargeable power bank inside the handle, we had our final production ready prototype.

Time to share our fun new tablet buddy with the world!

 

 

Tablets are used for more and more tasks like browsing the internet, checking our Facebook account, reading and sending emails, ebooks, watching movies, storing recipes, playing games and loads of other things.

After months of discomfort while using our tablet and having no solution to the problem of comfortably holding it in our hands as well as on a tabletop, we decided to develop a product addressing both issues.

We designed a tablet holder that fits with current or future brands of any size tablets or readers. The Stick Tab is the Coolest Tablet Holder on the market today. It even has a removable USB power bank that sits in the handle which can recharge any tablet as well as any other USB compatible devices.

It gives you total comfort no matter what position you're using it, since the support pad can be adjusted to any viewing angle. Use it on any tabletop, desk or kitchen counter for reading your morning newspaper, typing freely on a wireless keyboard or having a look at your recipes while cooking.

We solved our problem and then noticed that lots of other tablet users were having the exact same concerns. That's why we created the Stick Tab and brought the Coolest Tablet Holder to the market.

Coming from an engineering and design background, we understand the product development process and how to deal with problems that may occur in any stage. We made our business plan perfectly.

Designing, prototyping, and testing were finished after many Stick Tab iterations. We located experienced suppliers and vendors to work with and have a solid supply chain.

However, developing an innovative product always carries risks in the production stage that might not be foreseeable. These can create delays and extra costs. That’s why, from the very beginning, we tested and tested the Stick Tab with users to eliminate as many risks as possible.

We worked hard and our purpose is to not only deliver the Stick Tab on time to our Indiegogo backers, but also to deliver it with the highest possible quality.

We believe in transparency and promise to always keep you updated in the process and try to answer all your questions in a timely manner.

story:
Short Summary

  • You must know people who live alone
  • Do they feel secure and safe?
  • This solution might help them and you!

This is how it will work:

The app creates a ring of people. It is the upgrade of a telephone circle, with more options.

  • On fixed moments of the day all persons of a circle must give a response
  • The signal is like a traffic light

  1. Green = Okay
  2. Yellow = Okay, but some contact is welcome
  3. Red = Alert
  4. No response = Alert.

  • When an alert is received, the others in the circle must respond by checking how the person is doing
  • And that makes the circle closed again

We need the money to build the app and to start with the marketing.

The security and warmth of a simple daily contact


What We Need & What You Get

We need 20,000 USD for the development and the worldwide marketing of the app. As a reward for your donation we have some nice perks, like (obviously) the FriendsAlive app for free for several months, a FriendsAlive T-shirt, polo or hoody. 

The Impact

There is a lot of loneliness in the world. This is all across the world and across all ages. And although nobody wants to end up lonely, by various influences and situations this actually happens to a lot of us. In The Netherlands 25% of the people sometimes feel lonely and 10% are actually lonely. This is huge for a modern western civilisation. 

This simple and genius app might actually change the world a little bit and you can help! 

Risks & Challenges

We are very aware that the success of a new app depends on good marketing. Therefore, the crowdfunding via Indiegogo will also give us an indication of the interest there is for our FriendsAlive app and what other marketing tools we need. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!
Thank you!

story:
Developer Update #1

Developer Update #2

The Moto Z brings modular technology to a whole new level, you may be aware of some of the existing Moto mods available and the freedom that they bring. Mico takes that a step further making your smartphone, truly yours. Mico is the world's first solar charger Moto Mod!

 

Mico has a 2200mAh battery giving you 75% more power for your Moto Z with the integrated solar cell allowing it to continue to charge throughout the day. This provides vital charge, on a camping trip, whilst out on a hike, or even in an emergency. Even in everyday use Mico will keep your internal battery fuller for longer helping to offset that dreaded power cable – not to mention, solar power is FREE!

Mico can be configured by your Moto Z for your charging preferences. You can set either default mode to keep your phone at 100% charge, or efficiency mode to keep your phone at 80% battery while helping Mico to last longer.

Mico is extra modular too, with the ability to use Snap-Panels at the same time (up to 2 Snap-Panels can be used at once when attached to Mico). Just snap them into Mico’s USB Type-C input ports. The Snap-Panels allow you to double Mico’s solar charging rate when plugged in, but of course Snap-Panels are always charging up their own internal 1000mAh battery whenever light is available.

Snap-Panels are also their own stand-alone product, there is no need to own Mico or even a Moto Z smartphone to use them, simply plug into any USB Type-C compatible device and charge!

Mico Charging Times

Mico will be able to charge in approximately an hour and a half through the phone via turbo charger!

Via Solar power Mico can charge in approximately 10 hours of good sunlight. With 1 Snap-Panel Mico can charge in approximately 5 hours of good sunlight.

Specifications

Mico Moto Mod Concept

Additional Specifications

Compatibility: Moto Z, Z Force, Z Play, Z Droid

Dimensions: 152.7 x 73.5 x 7mm

 

How does it work?

  • Charge Mico up before the start of your day just as you would with your phone;
  • Dock Mico onto the back of your Moto Z like you would any other Moto Mod;
  • Select how you want Mico to keep your phone powered;
  • Let Mico do the rest!

You use Snap-Panels to keep Mico topped up if you’re a super heavy user or on an extra-long trip.

Snap-Panels for Mico and other USB Type-C Devices

The team consists of 2 electronic  and electrical engineering students (both named Ross) from the University of Strathclyde in Glasgow. The development of both Mico and Snap-Panels is still under way but the internal designs should be finalised soon.

 

Development and Manufacturing

Update (15/02/17)

Mico Prototype MK1 works! Our first working iteration of Mico is complete and fully operational. We are now carrying out testing to see what performance we can expect from Mico and areas we can improve the design. Including shrinking the size of the electronics down and fitting a bigger more efficient panel into the design.

 

We are also currently in talks with manufacturers who are helping us to ensure the highest quality materials and fabrication methods are used. Arrow Electronics are a sponsor of this campaign and will be helping with reduced prototyping costs and engineering expertise!

 

 

Press materials

Website

 

Share our project on social media to let the world know! We rely on you, the backers in order to make this product a reality! If we do not reach our goal then Mico will not get to production!

 

FAQs

What if it's not sunny?

Mico functions as a normal battery mod for Moto Z smartphones, with an internal battery of 2200mAh providing over 75% more power for a Moto Z/Droid! The thought behind the solar panel is the level of freedom it provides the user. While in everyday life it will keep the battery topped up that little bit longer (helping it to outperform some of the competition depending on lighting conditions), it is when you take the Mico into an outdoors situation such as hiking in the hills or a long day out in the summer it truly begins to shine! (No pun intended.) Even in office situations the Mico is able to charge – just leave it by the window.

Snap-Panels, while also adding another 1000mAh battery and being easily moved around can double the charging speed of your Mico! Snap-Panels provide extra freedom; the core purpose of the modular approach Moto Mods give their users!

What value do Snap-Panels bring?

The main USP for Snap-Panels is that they provide a USB Type-C solar battery bank that can be used not only in conjunction with the Mico but to charge any USB Type-C device, especially as this is quickly becoming the standard. A USB Type-C extension cable will also be included in the box.

Will it get too hot?

We are currently experimenting with insulating and cooling materials whilst carrying out our testing - so far with positive results. Although it should be noted that if it is too hot to sit in the scorching sun for hours then obviously you don't want to put any gadgets outside for long periods of time. Simply sitting Mico and/or Snap-Panels by the window in a cool building would be enough to charge it. And remember Mico is a Moto Mod so can be detached from your phone at any time, if you are worried about your phone overheating while you charge up Mico simply detach it from your device.

 

Moto Mods™ is a trademark of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC.

Our Inspiration & Motivation

Throughout the years, almost all of Soild-Works customers have asked at one time or another, "Can I open files from the latest version of Solid-Works into a previous version?" The answer has always been, "No".

Most of the manufacturing industries have upgraded to the latest version of CAD software under active subscription but the vendors can’t afford to upgrade to latest version of software each year. If the vendor wants to open the higher version file, then either vendor should work on CAD neutral file format which itself results in data loss or re-create the same CAD part in lower version manually.

As vendors are constantly trying to be competitive, this process is not a feasible option as it is time consuming, error prone and costly. Thus, AMP Data Processing tool aids in smooth transition of CAD data from later version to the older version of software. It also aids in database management functions.


AMP Data Processing Tool

It works efficiently for Part Modeling Features. The user can select the file from specific location or folder for batch processing.

The User Interface is as follows.

The program generates the *.amp file which is taken as a input by the AMP Data Processing Tool.


Advantages

1)  Downgrading of CAD Part file from SW 2016 to SW 2010.*


2)  No need for active CAD software subscription

The AMP Data Processing Tool works independent of status of SW subscription. 


3) Batch Processing.

This functionality has been provided based on the feedback received from the active users of SW. Herein, multiple number of files can be provided as an input for downgrading purpose.


Current Status

The development of the AMP Data Processing Tool is in Testing Phase for Part Modeling and we are doing a Beta Testing on number of native files. The file sizes are  in the range of 100 KB to 20 MB. The working tool will be available for SW Users by 25th December 2016.

Given the chance, and with encouragement from all our supporters, we will reach our funding goal quickly and perhaps be able to improve on this delivery date.
