story:
ZaZaRemoteControl can remotely control all IR electric appliances, including TV, STB, Projector, DVD, Audio and AC. The two IR LEDs enables it to work within the distance of 60 feet with a coverage angle of 150 degree. ZaZaRemoteControl has the capability to penetrate 2 floors to control lamps. It also supports mobile phone to control electrical appliances remotely through ZaZaRemoteControl. Please read the followings for details.

Download ZaZaRemote APP to mobile phones, scan two-dimensional code of ZaZaRemoteControl, link ZaZaRemoteControl to ZaZaRemote APP, and then all remote control functions of ZaZaRemoteControl can be used in your mobile phone right away. You can manage it all from your phone, tablet, or both. 

ZaZaRemoteControl makes a wireless control solution using 2.4G frequency technology; about 70% of lighting factories from China will use this solution after Oct 2016. ZaZaRemoteControl identifies a transmission speed of 62.5Kbits for it, so high spreading gain is achieved. It can remote control a light 300 feet away, and a light 75 feet away separated by two walls.

Working principles of 2.4G RF frequency remote control in ZaZaRemoteControl: remote control chips of lamp and box are monitoring signals; they will not act until receiving any orders. Remote control chips of ZaZaRemoteControl only send out signals after receiving orders or when users check the status of lamps. So with no signal sent out, there is no radiation pollution in idle times. With the spread spectrum technology, the radiation of ZaZaRemoteControl is much lower than mobile phone and Wi-Fi modem when its remote control works. It is safe to the human body.   

315M, 433M and 800M use carrier mode, their signal can be captured, similar to IR. So if some malicious person copies the signal, he can control electrical appliance by replaying the signal. ZaZaRemoteControl 2.4G RF frequency uses digital encryption, supports 40 frequency points, use frequency hopping anti-jamming, criminals are very difficult to interfere, also it cannot be captured to replay and the transmission is safe. The 2.4G RF wireless security system, especially suitable for housing has been completed renovation. As the alarm unit is battery powered (replaced battery per 5,000 times signal sending, about 5~8 years), so ZaZaRemoteControl can still provide security alarm when house power is off. (Maybe the thief would cut off the house power)

Accessary-----2.4G Remote bulb (ready now)

ZaZaRemoteControl has some powerful accessories such as monochromatic lamp, monochromatic adjustable brightness lamp, and 160K true color lamp. The control distance is 300 feet away or 75 feet away separated by two walls.

Accessary-----2.4G Lamp RF receiver (ready now)

ZaZaRemoteControl also has an accessory “Lamp RF receiver”; your lamps or appliances will be upgraded to remote control lamps by this box.

Accessary-----2.4G Self-Powered RF switch (ready now)

As a supplement of ZaZaRemoteControl home control system, we provide “Self-Powered RF switch”. When users press the switch, it will generate electricity and send out remote control signals. Being limited by electricity, the remote control distance is about 35 feet. So it can be placed on the bedside to control corridor lights near the bedroom. The Self-Powered RF switch is divided into two parts, chassis parts can be installed on the wall, between the chassis and the switch are two magnetic blocks, the switch can be easily removed and placed.

Accessary-----2.4G Battery-Powered RF switch (ready now) 

As a supplement of ZaZaRemoteControl home control system, we provide “Battery-Powered RF switch”, the remote control distance is about 60 feet. Both “Self-Powered RF switch” and “Battery-Powered RF switch” are supplements to home remote control system. One switch can control several bulbs and remote boxes at the same time, being convenient for users. If users want to know the status of all lamps, they can check it on their mobile phones or via ZaZaRemoteControl.

The minimum number of production of each color is 2000, so if the crowd funding is less than 200000 US$, we will delivery all with silver remote, ignore the color mark, if the crowd funding is between 200000 US$~400000 US$, we will delivery black remote as a selection, if the crowd funding is more than 600000 US$, we will provide 3 color delivery.

We estimate 45 days for crowd-funding, 10 days for funding arrival, 45 days for mass production, 10 days for testing, 5 days for delivering to warehouse, 5 days for packing and delivering to users. We will use DHL or similar high speed delivery service. The products will be delivered to users in 75 days after crowd-funding is over (We will work hard for delivery in 60 days), and we will update the information to all participants at each milestone.

FAQ

ABOUT ZAZAREMOTE

What is ZaZaRemoteControl？

ZaZaRemoteControl is a super remote control,supporting infrared (transmit and learn), 2.4G-RF, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. It can directly control all kinds of infrared appliances (user can add up to 100 remotes at same time) and enable your mobile phone to control lights through it. ZaZaRemoteControl can detect most of the smoke, gas, and magnetometer motion sensor signals, and provide an alarm to inform the users via their mobile phones.

What languages are supported by ZaZaRemoteControl?

English, French, German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, Turkish. You can select the language you want.

How much does ZaZaRemoteControl cost?

You can pre-order ZaZaRemoteControl today for $99 US$. After pre-sales are over, it will be priced at $149 plus applicable taxes and shipping

The price is very low for a super remote. why?

There is no intermediary between you and the factory, we are the designer and manufactory.

What's in the box?

1 ZaZaRemoteControl, 1 charger,1 base,1 user manual

What colors do you offer?

The minimum number of production of each color is 2000, so if the crowd funding is less than 200000 US$, we will delivery all with silver remote, ignore the color mark, if the crowd funding is between 200000 US$~400000 US$, we will delivery black remote as a selection, if the crowd funding is more than 600000 US$, we will provide 3 color delivery.

How can I get the accessory in future?

We have an e-shop on Amazon; you can find what you want there.

What kind of accessories can I expect in the near future?

The ZaZaRemoteControl use android as it’s operating system, support IR, 2.4G-RF, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, it has awesome upgrade capability, so beside all above listed accessories , you can send your new requirements to us: tianjia@tiqiaamail.com, please including “New requirement form xxx country” into the email title, thank you.

 

SHIPPING

When will ZaZaRemoteControl ship?

We’re planning to start shipping ZaZaRemoteControl to our crowdfunding supporters in Mid-Feb 2017, with all units delivered by Mid-Mar 2017. Actual ship dates may vary. The Tiqiaa Team will keep you updated of your ZaZaRemoteControl ship date.

Why do I have to wait so long?

You're helping us to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. You'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce ZaZaRemoteControl.

Where do you ship?

We plan to ship to all countries. We use major courier companies and we will ship to anywhere that they deliver. If we find that we cannot ship to your county, we will work to refund you the amount minus the credit card processing fees and Indiegogo platform fees.

Can I split a bulk order into multiple shipments?

Our system doesn't support shipping to multiple addresses at this point. Please make a second contribution if you would like to ship to multiple addresses. For all questions regarding bulk orders, please email tianjia@tiqiaamail.com and use "BULK ORDER INQUIRY" as the subject line.

Do I need to pay customs and VAT?

The import tax threshold is much higher than the value of ZaZaremote control in USA,New Zealand, Australia,Japan,S'pore and Russia.So people do not need to pay customs and VAT in these area. In other area, you need to pay customs and VAT if applicable. 

 

TECH SPECS 

What functions are available on ZaZaRemoteControl?

It supports infrared (transmit and learn), 2.4G-RF, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth

· Control all kinds of infrared appliances,including TV,STB,DVD,AC,Audio,Projector and etc.

· Enable your mobile phone to control lights through it

· Detect the smoke, gas, door magnetic and motion sensor signals, provide an alarm to inform the users via their mobile phones.

What APP should I use in order to control through ZaZaRemoteControl in my mobile phone?

Please install the APP named "ZaZaRemote" in your phone. You can search the IOS version in Apple APP store and Android version in Google play.

How about the IR code library you have?

The IR code library of ZaZaRemoteControl was uploaded by 50 million users, and was calibrated and corrected by Tiqiaa in the past 4 years, which summarized out 150K effective remotes controls. It is the largest crowd-sourcing remote control database in the world and it still keeps on growing every day.

In case of I can not find the right one in your IR code library ,how to fix it?

You can DIY it since ZaZaRemoteControl has its learning function. The learning function collects the signals one by one accurately.

Does ZaZaRemoteControl support Bluetooth?

Yes, ZaZaRemoteControl supports Bluetooth 2.0

Do I need a Wi-Fi Network?

Yes. you need Wi-Fi net work for communication between ZaZaRemoteControl and your phone, such as receiving orders from your mobile phones,or sending messages to your phone. Wi-Fi is not necessary for IR control, RF control and RF signal detect.

How long will ZaZaRemoteControl standby with fully charged battery?

It will standby for 5 days. Since we prepare a charge base for it, so if it is placed on the charge base,it will standby for years.

What’s the plan for accessories?

Future accessory----- 2.4G-RF Motion sensing (20170201)

When ZaZaRemoteControl receives signals from an infrared motion detector, it will send out a warning voice, at the same time, a message will be sent to the user’s mobile phone.

Future accessory-----2.o4G-RF Sensor RF receiver (20170401)

Tiqiaa will provide a “Sensor RF receiver”. Connecting this box to devices like “Water immersion detector, smoke alarm, gas alarm”, ZaZaRemoteControl will receive 2.4G-RF signals from “Sensor RF receiver” once the detectors alarm, and then ZaZaRemoteControl will send out a voice alarm and also messages to the mobile phones associated.

Future accessory-----2.4G-RF Socket (20170401)

2.4G-RF socket （100V 36A & 240V 16A）itself does not take the initiative to launch a signal, only passive response to remote control signals, standby power consumption 0.08KW/ year, is a good socket for home power management. Socket will be provided according to the national standard of each country, the picture is only reference sketch.

Future accessory-----2.4G-RF Security Lock (20170601)

Tiqiaa will provide an electronic lock of 2.4G-RF, with which you can use ZaZaRemoteControl to open the gate for your guests when you are upstairs, without worrying about signal leakage. You can even open your gate by mobile phone through ZaZaRemoteControl remotely. 

Future accessory-----Wi-Fi Video Bell (20170801)

ZaZaRemoteControl will tell you who the guest is without you walking to the door, if you have a Wi-Fi Video Bell.

Future accessory-----Wi-Fi Video Camera (20170801)

Tiqiaa will provide a Wi-Fi camera so when the ZaZaRemoteControl received signals from the sensor like door lock, it will command the camera to turn to the sensor and make a photo or video according to the user settings.

 

ABOUT TIQIAA

Who created ZaZaRemoteControl?

ZaZaRemote core team.

How big is your team?

We have 21 R&D engineers and 18 operators now.

Who do I contact for investment opportunities?

Please email tianjia@tiqiaamail.com with title "INVEST".

Tell me more about Tiqiaa in the field of remote control manufacture.

Tiqiaa is not a big company, but our core technical team is very experienced and excellent. We delivered product solutions for large companies such as TCL, Philips, Huawei, Lenovo, Haier and others in past years. We have sold mobile OTG/Audio infrared control accessory for more than one million units.

Are you hiring?

We are always looking for good talent that is passionate about sound. Please send resumes, Linkedin profiles, and/or demo tracks to tianjia@tiqiaamail.com, please use the tile "JOB".

I’m a member of the press. Who do I contact?

We encourage you to use our images and video as long as you credit Tiqiaa and link to http://www.tiqiaa.com. Press assets are also available on our website. For interview requests, please email tianjia@tiqiaamail.com, please use the tile "INTERVIEW".

 

CUSTOMER SUPPORT 

Is there a warranty for ZaZaRemoteControl?

Of course! ZaZaRemoteControl comes with a one-year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.

Can I get a refund?

Pre-orders are not refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.

Is there a guaranty of delivery?

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.

I pre-ordered ZaZaRemoteControl but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?

Please refer to this article on "How to Check" if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, then you may need to contact support@indiegogo.com.

There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

Why am I checking out through Indiegogo?

We are using the Indiegogo platform to maintain transparency with our campaign: all the stats, numbers, deadlines and dollars raised are real. We want you to know that we have the full support of the crowdfunding community to help keep us accountable.

How do I choose more than one perk?

The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will need to initiate a separate process for each pre-order. If you encounter difficulties, please email tianjia@tiqiaamail.com and use "NEED HELP WITH ORDERING" as the subject line.

Bulk Orders: how can I order a larger number of units?

For all bulk order inquires, please email tianjia@tiqiaamail.com and use "BULK ORDER INQUIRY" as the subject line.

I don’t see my answer here. Who do I contact?

We have a few team members answering emails, so please be patient with us & keep in mind that we're getting many customer support requests per day. We will get back to you ASAP. Please email tianjia@tiqiaamail.com.
story_txt: ZaZaRemoteControl can remotely control all IR electric appliances, including TV, STB, Projector, DVD, Audio and AC. The two IR LEDs enables it to work within the distance of 60 feet with a coverage angle of 150 degree. ZaZaRemoteControl has the capability to penetrate 2 floors to control lamps. It also supports mobile phone to control electrical appliances remotely through ZaZaRemoteControl. Please read the followings for details.  Download ZaZaRemote APP to mobile phones, scan two-dimensional code of ZaZaRemoteControl, link ZaZaRemoteControl to ZaZaRemote APP, and then all remote control functions of ZaZaRemoteControl can be used in your mobile phone right away. You can manage it all from your phone, tablet, or both.  ZaZaRemoteControl makes a wireless control solution using 2.4G frequency technology; about 70% of lighting factories from China will use this solution after Oct 2016. ZaZaRemoteControl identifies a transmission speed of 62.5Kbits for it, so high spreading gain is achieved. It can remote control a light 300 feet away, and a light 75 feet away separated by two walls.Working principles of 2.4G RF frequency remote control in ZaZaRemoteControl: remote control chips of lamp and box are monitoring signals; they will not act until receiving any orders. Remote control chips of ZaZaRemoteControl only send out signals after receiving orders or when users check the status of lamps. So with no signal sent out, there is no radiation pollution in idle times. With the spread spectrum technology, the radiation of ZaZaRemoteControl is much lower than mobile phone and Wi-Fi modem when its remote control works. It is safe to the human body.   315M, 433M and 800M use carrier mode, their signal can be captured, similar to IR. So if some malicious person copies the signal, he can control electrical appliance by replaying the signal. ZaZaRemoteControl 2.4G RF frequency uses digital encryption, supports 40 frequency points, use frequency hopping anti-jamming, criminals are very difficult to interfere, also it cannot be captured to replay and the transmission is safe. The 2.4G RF wireless security system, especially suitable for housing has been completed renovation. As the alarm unit is battery powered (replaced battery per 5,000 times signal sending, about 5~8 years), so ZaZaRemoteControl can still provide security alarm when house power is off. (Maybe the thief would cut off the house power)Accessary-----2.4G Remote bulb (ready now)ZaZaRemoteControl has some powerful accessories such as monochromatic lamp, monochromatic adjustable brightness lamp, and 160K true color lamp. The control distance is 300 feet away or 75 feet away separated by two walls.Accessary-----2.4G Lamp RF receiver (ready now)ZaZaRemoteControl also has an accessory “Lamp RF receiver”; your lamps or appliances will be upgraded to remote control lamps by this box.Accessary-----2.4G Self-Powered RF switch (ready now)As a supplement of ZaZaRemoteControl home control system, we provide “Self-Powered RF switch”. When users press the switch, it will generate electricity and send out remote control signals. Being limited by electricity, the remote control distance is about 35 feet. So it can be placed on the bedside to control corridor lights near the bedroom. The Self-Powered RF switch is divided into two parts, chassis parts can be installed on the wall, between the chassis and the switch are two magnetic blocks, the switch can be easily removed and placed.Accessary-----2.4G Battery-Powered RF switch (ready now) As a supplement of ZaZaRemoteControl home control system, we provide “Battery-Powered RF switch”, the remote control distance is about 60 feet. Both “Self-Powered RF switch” and “Battery-Powered RF switch” are supplements to home remote control system. One switch can control several bulbs and remote boxes at the same time, being convenient for users. If users want to know the status of all lamps, they can check it on their mobile phones or via ZaZaRemoteControl.   The minimum number of production of each color is 2000, so if the crowd funding is less than 200000 US$, we will delivery all with silver remote, ignore the color mark, if the crowd funding is between 200000 US$~400000 US$, we will delivery black remote as a selection, if the crowd funding is more than 600000 US$, we will provide 3 color delivery.We estimate 45 days for crowd-funding, 10 days for funding arrival, 45 days for mass production, 10 days for testing, 5 days for delivering to warehouse, 5 days for packing and delivering to users. We will use DHL or similar high speed delivery service. The products will be delivered to users in 75 days after crowd-funding is over (We will work hard for delivery in 60 days), and we will update the information to all participants at each milestone.  FAQABOUT ZAZAREMOTEWhat is ZaZaRemoteControl？ZaZaRemoteControl is a super remote control,supporting infrared (transmit and learn), 2.4G-RF, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. It can directly control all kinds of infrared appliances (user can add up to 100 remotes at same time) and enable your mobile phone to control lights through it. ZaZaRemoteControl can detect most of the smoke, gas, and magnetometer motion sensor signals, and provide an alarm to inform the users via their mobile phones.What languages are supported by ZaZaRemoteControl?English, French, German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, Turkish. story:
About T’spin

It has happened to all of us at some point: you want a cold beer after a long day travelling, you need to change the SIM in your phone for your new location, your glasses have come loose or you just don’t want to hold your phone while watching your favorite TV show. 

T’Spin is designed to offer a solution to all of these problems (and more!) and with a tool that is both well made, easy to carry and fit for purpose. Simply throw T’spin into your travel bag, hook it onto your keyring or keep it in the glovebox of your car and you know you will always have the perfect answer to those travelling conundrums. 

The T’spin story

As with all great ideas, T’spin was born out of necessity. We saw a need and we decided to fill it. Actually, it was a very typical story of being in a hotel room, buying a few beers from the local shop (its cheaper than the hotel bar!) and realising that you have no way of getting those beers open. It’s frustrating and annoying and most of all you wonder why hotels don’t offer this one simple gadget. Then, what if you need to keep your cables tidy or store your SIM card? Or maybe you just want a gadget that you can use to relieve stress, such as a fidget spinner?

So we got to thinking. What other gadgets do we need to carry with us when we travel and can they all be represented as one tool?  It needed to be compact, easy to use, hardwearing, functional and cool too. We wanted something that would cover all our needs from that cool beer, to SIM storage, phone stand and stress relief. It was a tall order, but T’spin was born.

The many different sides of the T’spin

Specification - the T’spin detail

Dimensions: L75 x W50 x H3 mm
Weight: 35g
Materials: Titanium / Stainless Steel / Silicone Rubber

Design and prototyping

The journey of design always starts with an idea and ends with a functional product. But there are many steps in between and for us, that part of the process is just as exciting as any other. We worked hard to decide on how the T’spin would look, the tools it would need and how they would work as part of the product. Many many drawings, CAD designs and 3D prints were produced before we came to our final design.

It needed to both work and to be beautiful - the cornerstone of minimalist design.

Manufacturing

High quality Titanium is used for the main body of the T’spin which is strong, durable and lightweight, it also naturally resists rusting and corrosion. Precise CNC machining is the only way to achieve the finest detail especially the sim card slots. The cool stain finish of T'spin is done by a post-processing of sand blasting. To produce the tiny SIM ejector pin, acid etching process is used. Then the pin will be attached onto the main body by a silicone decoration dot which is made of premium grade silicone. The T’spin is TSA approved and is designed without sharp edges in order to be fully compliant.

Packaging

We have worked hard to design packaging that is as beautiful as the T’spin itself. We use three layers of EPE foam to give the ultimate protection and the outer sleeve has a minimalist feel. We want the product to have the “wow” factor when presented as a gift.

There are one T'spin, one spare ejector pin and three spare decoration dots (black, yellow and blue) inside this premium gift box set.

Delivery timeline

T’spin will be delivered to the world at January 2019 if the goal of the campaign is reached.

We fully understand that we will encounter some challenges along the way that might hold us back from meeting these goals - but we have worked hard on the design and the testing process to ensure this product works and is ready for production.

We are experienced professionals in product design and we understand the importance of involving our backers in the process on a regular basis and keeping you all informed on where we are and how everything is progressing. The timeline below gives you a good idea of where we are right now. Things might change - but we will always tell you if it does.

Shipping

We will use e-Express service to ship your items, e-Express service offers essential online tracking data of the items. e-Express now covers 33 destinations around the world, it may take 7 to 14 working days for mail items to reach recipients for most destination cities. e-Express Service items destined for overseas destinations are traceable on the websites of their postal administrations within six months from the date of posting.

The POFTY team

We are team Purple Orange Factory (POFTY). Here at POFTY, we believe in hidden depths (just like the purple flesh of the orange). We are surprising and yet, humble. We strive for simplicity over all things, yet we infuse all of our products with innovation and functionality. We are constantly searching out new ideas to get those creative juices flowing and we strive to create a company where ideas are shared and creativity comes first.

Say hello to us

Say "hello" to us at hello@pofty.co. Stay tuned with us and get exclusive promotions by our social channels.

Facebook / Instagram / Youtube / Twitter / Website

We want the product to have the “wow” factor when presented as a gift.There are one T'spin, one spare ejector pin and three spare decoration dots (black, yellow and blue) inside this premium gift box set.Delivery timelineT’spin will be delivered to the world at January 2019 if the goal of the campaign is reached.We fully understand that we will encounter some challenges along the way that might hold us back from meeting these goals - but we have worked hard on the design and the testing process to ensure this product works and is ready for production.We are experienced professionals in product design and we understand the importance of involving our backers in the process on a regular basis and keeping you all informed on where we are and how everything is progressing. The timeline below gives you a good idea of where we are right now. Things might change - but we will always tell you if it does.ShippingWe will use e-Express service to ship your items, e-Express service offers essential online tracking data of the items. e-Express now covers 33 destinations around the world, it may take 7 to 14 working days for mail items to reach recipients for most destination cities. e-Express Service items destined for overseas destinations are traceable on the websites of their postal administrations within six months from the date of posting.The POFTY teamWe are team Purple Orange Factory (POFTY). Here at POFTY, we believe in hidden depths (just like the purple flesh of the orange). We are surprising and yet, humble. We strive for simplicity over all things, yet we infuse all of our products with innovation and functionality. We are constantly searching out new ideas to get those creative juices flowing and we strive to create a company where ideas are shared and creativity comes first.Say hello to usSay "hello" to us at hello@pofty.co. Stay tuned with us and get exclusive promotions by our social channels.Facebook / Instagram / Youtube / Twitter / Website

story:
User Experience

Simple to Use
Whenever you're not sure where you parked, just open up the app, and the AR (Augmented Reality) display will tell you where your car is. After the initial set up, the device will memorize the car's location every time you park, so you don't have to do anything. Let your device do the rest. Whether your car is parked underground or on the roof top, the app will always show you on which floor and where your car is parked, giving you a useful and fun AR experience.

Technology

In order to locate your car, we combine GPS(Global Positioning System) and DR (Dead Reckoning) methodology data captured by your device. In DR, we use an Acceleration Sensor (captures the acceleration and deceleration speed), a Gyroscope Sensor (captures the right and left rotation), and a Barometric altimeter (captures the altitude) to locate your car's position.  When a GPS cannot be used, we use a combination of these sensors to locate your car. By combining the functions of both the device and the smartphone, we can accurately locate the positioning of your car.

  

Impact

Although there exists technology that provides more precise positioning information than DR, we believe DR is a simple and extremely useful solution in areas where there are no signals and GPS does not work. By combining DR technology with GPS we have a total positioning tracking device. We are also aiming to use this technology for rescue missions in disaster and underground areas where GPS does not work.

Specifications

KEY FEATURES
● A low-power, ARM Core Processor
● Bluetooth Low Energy Module (Certified and approved)
● 9-axis combo sensor with an accelerator and a gyroscope 
● A barometer  that measures and monitors atmospheric pressure
● USB Power supply powered from car's lighter socket (No Batteries)
● Dimensions: L65mm x W 65mm x H 10mm (Without Clip) 
● AR application for Android version 7.0  and up, and for iOS version 11.0 and up

It will be a simple structure that combines the device's sensors with functions of the smartphone. We plan to make the device smaller with further development. Specifications and shape may slightly change.

  

Timeline

Prototyping (Test)


Team

This product will be co-developed between Vanguard Industries Inc, a Japanese hardware startup firm specializing in innovation development, and a major Japanese telecommunications company to realize a simple and new consumer experience. We have accomplishments in developing innovative products, services, and businesses in the past. We will plan, develop, and manufacture this device in Japan using sensor, telecommunication and miniaturization technology enhanced through smartphone development.

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks and challenges in business and life in general but we truly believe that the Ultimate Car Finder will help many people reduce the stress of finding their cars. This technology will also help rescue efforts in disaster areas where GPS does not work.  We are at a level of prototyping that makes us confident of the device's performance and capabilities. The fact that the devices are manufactured in-house furthers are confidence in quality assurance. Please note that device functionality could be limited based on your smartphone specifications. The only thing missing part now is the funding to make it widely available to people from all parts of the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Short Summary

We´re NOMADA, established in Monterrey, located on the north part of México in the state of Nuevo Leon, which is one of the most industrilzed citys in the country, we are part of a new generation that wants to colaborate in make life easier and practical to everybody.

Our campaign is based on the improvement of the actual chargers to a new and more compact version, allowing to carry with you and your phone charger to everywhere in a comfortable way. This is our baby and we want to see it grow with your support, because this product is for everyone.

With your help we will accomplish our goal to make the final investment to go on mass production and reach different markets in America, collaborating on making our life more comfortable and simple.   

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We are asking for  $30, 000 USD. We'll finance our project and the way we are planning on use is:

Purchase 2 molds for the body parts that conform our product, each mold costs 10,000 USD and the rest will be used to purchase the electronic components as well as the consumables. Also to pay the workforce, the labor and to buy the rewards showed in the rewards section that are not directly produce by us.

By selecting one of our rewards you will receive an amount of the NOMADA charger bracelets depending on the perk that you selected and additional products that will help you become a NOMADA and be ready to pursue any adventure. (*purchasing the rewards where the bracelet is offered as a part of the reward)

In case we don't achieve the goal and receive the money you give us, we will continue in the pursue of launching our product to the market, also we will give you the selected reward and place your name in our web site (when launched) as part of the people who made this dream come true.

 

The Impact

 

This is only the first product we are launching, this charger bracelet is a way we found to start making noise and get out of the established standards for the chargers that are actually in the market, products that you can carry with you everywhere you go without facing failures because you bend it, because you dropped it or because you forgot one of the parts somewhere else.

Also this will contribute to create the foundation of a series of products that will create easier ways to stay connected. We are planning on continuing making high quality products that are easy to handle, not causing a hard time on people and hopefully in the future, will have a good impact on the planet.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

We all know that launch a product have a several amount of risks and challenges, it's not easy and certainly not for everyone, the people that use their energy, time and effort to share their ideas with the world  and those who make it until the end deserve all our respect and we take the hat in front of them.

The challenges we have faced is to find people we can trust the manufacture of our product, we went through a lot of possible suppliers and we found one located in our country that accomplish the requirements and have constantly proven to be a trusty supplier, the second challenge was to develop the functionality of our product in such a tiny space, even though we had a hard time, applying the newest technology, we achieve to keep it as small as possible, the third challenge was creating the last prototype and that's why we are raising this campaign to make it to the last phase of the product.

 

As people that have dedicated our time and effort and all our resources to this project, we will continue to face the challenges that might appear so we can see our product in the market and see the face of our happy customers faces, staying connected with their loved ones.

 

Of course there are risks, the biggest risk is that our product doesn't satisfy our customers. That's why we can assure you that our product will be of the highest quality and we have developed different group controls to be sure that what we are offering is what our customers expect, we plan to keep a warranty system in case our customers detect a bad function in our product and replace it at no cost for our customers. (*warranty policy may apply) 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that there are times you can´t contribute in a project and we really appreciate that you have taken the time to check out our product and hear our voice, that's why we want to ask you as a favor, to share our idea with your family, friends or any person that you think would like to be part of our dream and will help us to make it real. Maybe we will see you soon, with another idea and at that time you might be able to collaborate with us in that dream, thank you for your time and don't forget to share it! :)

story:
CordCondom is a revolutionary product that protects and repairs your existing charger cables. CordCondom does not require any additional tools or materials to be installed and the whole thing is applied in just a few seconds.

 

Who we are and what we stand for

My name is Luca and I'm the founder of CordCondom, in the past year I have developed a team to help me bring what was a conceptual idea in my head into a real life product that is in use on thousands of chargers today. I was a student that faced the problem of my charger breaking almost every 2 months due to my on-the-go lifestyle so I started designing CordCondom as a way to solve my own problem. After applying it and going to a few lectures I found that my peers were taking notice and asking where I bought this product and where they could purchase one as they too were having this problem. That's when I knew that there was demand for my invention and I ordered materials for my first 100 units. I quickly realized that ordering materials in small amounts like this was very expensive and the price of the product was higher then I would like because of this. To keep the price affordable to customers, I realized that I would need to order in larger amounts.

 

Why we need your funding

With many happy customers we are looking to expand our production by ordering more inventory and hiring some extra staff to help with manufacturing as the majority of it is done in house in our home city of Toronto Canada. Your funding today will help with the initial high costs of inventory and allow us to spend on costs associated with redesigning our packaging to make it more clean and minimalist while still providing a great first impression. Also we would like to invest in more marketing efforts as we believe our small company still has huge potential to grow further.

 

Our KickStarter success

By running a successful kickstarter campaign we were able to order materials in larger quantities which helped alot in terms of pricing. With your help today I am looking to grow the company even further and increase production abilities for CordCondom. Furthermore, when reviewing all comments you can see that all previous backers are now satisfied and there were no negative reviews of the product. You can also find that CordCondom handled all problems with shipping quickly and ensured that all rewards were delivered on time as promised in the campaign.

We have proven that we stick to our word and always underpromise and over deliver. We intend to continue this track record of outstanding customer service throughout our indigogo campaign and into the future.

 

 

What you get

By backing us today you will receive your very own pack of CordCondoms to protect all your chargers.

If your charger is already beyond repair, you can grab a charger of your choosing as a perk and it will come with a CordCondom pre-applied.

After using CordCondom you will instantly see the added benefit of the additional rubbery grip feeling your charger now has. Also you will gain peace of mind that your charger will always be there for you and won't stop working when you are doing something important.

 

 

Our competition

There are many DIY projects that claim to strengthen charging cables and we've actually written a blog post for anyone who may not be familiar with them https://www.cordcondom.com/new-blog/6-ways-to-protect-a-charger we have put all of these methods to the test on our stress testing machines and found that none of them provide the additional strength and protection that CordCondom does. Not to mention some took quite a bit of time to apply.

We already have a functioning product for phone chargers with many happy users so you don't have to worry about whether we will be able to build out the product and get it to you. We want to be able to order in larger quantities and having pre-orders will give us the funding we need to put ourselves on the map in the crowded phone accessory market. 

 

What does it fit on?

We have designed a product that works on the Apple Lightning connector cable, Samsung Micro USB, Most USB-C cables and the Apple Magsafe 1 Cable (non Retina Display). This is one product that forms to all different chargers so there is no need to specify which CordCondom you need. 

 

This also makes it easy to share a CordCondom with a friend in need regardless of their device.

 

Keep your current MFI certified charger safe and stop purchasing Non-Licensed cords online or at the gas station that give error messages after updating your phone. (CordCondom is not an accessory that connects to your phone directly and therefore does not have MFi certification itself.) All Lightning cables available in perks are MFI Certified.

 

Allergy concerns

For those of us who have to avoid latex products when being intimate, don't look for substitutes here. All our products contain no latex and are made from 100% silicone meaning a tougher product and no frustrating latex allergic reactions.

 

Is it difficult to put on?

It's Easy! We managed to do it in under 15 seconds and it can be done anywhere as it requires no tools or small parts.

Here's Amanda applying it on her charger.

 

The environmental effect

Yes you read that right. The amount of waste caused by discarded chargers is TOO DAMN HIGH. 

If we could put a CordCondom on only 1% of these chargers and double their usable life, we would have 3 Million less chargers in the garbage this year. 

 

How did we test it?

Well, we call it the ripper. We built a charger destroying machine and recorded the difference in time before we saw charger guts coming out. An unprotected apple charger on this machine took only 5 minutes to be destroyed, with CordCondom applied it lasted over 12 minutes. 
 
To see more on our testing Click Here
 
 

Future plans

We have fun at CordCondom and we're definitely not a "one trick pony". We have plans to release more colours and patterns along with cord protection for more devices. Headphones, laptops, computer mice etc. This is not just a product to us, but instead, a passion. We promise to do absolutely everything possible to ship rewards on or before our deadlines. We started this company with very little money and fought to get things done on a bootstrapped budget. We have learned how to get around common problems (and way more come up then one would assume) and we vow to continue this persistence in growing the company, creating jobs and of course protecting cords everywhere. 

 

Other ways you can help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

We would love if you could help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, simply use the indiegogo share links on the top right and share our campaign to friends on your social networks.

 

Check us out on social media

Or Visit our Website Here

story:
iCandies: Minimalist design, maximum beauty for iPhone 6/6s and iPhone 6/6s Plus

For just one moment, we'd like you to take your bumper off your iPhone and hold it the way it was designed to be held. Observe the sophisticated design that went into creating it. It truly is a thing of beauty!!

Do you really want to put that big, bulky bumper back on your phone? 

Introducing: iCandies...


iCandies are made of high quality rubber and plastic resin. This unique elasticated plastic mix guarantees a shockproof, lightweight product that offers the same protection as normal cases without the bulk.




iCandies snap on easily but stay tightly attached in case of a fall.


The slightly raised edges keep your phone screen and cameras from coming in direct contact with other surfaces keeping them scratch free without ruining the appeal of the original design.

Choose your color 

iCandies will come in four delicious looking colors during the first production run: Blue Raspberry, Cinnamon Red, Licorice Black and Almond Jewel Silver.


iCandies are available for


Design, prototyping and testing materials

We came up with the original design for a love of iPhone. We've come through many stages to get to where we are now. 

Phase 1: We came up with different models using CAD and following Apple's case design guidelines.

Phase 2: We printed the various models and decided on the design we liked best. 
Phase 3: We got our final design printed professionally 

Phase 4: We tested various mixes to ensure the best shock proof minimalist bumpers possible.

Now we're ready to go into production and with your help, we can bring back the beauty of the iPhone!


Press and Bloggers
Download the media kit (hi-res pictures 10mb) and contact us at info@icandies.me for special deals for you and your readers!

Phase 2: We printed the various models and decided on the design we liked best. Phase 3: We got our final design printed professionally

Now we're ready to go into production and with your help, we can bring back the beauty of the iPhone!

Press and BloggersDownload the media kit (hi-res pictures 10mb) and contact us at info@icandies.me for special deals for you and your readers!

story:
This time we are raising fund to product small version of MiQi, which is 1GB RAM and 8GB eMMC. The RAM width band also is 64bit! Let's get to know about MiQi first!

     

    MiQi is Small

     

    Small as a credit card,what can it do?

    It is amazing!

    MiQi is Powerful

    MiQi is powered by Rockchip RK3288. RK3288 is a high performance application processor for high-end tablet, notebook, all-in-one device , smart monitor and TV-Box. Especially it is one of most powerful solution for 4Kx2K TV-Box. 

    Integrates quad-core Cortex-A17(up to 1.8GHz) with separately Neon and FPU coprocessor , also shared 1MB L2 Cache. More than 32bits address will support up to 8GB access space.

    Powerful GPU is embedded to support smoothly high-resolution (3840x2160) display and mainstream game. Support OpenVG1.1, OpenGL ES1.1/2.0/3.0, OpenCL1.1, RenderScript and DirectX11 etc.

    Full-format video decoder, including 4Kx2K multi-format decoder.

    Antutu score(benchmark by cnxsoft)

    "Vellamo Score is very excellent with 3308 points for Chrome Browser, 3,021 points for the stock Browser, 2,019 for multicore, and 1,322 points for the Metal test."

     


     

    MiQi is Expandable

    MiQi includes an HDMI 2.0 port, four USB 2.0 ports, a micro USB port, and 16-pin and 12-pin expansion headers. The board equip with up to 1GB LPDDR3 memory(64bit band width), and 8GB EMMC storage space, and of course a Micro SDCard interface can be extended more space;


    The expansion headers includes Uart x 2, I2S x 1, PWM x 1, SPDIF x 1, I2C x 1, SPI x 1, GPIO. There are 2 PIN for RTC battery input on the 16-pin expansion headers.
     

    MiQi is Productive

    We provide different OS images for MiQi. e.g. Lubuntu 14.04, Android 5.1, Debian 8, Ubuntu 16.04. We can use Linux Desktop Environment  to do many thing, e.g. surfing the Internet, writing document, listening to the music, editing pictures, ...

     

     

     

     

    MiQi is Versatile

    MiQi also runs Android 5.1 OS for entertainment.

     

     


    MiQi is also a cost-effective, ultra-scalable development tool regardless of IT, electronics enthusiasts, geeks, from which children can get what you want.
    Whether office, play games, micro-server, it can be easy to learn programming job.

     MiQi while an open-source product, you can easily get support from the open source community, as you can also implement their own ideas, their share to the community, so that more people benefit, currently supported open source system Ubuntu, Android5.1, Debian, 
    And this is just the beginning ....
    This is MiQi
    Small world, big heart, than you think
    Your world, because it is different
     

    About the Shipping

    We plan to deliver the MiQis on November 15.

     

    Risks & Challenges

    We have completed the design has small batch production. We also have got the CE/FCC/ROHS certification for MiQi. There will not be any significant risk.

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

      We are looking for local retailers for MiQi, so that the user can get a better shopping experience. Please contact us if you can help.(email: sales@mqmaker.com). If you have any idea on the MiQi, please join to our forum(forum.mqmaker.com) and communicate to our community.

story:
We are working…

work in progress … this is a preview of eXraser Application, there are only 2 buttons , the first one is the scan button and the second one is for the setting . The button scan after you  click it shows  you the percentage of progress , the progess bar moves around the button. On the bottom of the screen there’s the name of the file scanned. The application works using an essential design and is user friendly.

 

About me

I'm 41 years old and I have been working in an electronic company that develops Apps and web portals for 17 years where I have gained experience in the electronic and computer sector infact I help collaborate with the creation of apps.

 

What’s the money for?

  • The making of the app
  • A new Professional web page design
  • Marketing campaign
  • The launching of the app on IOS and Android marketplace

 

When does it launch?

The first beta will come out in June 2018. The final versions will be out by September 2018.

 

Thre versions of Exraser

  • Exraser Basic (free version with advertising banners
  • Exraser Gold (version with no ads)
  • Exraser Premium (version with no ads and with the option of file decryption)

 

The team

  • Andrea Project creator and marketing manager.
  • Alex App developer
  • Laura translator.

 

About The App

Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with?
It's an iOS/Android native app.

When will the app be available?
The first beta will come out in June. The final versions will be out by September 2018.

Would you like to help colloborate?

With your contribution you can take part in choosing the App graphics.

story:
Time is running out!

You can get a great deal on the Tetherlock by getting it here! This is the lowest price it will ever be. Every cent you give will go back into the product in some way, so the time is now to act fast in order to take advantage of this special offer!

 

The Story

My name is William, the creator of the Tetherlock. My team and I have been working to create a device for the average person that can save them thousands of dollars in a little package. The Tetherlock comes with the ability to geofence your device, so you never have the opportunity to lose it. A year ago I was lucky to travel to Europe for two weeks, but I was unfortunate when I misplaced my phone, I watched as my contacts traveled down the dusty road on the tour bus. I created the Tetherlock so that people would not have to go through the pain and frustration that I did when I lost my phone, whether at home, in your daily routine around town, or like me, when traveling domestically or abroad. The Tetherlock can help to prevent theft as well because when anything, including your personal items, is stolen, you can have trouble getting it back. The most troubling part is, that if you get it back there is no guarantee that something hasn't already gone wrong.

You can help us to make the product a thousand times better by allowing us to have resources to do so. We will add as many features as we have the funding for. Every dollar, or share, counts. Soon, we can give people another option to losing their personal items. By giving a little to this campaign, you can save yourself, and others, lots.

What it does:

The Tetherlock can come in multiple forms, including integrated into your case. It does not have to be modular.

The Tetherlock creates a geofence around your personal object (It doesn't have to be a phone). It also detects where you are within the geofence, and with this information sends a message to you when you leave the geofence "protecting" your device. All of these parameters are fully customizable with an app that you use from any computer. However this may be a basic idea, it can be expanded with the ideas from backers and the support they give us.

Our future plans can only be fully carried out with your help. Anything that you choose to contribute counts. We recommend that anyone who truly feels that they want to support the project share this page via social media (Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr)

 

What You Receive And What We Need

What we need and why we need it:

We need a total of 20,000 dollars to complete this project. More importantly, we need as much community support as we can get. We need the $20,000 dollars to progress the creation of the product. With this help, we can begin to make additions to the idea and begin to enrich it to benefit the average person even more. We can also use this money to begin to produce a product to distribute to our backers and people around the world who feel that they should not have to settle for the daily struggle that is misplacing their phone.

Color Options:

The Tetherlock comes in three colors, blue, grey, and black. These colors best match the colors of everyday devices. If you happen to find that none of these colors work for you, you may request a color for a limited time only!

Size Options:

The Tetherlock comes in two sizes, small, and large. Each comes with its own benefits, and each has its own purpose. The best part is, you get to pick which size you would like, at no extra cost!

Some Features:

1. Fully featured app for ease of use.
2. High-quality frame for reliability during stress and drops.
3. Fully customizable regions in which it will deactivate (such as your home).
4. Reduced charging time and low-hassle magnetic charging ports
5. Easy-Install guide to be up and running quickly.
6. Included warranty to protect against damage during use.

This simple idea could become a reality with the help of Indiegogo backers and people like you interested in supporting the project. 

We are also now PATENT PENDING. We hope that this fact assures any potential backers that we will commit to this project. We are planning to file a full patent in late June of this year. The main goal currently is to raise our goal on this very site.

Where the funding is going:

We will invest most of our funding right back into our product development. Some of the funding will go to help produce the product and distribute it to you! We need a total of 20,000 dollars to get us going. With this support, we can research new and inventive ideas to integrate into the product. Anything extra we gain will also be put into funding the project to the best of our ability.

Perks:

(Perks are cumulative)

$5- Those of you who give five dollars will help to improve the product, and in return, we give you a thank you letter and put you on an email list to keep you posted about everything we do so you can follow our progress!

$15- With $15 dollars, you can get a Tetherlock, AND help to support the campaign! This is the lowest price the device will be. Plus, you get the bonus of supporting us!

$25- With this generous donation, you get 2 Tetherlocks, and update videos that we personally record with your interests in mind!

$50- With this, you can get yourself a spot in our credits wherever we advertise! Keep in mind, you don't have to use your real name, just name someone you want to get recognition for the AWESOME things that they have done! On top of that, you get 3 Tetherlocks so that you can give them to whomever you want, or even keep them for yourself if that is how you roll.

$75- This one is for the early birds, and they are getting the biggest worm ever! These people get 25% off of a more expensive perk, and retain all of the rewards that come with it! You get 2 normal TetherLocks, and 3 special BACKER inscribed Tetherlocks! On top of the mountain of other rewards, you are given the SUPER BACKER credit slot, which tells everyone how amazing you have been in making amazing things happen!

$100- For those who did not make it into the early bird special, this one is for you! You get all of the same rewards. At this point, you will be recognized as one of the greatest backers that we can accept! You can change the face of the product forever! We can discover and implement so many innovative things into the product with your help, and this is a great way to help us.

$200- The people who help us via this perk receive our highest honor and all of the perks that Indiegogo would let us give you! This is a very limited spot, so if you want to make the biggest impact on our project, and change the lives of so many people, do so quickly. You get 3 of each version of the Tetherlock (backer and regular) for everyone you want to give it to. These people also get a very limited access to our BETA TESTING of any apps that we design for the product. Remember, this is also on top of every other reward there is!

 

The Impact

We can make a huge difference in people's lives by saving them time, money, worry, and stress! People can have one more thing off of their plate if they can have access to something like the Tetherlock. Together, we can make a difference in people's lives one at a time, but it starts here, and now, with you.

 

Risks & Challenges

We face many challenges along the road to helping people, and these can come in the form of design flaws and malfunctions in the Tetherlock that are sure to happen. There are also the issues of other large businesses working against us. We CAN overcome these challenges because we have a vast base of people who we know that can support us to overcome these challenges. In this case, it is not about what you know, it is about who you know, and we know many people that can help. I also have a lot of experience with overcoming flaws with projects and plans just from doing it so much. Most importantly, we can overcome these obstacles with your help!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, then that is ok! We have opened up several opportunities for you to show your support for our campaign by sharing it with people you know! Even better yet, you can make a direct impact on the project by sending us suggestions for what you think should happen with the project! Almost as important as monetary support is the support that comes from each one of you spreading the word about the TETHERLOCK!

Twitter        Facebook       Tumblr

story:
Short Summary

Attention, all memelords!

 

Hello, my name is Benayahu Nissanian, and I'm a passionate meme consumer. Nowadays, there is a plethora of apps and websites with which to watch and look at memes. Memeify is here to revolutionize the way we consume memes.

 

Memeify is an app where meme creators upload their memes and have them rated by the community. For every “star” the creator gets, they earn 0.1 MEMES. (MEMES is a new cryptocurrency that we’re developing alongside this app. The target value for every coin is 0.1 USD)

In addition, the app will offer a feature allowing you to donate to the meme creator whose content you enjoyed.

 

“As a bonus for our Indiegogo supporters, If you fund us before we reach our goal you will have access to the app before the launch and you will be able to become a meme creator without an approval process!”

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to develop the app, we will need 65,000 USD.

With that money, we will:

- Develop the Memeify app

- Buy servers for the app

- Launch a cryptocurrency coin called MemeCoin (MEMES) to go along with the app

- Market the app  

We have already spoken with several blockchain app development companies and we chose the right one for this project. Therefore, all we need is the money to start developing it.

 

Now it's your turn!

You can purchase one of 6 perks to suit you. For every perk, we added a small bonus because we think our Indiegogo supporters deserve more.

When you fund this project, you reserve some MemeCoins (depending by the perk you buy) before the ICO (initial coin offering) with a free bonus. When we launch the wallet, you will get the coins you reserved along with the bonus (The Memeify app will have a built-in wallet).

We estimate the initial app launch around summer 2019

 

The Impact

The impact of this app will change the meme community as we know it. Today, meme creators have a hard time earning money from memes (oftentimes they don't even earn anything at all) so our vision is to make an app and a community where meme creators upload their memes and simply earn money from that.

 

This will change the way we browse memes. We invite you to join our journey in hope of changing the meme community, together.

 

Risks & Challenges

The way we see it, our first and biggest challenge will be to get large amounts of people to use this app.

To overcome this obstacle we need your help to start this community and grow its popularity steadily so that more meme creators and meme consumers to join the app.

For this to work, all you need to do is to share this fundraiser and get your friends join our Discord server (we will send more details shortly). With your help, more people will join the community and the app will have a bigger impact in the near future.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t help us fund this project, you can subscribe to our newsletter and get the latest news from the Memeify team. You'll be notified when we release the app to the public, so you will be able to download the official release as soon as it reaches the App Store or the Google Play Store.

 

Another way you can help us reach the goal is to spread the word in social media in order to reach the funding goal.

And that's all there is to it!

When you fund this project, you reserve some MemeCoins (depending by the perk you buy) before the ICO (initial coin offering) with a free bonus. When we launch the wallet, you will get the coins you reserved along with the bonus (The Memeify app will have a built-in wallet).
We estimate the initial app launch around summer 2019 The Impact
The impact of this app will change the meme community as we know it. Today, meme creators have a hard time earning money from memes (oftentimes they don't even earn anything at all) so our vision is to make an app and a community where meme creators upload their memes and simply earn money from that. This will change the way we browse memes. We invite you to join our journey in hope of changing the meme community, together. Risks & Challenges
The way we see it, our first and biggest challenge will be to get large amounts of people to use this app.
To overcome this obstacle we need your help to start this community and grow its popularity steadily so that more meme creators and meme consumers to join the app.
For this to work, all you need to do is to share this fundraiser and get your friends join our Discord server (we will send more details shortly). With your help, more people will join the community and the app will have a bigger impact in the near future. Other Ways You Can Help
If you can’t help us fund this project, you can subscribe to our newsletter and get the latest news from the Memeify team. You'll be notified when we release the app to the public, so you will be able to download the official release as soon as it reaches the App Store or the Google Play Store. Another way you can help us reach the goal is to spread the word in social media in order to reach the funding goal.
And that's all there is to it!

story:
How many electronic devices do you have? Personal phone, work phone, laptop, tablet, camera, headphone ... It looks scary if you list all up. Chargers and cables which come along with these electronics become a headache to carry for business trip, family vacation or outdoor activities. How can we get rid of all these tangles and excessive weight?

 

A PD wall charger, a high capacity power bank, a Qi wireless charger, one lightning cable and one USB-C cable can cover most of your needs for power. The 5 items cost you $120~150 dollars. JUCI, which can provide the same and more flexible features, only costs you $59 now. 

 

 

JUCIQi and JUCIMax both work with smartphones with wireless charging, tablets (including iPad), laptops, portable game consoles (including Nintendo Switch), headphones (including AirPods), portable speakers, wearables (including Apple Watch), digital cameras, etc.

JUCIQi charges your laptop when it is in sleep or off mode. It has wireless charging capability and can charge 1 additional device. JUCIMax charges laptops while in use. It charges bigger electronics much faster. It has extra 10% battery capacity than JUCIQi to provide additional work time.

 

 

Equipped with standard Qi wireless charging, JUCIQi powers and energizes your wireless-charging enabled smartphone without a cord. Just lay your phone on JUCI and it starts charging within a second.

JUCIQi is equipped with 18W PD charging, in addition to the dedicated 10.5W charging via Lightning cable. The 18W PD charging is not as fast as the 45W PD in JUCIMAX, but is enough to power and charge Chromebooks, and maintain power or charge slowly some big laptops.

*The mobile phones which can be charged wirelessly include but not limited to below - and the list grows every day.

 

USB-C Power Delivery (PD), is a new protocol specification that allows for faster and more flexible charging. As part of the new USB 3.1 standard, USB-C connection and PD charging are adopted by numerous new electronic devices. JUCIMAX are equipped with 45-Watt PD charging which can drive almost all USB-C devices including laptops. And yes, it is backward compatible and safe to power and charge lower wattage USB-C devices.

*Above laptops are PD compatible via USB-C charging port. Similarly, the list is not complete and grows every day.

 

 

There are two versions of JUCI: JUCI-QI and JUCI-MAX.

Besides the features in common, JUCIMAX has a total of 55.5W output. It can charge 4 devices simultaneously. JUCIQi has 33.5W total output and a built-in Qi wireless charger. It can charge 5 devices at the same time.

 

 

 

 

Both JUCIQi and JUCIMAX have two built-in cables, with USB-C and Lightning outputs respectively. With braided fabric exterior and Kevlar fiber strengthened core, the cables lasts 7x times longer than regular cables. When needed, the 12" length can provide a comfortable reach to your devices, but not too long to be dangled. When not used, they can be hidden in the slots and the cables become a convenient carrying solution.

 

 

Unlike most power banks, which are only backup batteries and need external chargers to refuel, JUCI has its own built-in AC adapter. With its input voltage ranging from 100V~240V, it can be plugged into any wall outlet in the world (for some countries, prong adapter might be needed) to charge. 

Besides the wall plug, JUCI has a USB-C input which compliant with Power Delivery 3.0, a fast and safe way to recharge the internal batteries.

 

 

JUCIQi and JUCIMAX both work with

Smartphones with wireless charging, tablets (including iPad), laptops, portable game consoles (including Nintendo Switch), headphones (including AirPods), portable speakers, wearables (including Apple Watch), digital cameras, etc.

 

 

 

Generally, JUCI charges smartphone by 4~6 times, tablet by 2~4 times and laptop by 1~2 times (depending on your mobile device model).

story:
S-Conserver Portable Wireless Solar Charger with Storage & Light

Pocket-sized and Easy to charge

The most annoying thing for a great number of us it's when our phone runs out of charge and memory. Stuck in the middle of the day with no connection is a nightmare. To tackle with this situation, we (S Conserver Team) think of designing Solar Power Bank. It is a thin and lightweight power bank that provides a huge amount of charging power to several portable devices with 450 mAh Solar Charging Pads.

    

         

 

Features

.

Solar Recharge

There is LIGHT, there is POWER !

S Conserver don't require external electrical sources to recharge your batteries. This means that it offer freedom of movement. You can find the sun pretty much anywhere on Earth during the daytime. So, if you find yourself lost in the woods(say) with a dead cell phone, you need only the sun's rays to get it up and running again. Equip with a 450 mA big solar panel. When light on the solar panel, the indicator light will goes on!

 

 

 

Three USB Ports for Charging

Keep your handsets charged on the go with USB-connection facilities. Charge four devices simultaneously. This solar power bank can charge with USB power adapter or computer in addition to using pure sunshine.

   

 

Large Battery Capacity

The more mAh the Power Bank has, the larger the Energy is !

Provide large battery backup for usage during outdoor activities !!

There is a growing need for longer lasting portable external battery charger and the demand is being met by our team - S Conserver. Delivering 16,000 mAh, this solar power bank can charge your device 4 times over when the solar charger is at capacity.

 

Available in Three Colors

 

Support Multiple Devices

Digital Numerical Display

Gives us an exact read-out of how much capacity remains in the form of percentage !

You can on and off the display with the button.

Major concern when buying Solar Power Bank is Size, Weight and Look (sometimes :- The higher the capacity of the bank, the more likely it is to be Big and Heavy. But we keep the above into consideration and tried to make S Conserver Lightweight, Slim and Handy.

 

Wireless Charging

Qi fast charging neither Hot nor Hurt Hands!

Build-in Intelligent chips, temperature control protection.

Charge your device Anywhere, Anytime, Conveniently and efficiently with protection of over charging, over-voltage, over temperature and over-current. It ensures an ultimate Safely charging environment.

 

Universal Device Compatible!!

Along with fast charging of mobile phones, S Conserver can also be used to charge up almost all kind of smartphones. Being a great value for money product to consider, you can now use this to charge all categories of Apple and Android devices.

 

LED Lights

No more darkness while camping, hiking and walking!

This solar rechargeable emergency light has 16 LEDs provides super bright illumination. These emergency lights consumes less power which makes S Conserver extremely energy efficient. Equipped with 16 LED flashlight that can also be used as a caution light or a SOS signal light.

Place this solar charger under sunlight for one day , it can last 16 hours lighting with 25% brightness LED lights.16000 mAh capacity can last 80 lighting hours.

 

Hard Drive

Data transferring to your device !

Can be used as a OTG (On-The-Go) pen drive to read all the documents in the mix through your device. Other than POWER, what a mobile/smartphone user can't do without? Yes, you are right- It's MEMORY STORAGE .S Conserver comes with 256GB built-in flash storage.

Perks

Safe

What's in the box

Tech Specification

 

Timeline

story:
TITAN: A Portable UV-C Power Bank That Cleans Your Devices

Gear up for 2021 with TITAN. 

Meet Titan, a UV-C battery pack constructed with a sanitizing capability you can carry around everyday to clean your devices on the go.

Disclaimer: This product does NOT claim to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

The Power of Light to Sanitize

TITAN is a portable UV Sanitizer and Charger. TITAN emits germicidal UV rays of 270nm wavelength that effectively sanitizes the surfaces near you whilst simultaneously charging your devices at the same time.

You can easily carry it around to clean your items due to its lightweight and compact size - encouraging you and your family to carry on with your lifestyles through easier sanitization of personal belongings on the go.

TITAN's UV Sterilization

Eliminate 99.9% of Germs

UV-C technology has been proven to inactivate or kill 99.9% of contaminants, bacteria and other microorganisms. TITAN's UV-C light makes it easier to access uneven and hard to reach places where disinfectant sprays or wipes can't get. 

Moreover, disinfectant products that use alcohol may have an unpleasant smell and might leave chemical residues that can damage or tarnish your devices and jewelry. TITAN eliminates these issues effortlessly.

Germicidal Test Report

As shown in the report below, TITAN's UV-C component has been proven to be able to eliminate 99.99% of microbes.

 

 

Sanitize your essentials and more

To use, press and hold TITAN's side button for 3 seconds to turn on the UV-C light before waving TITAN above the surface area of the item that needs to be disinfected. Since TITAN is built with a 270nm UV wavelength, it takes about 15 seconds to inactivate any microbes and complete sanitization. 

Now, you can sanitize keyboards, phones, glasses, keys or any items you have on the go with ease!

*WARNING: Avoid any unnecessary UV exposure to skin and eyes. Please switch off TITAN when UV-C light is not in use.

Product Specifications

With a compact size of 5.6” x 2.68” x 0.87” / 143 x 68 x 22mm and 12.87oz / 0.8lb / 365g. You can conveniently take TITAN with you everywhere you go to charge and sanitize.

 

Besides portability, TITAN is also equipped with:

- A battery capacity of 20,000maH

- x2 USB-A (Input/Output) (Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0)

- x1 USB-C (Input/Output) (Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0)

- x1 Lightning port (Input)

- x1 Micro USB port (Input)

 

Other features:

Automatic power-off, Over-voltage, Over-temperature, Over-current, Over-heat, Short-circuit Protection

Ensuring all devices stay fully charged at all times, while keeping your items germ-free on the go.

 

TITAN is constructed with a high quality aluminium finish in both Silver and Space Grey colors. The UV-C component can last for more than 6000 hours, allowing you to use it for more than 10 years when used daily.

More about TITAN

Ready for your devices



Space Grey & Silver


LED Power Display



UV-C & UV-A LED Combination Sterilization


3D Drawings


Comparison

 

 

Early Sketches

In Use







Our Factory in Shenzhen


 

Caution & Disclaimer

By pledging to this project, you agree to operate the product only as intended for use while observing the safety guidelines of usage. The Hyper Agency Pte Ltd will not be held liable for any damages resulting from the misuse of the product.

UV Light can be dangerous if used without observing safety guidelines. Never point the UV-C LED's at eyes or skin. 

Mishandling of the devices can lead to short or long term side effects if exposed to the skin or eyes. Remember, these are not toys and are safe for use when operated properly.

Disclaimer: This product does NOT claim to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

 

 

Shipping

During these uncertain times in the world, shipping costs for some regions have gone up significantly, but we believe in offering economical shipping prices for our backers. Our shipping cost will be a flat fee of $10. However, Taxes & VAT for some countries may be unavoidable. We seek your kind understanding on this.

Our Story

Titan was conceptualized early in 2020. Our team felt that everyone should have some form of portable sterilization solution on hand to minimize contact with surfaces that might contain a host of harmful microbes. 

Since almost everyone carried some sort of portable charger when going about their daily lives, we figured why not go the extra mile and create a device that charges and sanitizes at the same time. Catering to the two most prevalent needs of our times.

Keep your devices clean and charged, whenever you desired. 

Risks and challenges

We are confident in all aspects of our project and have already established reliable production and fulfillment partners. What we can't control is shipping or manufacturing delays caused by national COVID-19 lockdowns that might occur in 2021. Our backers will be regularly updated with the project's progress and we are committed to be entirely transparent with any issues that might happen during and after this campaign.
