story:
Available for iPhone 5, 5s and 6


Practical technology meets chic design: The world’s slimmest leather case with an integrated battery and wireless charging technology that provides twice the battery life in a smooth, stylish design with added device protection.


A superior leather bound case with integrated wireless charging and slim battery technology. The Armure is the slimmest low profile extended battery design on today's market.

With this campaign, Armure aims to become the newest brand of luxury leather accessories to provide greatly extended battery life, durability, and a touch of class to your mobile device starting with the iPhone 6.

Armure accessories utilize the slimmest battery technology available in a super slim design caddy that maintains the form of your device better than any other on today's market.


Please give us your impressions here: The comment page

ARMURE IS HANDMADE!
The leather finish on all Armure accessories makes a statement of luxurious excellence and gives a warm tactile feel to your device. The style and form of the Armure requires the leather to be lovingly applied by hand. This is not a product that can be cheaply mass produced, and as such the handwork ensures a very high quality finish. It takes a little time to create beauty.

The Armure brand will offer products to the world that provides style and extended functionality for all your mobile devices.  
Armure plans to become a market leader in defining functional and luxury leather products for mobile devices and will continue to offer the same high quality after sales service and support as you would expect from leading providers. With your help and support for a successfully completed campaign, we will create Armure products for other leading mobile devices like for the iPhone 5 or Samsung S5.

Our promise to you: We produce premium quality leather and wireless charging technology products, We hold ourselves and our products to high quality expectations. 

WHY CROWDFUNDING THIS PROJECT? Do you need donations too?
We are developing this product as a crowd-funding project, that means people provide support by placing pre-orders of our product Armure, simple dollar contributions, or alternative options as sharing on your social media this page.
When the promised support helps us reach the target goal in time, then we will be able to mass produce the product Armure and we will have to deliver the product within a few months to you. Otherwise, everything is cancelled if the project doesn't reach the goal. 
100% of your contributions are refunded to you if we don't reach our goal in time.
If you want to learn more about crowdfunding, watch this video: What is Crowd Funding?


Earn 1 FREE Armure when you refer 5 Armure purchases!

(Limited to earning 1 Armure )

How it works:

  1. Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.
  2. Then, visit our page on Indiegogo and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.
  3. Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the "Link" icon or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.
  4. When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.

How to track your results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. Count the number of funders. If you have 5 Armures bought by your friends, yours is for FREE!


Armure - Functions & Features:

Armure iPhone 6, 5, 5s specifications as follows:
iPhone 6: L 140mm x W 69mm x H 12mm and only 78g.
iPhone 5, 5s, exact dimensions still on process.
iPhone 6, 5, 5s: battery wireless charging 2800 mAh included 
Certifications: Fcc, RoHS, CE.

Perks


Timeline:


Where do the funds go?


Frequent Asked Questions:


Why does armure take so much time to make?
The style and form of the Armure requires the leather to be lovingly applied by hand. This is not a product that can be cheaply mass produced, and as such the handwork ensures a very high quality finish. It takes a little time to create beauty.

Do you ship internationally?  
Of Course! The Armure can be shipped to almost anywhere! 
Just add the $10 International Shipping Fee

My Armure product no longer functions as it should, what do I do?
Contact us via support@xovation-group.com and we will work with you to repair or replace your Armure in a timely manner.

How do I look after my Armure to keep it looking beautiful?
You don’t have to do too much to look after your leather Armure. Leather is a very durable bio-material and the natural oils in your hand that transfer to the leather during normal use is enough to keep your case shiny and supple.

You can also treat the leather once per year with a quality leather treatment product and buff it up using a piece of sheep's wool or a microfiber cloth. If the leather gets wet, dry it off immediately. The natural oils in the leather will repel most water based spills enough for you to clean it up without damage to the leather.

I damaged the leather on my case, can it be repaired?
Sometimes yes. Our leather craftsman is a skilled dude but there is only so much that can be done. We would have to see the case to make an accurate appraisal for a possible repair. Worst case, the leather could be replaced for a reasonable fee if the damage is a result of misuse.

Is Armure compatible with other wireless chargers?
The Armure is compatible with any Qi chargers (found at Starbucks or IKEA), but our charger is designed as the optimal charger for your Armure.

Does wireless charging expend  more energy than using a cable?
No, Inductive wireless charging on this scale is as efficient as charging with a cable.

Does wireless charging make any irritating noises?
No, its perfectly silent, you can sleep easy.

What are the specifications of the charger ?
Luxury finish, size: 150x80x8.5 mm Input: DC5±0.5V/1.5A (cable included). 

I have more questions! Please send us a message or email us at support@xovation-group.com


About us:

We are a team of Expat friends living in Switzerland, and hope to bring to the world innovative products who can help people in their day to day environment, hence our name: XOvation.
We love our host country Switzerland and expect to bring this standard of high quality and efficiency to our product together with our multicultural team’s origin.  Our products are smart, beautiful, and culturally rich!


Our Swiss Team:

Our team is a group  of friends and expatriates living and working in Switzerland. We speak 4 languages between us and our mash up of varied cultural backgrounds combined with a "Swiss sense" for excellence makes for an explosive cauldron of fun and innovative ideas.  

Ben (French) - Marketing, Chief Whip Cracker
Karl (Aussie) - Research & Development, and keeper of the COOL!
Marc (USA/French) - Product & Pricing Manager, and Voice of Reason.
Ahmed (Kiwi) - Chief Technical Officer, also known as Gandalf the Web Wizard
Patricia (French) - Chief Information Technology Officer & Social Media specialist. Our Social butterfly


Contact

For press and bulk order inquires please contact us at info@xovation-group.com. For press materials ask our press kit to press@xovation-group.com.
story_txt:
Available for iPhone 5, 5s and 6


Practical technology meets chic design: The world’s slimmest leather case with an integrated battery and wireless charging technology that provides twice the battery life in a smooth, stylish design with added device protection. 


A superior leather bound case with integrated wireless charging and slim battery technology. The Armure is the slimmest low profile extended battery design on today's market.
With this campaign, Armure aims to become the newest brand of luxury leather accessories to provide greatly extended battery life, durability, and a touch of class to your mobile device starting with the iPhone 6.
Armure accessories utilize the slimmest battery technology available in a super slim design caddy that maintains the form of your device better than any other on today's market.

Please give us your impressions here: The comment page
ARMURE IS HANDMADE!The leather finish on all Armure accessories makes a statement of luxurious excellence and gives a warm tactile feel to your device. The style and form of the Armure requires the leather to be lovingly applied by hand. This is not a product that can be cheaply mass produced, and as such the handwork ensures a very high quality finish. It takes a little time to create beauty.
 The Armure brand will offer products to the world that provides style and extended functionality for all your mobile devices.  Armure plans to become a market leader in defining functional and luxury leather products for mobile devices and will continue to offer the same high quality after sales service and support as you would expect from leading providers. With your help and support for a successfully completed campaign, we will create Armure products for other leading mobile devices like for the iPhone 5 or Samsung S5.
Our promise to you: We produce premium quality leather and wireless charging technology products, We hold ourselves and our products to high quality expectations.  WHY CROWDFUNDING THIS PROJECT? Do you need donations too?We are developing this product as a crowd-funding project, that means people provide support by placing pre-orders of our product Armure, simple dollar contributions, or alternative options as sharing on your social media this page. When the promised support helps us reach the target goal in time, then we will be able to mass produce the product Armure and we will have to deliver the product within a few months to you. Otherwise, everything is cancelled if the project doesn't reach the goal.  100% of your contributions are refunded to you if we don't reach our goal in time.If you want to learn more about crowdfunding, watch this video: What is Crowd Funding?


Earn 1 FREE Armure when you refer 5 Armure purchases!
(Limited to earning 1 Armure )
How it works:

Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.

Then, visit our page on Indiegogo and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.
Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the "Link" icon or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.
When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.

How to track your results:

Log into your Indiegogo account.
Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
Select the “My Profile” option.
Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
Count the number of funders. If you have 5 Armures bought by your friends, yours is for FREE!






Armure - Functions & Features:










Armure iPhone 6, 5, 5s specifications as follows:iPhone 6: L 140mm x W 69mm x H 12mm and only 78g.iPhone 5, 5s, exact dimensions still on process.iPhone 6, 5, 5s: battery wireless charging 2800 mAh included 
Certifications: Fcc, RoHS, CE.


Perks






Timeline:








Where do the funds go?






Frequent Asked Questions:
Why does armure take so much time to make?The style and form of the Armure requires the leather to be lovingly applied by hand. This is not a product that can be cheaply mass produced, and as such the handwork ensures a very high quality finish. It takes a little time to create beauty.
Do you ship internationally?  Of Course! The Armure can be shipped to almost anywhere! Just add the $10 International Shipping Fee
My Armure product no longer functions as it should, what do I do?Contact us via support@xovation-group.com and we will work with you to repair or replace your Armure in a timely manner.
How do I look after my Armure to keep it looking beautiful?You don’t have to do too much to look after your leather Armure. Leather is a very durable bio-material and the natural oils in your hand that transfer to the leather during normal use is enough to keep your case shiny and supple.
You can also treat the leather once per year with a quality leather treatment product and buff it up using a piece of sheep's wool or a microfiber cloth. If the leather gets wet, dry it off immediately. The natural oils in the leather will repel most water based spills enough for you to clean it up without damage to the leather.
I damaged the leather on my case, can it be repaired? Sometimes yes. Our leather craftsman is a skilled dude but there is only so much that can be done. We would have to see the case to make an accurate appraisal for a possible repair. Worst case, the leather could be replaced for a reasonable fee if the damage is a result of misuse.
Is Armure compatible with other wireless chargers?The Armure is compatible with any Qi chargers (found at Starbucks or IKEA), but our charger is designed as the optimal charger for your Armure.
Does wireless charging expend  more energy than using a cable?No, Inductive wireless charging on this scale is as efficient as charging with a cable.
Does wireless charging make any irritating noises?No, its perfectly silent, you can sleep easy.
What are the specifications of the charger ?Luxury finish, size: 150x80x8.5 mm Input: DC5±0.5V/1.5A (cable included). 
I have more questions! Please send us a message or email us at support@xovation-group.com

story:
How will the app function?

  1. Teachers will download the app to their mobile device.
  2. Teachers will then add each of their classes to the app.
  3. Each Class will have a unique code that is provided to Parents.
  4. Parents download the app and add the class using the unique code.
  5. During a School Emergency, the teacher will select the class they are currently in and alert parents if the class is ok.
  6. Parents will receive the notification informing them of the emergency and letting them know the status of the classroom.


Current Stage

I am currently in the beginning stages and raising funds to help with the cost of developing. the I have found a great company here in California, located in San Fransisco that I will work with to develop the app. 

 

Campaign Timeline

Once we reach our funding goal, the company will start the app development which should be completed in about two months.

As soon as the funding goal is completed and the app has been developed (with some testing), it will be submitted to the Apple App Store.

Ultimately we are looking at an August or September release. 

 

Is this the final design?

The app design pictured above will most likely change once the development starts, designs will be posted for supporter feedback.

 

What will the App cost be?

The app will be released on the Apple app store for $1.99.

This will help us with future updates and cost to have the app hosted on an  AWS server. 

 

Will there be an Android?

The app currently will on be developed for the Apple app store. For us to be able to release the app for both platforms, our funding goal would have to be between $150k - $200k. If we are not able to raise that amount before the end of this campaign, we will create an another campaign at a later date.

 

Risks & Challenges

The first and most important challenge will be to fund this campaign successfully. 

If we can successfully reach our funding goal, the next challenge will be to get teachers around the country to use the app for their classes. 

It would be up to each teacher to use the app and also the school districts would allow them to communicate with parents during emergencies. 

 

Check out on:

  • SecuredClass.com
  • Facebook
  • Twitter

story:
Risks & Challenges

1.  Not achieving the funding goal

If the element1 cannot be realized, the people have to get back their perk.

Of course we don’t want this case to become reality so we advertise our smartwatch on our social media channels, different blogs and other lines of communication.

2.  Engineering

Wristband: ready for production

Case: ready for production

Technology: We try to implement the ideas of the clients till the start of the production, but the basic is ready.

Software: Until the delivery we still work on the user friendliness. We want to optimize it and therefore we also need the suggestions of the customers.

At the moment the smartwatch is already compatible with iOS and Android, but we are still working on the compatibility to Windows phone. We try to update the software until the first delivery.

By the way, updates are for free, of course.

3.  Design: ready

4.  Packaging: ready

5.  Production: We choose our suppliers very conscious, so we don’t see any problems at this point.

6.  Shipment: To ensure an optimal delivery service, we have two distribution center. For Latin America and North America we have one in the USA. The second one for the European distribution is expected to be in the Netherlands.

**********************************************************************


FAQ

Will the software of the element1 support other languages than English?

Yes. You will be able to choose in Release 1.0 between the languages English, Spanish, French and German. Later in Turkish, Chinese, Japanese and Russian.

Does the element1 has bluetooth?

Yes. The element1 will be able to connect with other equipment.

Which material will the packaging be of?

In order to protect the environment we use recyclable materials. The packaging can be used as cereal bowl afterwards.  

Does the element1 has an integrated sound system?

Not planned at the moment.

Which extent has the Element?

The element1 has a size of 1.69in / 43mm.

More sizes are planned for the future.

Will you give information if there are any updates for the software?

Yes! We want to improve our software within the time so we will let you know about any updates.

Can I get the updates for free?

Yes, of course.

Will you sell the element1 in different colors?

First the element1 will be available in the colors black currant (black), apple green (green), blueberry lime (turquoise) and lichee (white).

The community will be able to vote for more colours!

Which connection has the element1?

Mini USB.

What is the element1 compatible with?

With iOS, Android System and Windows Phone.

Are there different kinds of packages to order?

Yes. You can choose the standard element1. If you are fast, you can snatch one of the 50 smartwatches of each colour of the special version with the kinetic battery.

How is the element1 charged?

Mini USB.

Does the element1 come with different watch faces?

With a special app you can change your faces or design one by yourself.

How does the element secure my data?

The safety of your data is very important. You will have a secure connection between smartwatch and smartphone.

Which gadgets will follow?

In our shop different wristbands, a charging station, an adapter and earphones will follow.

Will you include the proper power plugs which are specific for my country?

That’s not necessary because we charge over mini USB.

When will you ship the first element1?

The first ones of the polycarbonate version will be sended in December 2015 within the USA and to Germany. Afterwards other destinations will follow. In January 2016 the first ones of the steel version will be delivered.

Which payment method is accepted?

Please note the conditions of payment of Indiegogo.

Could there be any price changings?

No. The price is already set and we won’t change it.

How will you ship my reward?

To make sure your package will be delivered to your destination, we will send it via UPS or DHL. You will have the option to follow your product by a tracking number.

Can my package be sended without taxes?

No. The delivery will always be sended with the tax regulations of each country.

Can I change the quantity of my reward?

Yes, you have to choose a new perk.

Is there any warranty for the element1?

Of course. The legal regulations of each country are valid.

Which countries do you deliver?

The element1 will be delivered international. Asia will follow.

Will you save my address and personal data and will others be able to get this information?

Yes your data will be saved for the order. But your data will be saved according to the regulations and won’t be given to others or sold.

Where can I buy the element1?

Currently only about Indiegogo and later through the online shop on our website.

When will I be able to buy it?

Right nowon Indiegogo. Later, through the online shop.

I’ve got my own business and would like to sell your element1. Where can I apply myself?

Please send a mail at public(at)numberone.world

story:
Introducing THE PUF CASE

 

 

 

Don't you just hate it when you are in a rush and forget to put perfume on? Or how about the difficulty of carrying your favourite brand with you?

How often did you forget your perfume at home? Puf is here to solve all those issues and many more.

Our product brings elegance and technology together. We created the perfect case for one of your many problems. It looks like a normal case but it's so much more.

 

 

Why is it so special?

 

First of all, our product is just 3mm thicker than your regular case, which doesn’t even feel different. That extra 3mm, offered us the opportunity to create the mechanism behind PUF. This includes the mechanism that makes the case work like a perfume bottle and the capacity of actually filling the PUF Case.

 

The mechanism includes a 10ml capacity which based on the average used by any person, it will last you a whole week and possibly more. Why 10ml you might ask?

After extensive testing, we realised that it’s the perfect amount that will not only prevent the case from being too thick or too heavy, but also, the perfect amount to always have enough!

 

Never empty, never the same!

Don’t worry... We thought of that too. One of the most unique characteristcs of the case, is that it is refillable.

All you have to do, is remove the lid of your favourite perfume brand and just place the case over the nozzle for literally, 10 seconds! It’s that simple!

 

 State your presence. Anytime, anywhere!

Running out of perfume and want to use another brand? Simple! As part of the packages, we include a non toxic cleaning product in its own small bottle, that allows you to clean the inside of the case, in order for a different perfume brand to take its place.

 How do I use it?

 

 

 

 

 Personalise to your needs.

Where can I use The Puf Case?

Colors & Compatibility

Compatibility: iPhone 6 and newer / Samsung S7 and newer. Depending on demand, we can tailor it to almost any phone*

 *At the moment, we are only able to sell Puf Cases for Iphone 6 and newer, Samsung S7 and newer. However, in order to be able to create cases for other phone models we need to reach certain targets in order to cover our costs.

 

Where are we in the progress

We are in process of negotiating with distributors and manufactures. We have created a 3d printed simulation of the product which works perfectly, the first ever prototype.

After many lost battles with the 3d printer and countless hours trying to make the perfect case, we have come up with the product you see today. However in order to deliver this to you, we need your support to reach the minimum order units required by our manufactures, which is substantially high.That’s why we chose Indiegogo, as we need your support but also because we want you to have it first.

We are now looking to get the ball rolling on a high rotation for most recent phone models as mentioned above.

 

  The Team

We are a group of close friends who share a passion for innovation. We always look for different ways in which we can make our lives easier and this product is the best representation of that dream. We can't wait to share this product with the world and make your life a bit easier as well!

 

  Why Indiegogo

While looking for investment for this product, we realised that the best approach would be to introduce it first to you! It was made for you, therefore if you can relate to the product, why not have early access to it.

We would gladly take any pledges to make our dream come true and bring the Puf Case alive. Indiegogo has a brilliant audience and we believe that it’s the best tool to market our product.

We want to thank the Indiegogo team for making this a possibility and we hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

 

Risks and challenges

The most obvious risks that we had to encounter and solve are the following: shock resistance, overheat and pocket/bag burst.

Shock resistance: As you probably know, most of us have dropped our phones a few times in the past and some of our phones were saved by their phone case. The Puf case was designed in the exact same way, to resist shock with premium materials (such as silicone and leather) to protect both your phone and your perfume.

Overheat: The Puf Case was designed to resist high temperatures but also negative temperatures without affecting the perfume quality.

Pocket/Bag Burst: Due to its two motion button, the Puf Case prevents any sort of pocket or bag burst so you do not need to worry about the perfume leaking.

Airport check: Its 10 ml capacity meets the required limit in all airports. Therefore, the inconvenience of removing the case is solved.

Size/ weight: Its innovative solution required only 3mm extra to your normal phone case. The weight goes up to 20g, depending on the phone model.

Cleaning the capsule: The case comes with a odourless non toxic liquid which cleans the capsule and allows you to add new fragrances without mixing them.

story:
As seen on:



How well does your home know you?

Smart home technology can be overwhelming. Many of what we call "smart" or "connected" devices are not "smart" because these smart devices are disconnected from each other and do not have context. Besides, most smart products are merely glorified remote controllers and require commands to be issued from an app. Truly smart devices are those which are able to automate your life by making sense of your surroundings and your personal preferences.



With KLUG Home, it's easy! It's plug and play.

KLUG Home is a tiny USB smart home hub that connects with different smart devices in your home. Simply plug it into any USB port, and you're good to go. All the different smart devices you own are under a single interface. Control is easy via the KLUG app. 







KLUG integrates all your smart devices and makes them even smarter. 


KLUG Home supports all the popular smart devices, hubs and software in the market (NEST, SmartThings, Amazon Echo, etc). At this moment, a single KLUG Home can communicate with at least 20 devices. You don't need to pay exorbitant amounts of money to automate your home, we can make the simplest of smart plugs even smarter for you!


KLUG listens and responds to you.

KLUG not only supports control through a mobile app, but also seamlessly integrates with your favorite home automation systems like Apple HomeKit and Amazon Echo.


KLUG is small.

We've spent a significant amount of time perfecting our engineering and design prototype. With the size of a USB drive, KLUG Home can be plugged into and hidden behind your home's Wi-Fi router. With this form factor, you won't have to worry about where to put KLUG or have it disrupt the aesthetics of your home's decor.

Don't know where to start? Give our kits a try!

New to smart home automation? Don't worry, we have the perfect kits to get you started! And best of all, at a highly discounted prices! You're in for a treat!

What is KLUG Air? 
KLUG Air is an intuitive Air Conditioner controller. Installation is just as simple as sticking it on your A/C. Start remotely controlling any A/C, even the old dogs. KLUG Air comes with its own array of sensors, which continuously monitor and help automatically achieve thermal comfort in your room.

What can you do with smart plugs? You may ask.

KLUG Home can make even the simplest of smart plugs even smarter for you. Not only will you be able to remotely control your appliances (as any typical smart plugs would do), you will get a brain to automate their functions. 
In fact, with time, KLUG Home will recognize the types of device you connect your smart plugs to, and recommend ways to automate it as it begins to learn and create context. 
Here are some things that we love to automate our normal appliances with a smart plug.

Forgot to turn your lights? No worries.


Automatically cool off this summer.


Never miss a single day without coffee.


Monitor your electrical consumption.



KLUG Home not only provides a medium for your devices to add context to each other, but it also steers them to make meaningful decisions together.


So, how does our algorithm work?

Smart devices allow you to control them remotely. But what most devices currently lack is the notion of context. KLUG Home constructs this context by consolidating data from all your sensors to intelligently decide how to best coordinate your smart devices in order to achieve synergy across your entire home.



Taking the example of adjusting your air conditioner to a comfortable temperature. KLUG Home not only takes the usual humidity and temperature data from your air conditioner sensors, it also takes into account who is in the room, the external weather data, your personal metabolic rate, and historical preferences, among other data sources.





Talk to us!

bizdev@intraix.com

Tweet us here,

With the Hashtag #KLUGHome




FAQs

1. Is there a maximum number of products that the KLUG Home / KLUG app can support?

At this moment, a single KLUG Home can communicate with at least 20 devices.

2. Will there be continuous software upgrades/integration for new connections? 

Yes, we will be continuously updating the KLUG Home and our mobile apps over the air (OTA) to add support for new integrations and features. 

3. Can you plug KLUG Home into any powered USB?

Yes, you can plug KLUG Home into any powered USB; however for KLUG Home to provide actionable intelligence, this has to be a USB slot that is powered at all times.

4. What protocol standards do KLUG Home support?

KLUG Home Hub connects to a wide range of devices that communicate through Zigbee or Wi-Fi. KLUG as an ecosystem also integrates with many platforms such as Homekit, Alexa, etc., thereby extending its reach to most of the popular standards in home automation like Zwave, Bluetooth, etc.

5. How secure is KLUG Home's software system?

KLUG is in compliance with Technical Reference 40 (TR40) - Sensor Network for Smart Nation (Homes). KLUG uses Zigbee HA profile for communications between devices and the hub, they are secured by the industry standard AES 256-bit encryption. KLUG uses MQTT (over TLS) and HTTPS for all communications between the Hub, Phone and the Cloud.

We at Intraix are also fully committed to personal data privacy. KLUG fully complies with the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) in Singapore. PDPA ensure a baseline standard of protection for personal data across the economy by complementing sector-specific legislative and regulatory frameworks.  

You can find out more about PDPA here.


Risks and Challenges

1. Connecting certain devices might require extra configurations and credentials to authenticate.
2. The UI and illustrations might have some minor variations.
3.  Potential manufacturing hiccups like rising manufacturing costs or chip components being hard to acquire may cause a small delay in shipping. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

story:
AndroidCodeGeeks

is knowledge base which maintain categorize android tutorials which will help android developers to find the best articles,videos, examples and Android Jobs

I want to change the Website Theme and start an Android forum based on Discourse 

Minimum Hardware Requirements for Discourse 

  • Dual core CPU recommended
  • 1 GB RAM minimum (with swap)
  • 64 bit Linux compatible with Docker
currently androidcodegeks.com runs on DigitalOcean 512MB Memory ,1 Core Processor ,20GB SSD Disk, 1TBTransfer which cost $5 per month. 

How this will help ?

There are so many published android articles, videos and examples. But its hard to find the best android articles related to the android developers' problems. 

Android Code Geeks is maintaining categorized and the best  articles, examples and videos with the help of Android developers.

Why on Indiegogo ?

I need the funds to pay for cloud server and for the website developer.

Who is maintaining AndroidCodeGeeks.com this ?

An android developer who has more than  7 years of experience in Software Development with  4 years of Android Development

story:
Portable magic pad is the one that you have never experienced before. Thus, you will enjoy the convenience and be a trend setter at the same time with this product.

 View of the portable magic pad sticking

 

Portable magic pad is one of those marvel pad series for portable use. It can be usually used in vehicles and you can stick the portable pad to the back side of your smartphone to use its navigation or music player functions. Patented material used in portable magic pad enables it to stick to or detach from smartphones easily.

You can stick the portable magic pad to your smartphone for use but you can also stick it to any place and then open its cover to attach your smartphone on it.

How to use the portable sticky pad to have it sticking on certain places

  • Remove the protective film on the back of the portable magic pad and then stick it where you want.
  • Open the cover of the portable magic pad and stick your smartphone on it.
  • Run your navigation or music player apps to use the pad with those functions.

     

​

Portable sticky pad will make you enjoy the freedom to use both of your hands while putting your smartphone on a smooth and flat surface in different places and situations of your life.

You can use portable sticky pad in every place of your lifestyle.

Portable magic pad can be used in various situations when you take a outdoor selfie or watch videos. In addition, they can stick to various places to use many kinds of products. 

 

Portable sticky pad has rectangular design with rounded ends so that they can stick to the back side of the smartphone with good looks.

 

  • Model : Portable Magic Pad 
  • Size: H65mm X W55mm 
  • Thickness : 2T
  • Material : Polyurethane(Patented)

 

How to use the portable sticky pad to have your smartphone sticking on it

  • Remove the proective film on the back of the pad and stick it to the back of your smartphone.
  • Open the cover, remove the protective film and then close the cover.
  • When you need the pad, open the cover and stick the pad to your phone.
  • ​After using it, detach it from your phone, close the cover and carry it with you.
  • In order to use portable sticky pad, you need to remove the protective film at the back side and then use the product after 1 hour. It’s because it requires some time to make the portable pad stick to the smartphone.

Reusable

 

When you feel that the adhesion of Portable magic pad is not that strong, clean it with water and dry it out to restore its adhesion.

Portable Sticky Pad in Your Car

If you want to use your smartphone fixed within your vehicle, you should use various kinds of complicated devices to fix it and they are not good for the look with complex installation.

However, if you use portable magic pad, you don’t need any kind of stands and you can simply put your smartphone on any place as you want within your vehicle to use necessary functions of your smartphone.

 

We will provide 50 units of portable magic pads with a single custom design to those who support 100$ or more. It would be a good chance to have your own products and offer gifts to your friends or colleagues.

 

  • We have already completed preparations related to production of portable sticky pad and once the campaign ends, we will start production. Thus, delivery will be made as soon as possible.
  • Right after the campaign, we will carry out a survey and ship your rewards within 3 weeks after the survey is completed.

 

  • We have completed all the necessary tests related to manufacturing processes of Portable Magic Pad. 
  • Once the campaign ends, we will start to produce patented materials to manufacture Portable Magic Pad. So our supporters will have Portable Magic Pad as soon as possible. 

 

Winic is a company located in Gangnam, Seoul, Korea and has produced iMarvel which is an anti-gravity smartphone holder.

Our motto is to design an art on technology.

Our technology used in portable sticky pad is patented and we are planning to cooperate with various professionals including illustrators, photographers and designers so that they can express their ideas with portable pad products.

 

We will participate in this campaign with products of the collaboration between Winic and one of those artists.

Music: http://www.bensound.com

story:
I have developed a hooking device on a cell phone case called "cellhook".  I have applied for a US patent.  If you look at it sitting on the table, (that looks stupid),  well not so fast I could use that when I am waiting in my car, I could put it on my mirror! when I am taking a shower and get an important call I could hank it on the shower curtain rail!! In the kitchen hang it on a kitchen cabinet handle out of the way, when camping any tree branch. Going to work out and have no pockets hang it on your garment. Hang it on a Christmas tree for a nice gift,   hmmmmm  maybe not so stupid.

Cellhook is made from a durable flexible plastic design to fit your phone perfectly! 

If you contribute to my campaign not only will you be part of a wonderful product but can purchace cellhook for your self or others at 37% off!! There is an additional charge for shipping and handling.

story:
NFTY PL+S is the world’s first truly portable all in one charging solution and battery bank for your Smart Watches, Smart Phones and Tablet Computers. 



NFTY PL+S works by charging your smart devices using your Car’s Cigarette Lighter, Wall Outlet at home, Your computer’s USB  port and with its built in rechargeable Lithium-Polymer battery.

With NFTY's smart charging technology, NFTY detects when your device is fully charged and redirects the charge to its internal battery unlike power banks that need to be charged separately NFTY is charged whenever you charge.



NFTY's built in rechargeable lithium polymer battery  has a capacity of 4000 mAh to give users an additional Talk Time of 3hrs, Standby Time of 71 Hrs, Internet Usage of 3Hrs and an estimated 30% battery boost.




NFTY PL+S has 4 USB ports allowing you to charge multiple devices at once, including that fancy smart watch you just got.





Unlike battery banks NFTY PL+S has a built in cable management system.


NFTY PL+S plugs directly into your wall outlet.





Plugs into your Laptop or Personal Computer's USB Port





Plugs directly into your cigarette lighter





NFTY PL+S works with your Smart Watches.




It also works with your Smart Phones.




And your Tablet Computers. 



Basically, any device with a USB that needs a power source.





NFTY was designed to be minimal and compact so that it fits in your pocket without being too bulky. NFTY is small and lightweight but packs a big punch and can be easily stored anywhere.




With your help we can meet mass production minimum order quantities needed to reduce the cost of NFTY and make it accessible to everyone. We have  completed Beta  prototyping but we also need to get all the necessary certifications to make NFTY safe and reliable.

All those stickers that are on your electronic devices actually mean something.  Each one of those stands for different power certifications and it costs a lot to go through the testing. Each of the certifications also ensures that NFTY works as it should with every power outlet and device.



As one of our Indiegogo supporters, you will not only make NFTY a reality accessible to everyone but you will also become part of the designed by many family. Like any family, this means you get the “hook up” with great prices and early access to our products before anyone else.

Our devices improve with each version, help us improve the way we charge them.








designed by many is a product design firm located in Miami, FL.  We believe great design does not have to cost a fortune. Our products are designed to be unique, functional and affordable, without sacrificing beauty, quality or style. We believe everything in life can benefit from great design. For more information, visit http://www.designedbymany.com. 


We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan but sometimes forecasts aren’t 100% accurate. Should the “you know what hit the fan” we will keep you updated every step of the way.  You can always reach out to us at wecare@thinkbym.com




We have gone as far as we can go with the NFTY project but now we need your support. The NFTY shown in the video is our first version of a working prototype.  Should we reach our funding goal, we will secure the necessary certifications and ramp up mass production to meet estimated delivery times.

We have successfully completed 2 crowdfunding campaigns, so we know what it takes to bring an idea to life.


Thank you SOOOOOOOO much for your support whether you backed the product, shared the project on Facebook or Twitter or made a valuable comment to help with the development of the project.  Thank you so much for the support from the entire DBM Team

story:
Everything You Need To Protect Your Phone In Style

  • Premium Tempered Glass Case
  • 9H Tempered Glass Screen Protector
  • Application tool for worry-free, easy installation
  • Cleaning alcohol swab, microfiber dry cloth, dust removal stickers

Based in New York and California, since 2010 LUVVITT® has shipped more than 2 million cases, covers and other wireless products to consumers all over the World.  Known as the mobile accessories experts, LUVVITT® takes pride in producing high quality, innovative designs that enhance and protect your valuable devices.

 

With Luvvitt ClearView® Signature, you'll showcase the beautiful design of your phone without compromising from protection. Luvvitt ClearView Signature combines a tempered glass back cover with a tempered glass screen protector to create the most elegant an unobtrusive protective case ever. 

Clear View Signature also features a flexible, shock-resistant TPU bumper to provide a perfect grip and extra cushion against drops. Installation of the tempered glass screen protector is a breeze with the application tool that is included. 9H Scratch Resistant tempered glass front and back will endure, time, scratches and will never discolor unlike other clear cases, keeping your phone looking clean, even after months. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Delivery Timeframes

Delivery... it's the pain point of nearly every crowdfunding campaign that's ever existed. As a company that already ships hundreds of orders every day, delivery is our expertise.

Manufacturing of the Clear View Signature Case for iPhone X is slated for completion by mid-June, at which point all  units will be shipped from China to our warehouse in Pennsylvania. All products will be shipped to Pennsylvania via an express air service, rather than a slow sea freight.

Once the products arrive at our warehouse, we'll immediately begin fulfillment. For other devices such as Galaxy S9 Plus, Galaxy S9, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8 as these are additional perks that can be released if we reach the thresholds, we will update as the campaign progresses. Fulfillment will be done sequentially, by device, in order of popularity. What that means is that the devices with the most orders will be filled first.

As we go through the process of filling orders, we'll be sure to keep everyone posted on the status. As always, keep an eye on our Campaign Updates for the latest information. If you have any specific questions, feel free to post a comment in the comments section. Thanks so much for your support!

iPhone X

Galaxy S9 Plus

Galaxy S9  

iPhone 8 & 8 Plus

Shipping //

All orders will be shipped using a door-to-door tracked service. For deliveries in the US , this means that once your order has shipped, delivery won’t take more than 2-4 days. For deliveries outside the US, we’re still working to determine the best service provider for your local area. Regardless of your delivery location, rest assured your package will have a tracking visibility.

As is the case with nearly every package you’ve ever received from an online purchase, duties and customs fees will be determined at the time of delivery, and charged by your local authority. Unfortunately, we have no control over that.

If you have any further questions about timelines, feel free to post a comment. We’ll be hanging out there all month!
story_txt:
Everything You Need To Protect Your Phone In Style
Premium Tempered Glass Case
9H Tempered Glass Screen Protector
Application tool for worry-free, easy installation
Cleaning alcohol swab, microfiber dry cloth, dust removal stickers
Based in New York and California, since 2010 LUVVITT® has shipped more than 2 million cases, covers and other wireless products to consumers all over the World.  Known as the mobile accessories experts, LUVVITT® takes pride in producing high quality, innovative designs that enhance and protect your valuable devices. With Luvvitt ClearView® Signature, you'll showcase the beautiful design of your phone without compromising from protection. Luvvitt ClearView Signature combines a tempered glass back cover with a tempered glass screen protector to create the most elegant an unobtrusive protective case ever. Clear View Signature also features a flexible, shock-resistant TPU bumper to provide a perfect grip and extra cushion against drops. Installation of the tempered glass screen protector is a breeze with the application tool that is included. 9H Scratch Resistant tempered glass front and back will endure, time, scratches and will never discolor unlike other clear cases, keeping your phone looking clean, even after months.            Delivery TimeframesDelivery... it's the pain point of nearly every crowdfunding campaign that's ever existed. As a company that already ships hundreds of orders every day, delivery is our expertise.Manufacturing of the Clear View Signature Case for iPhone X is slated for completion by mid-June, at which point all  units will be shipped from China to our warehouse in Pennsylvania. All products will be shipped to Pennsylvania via an express air service, rather than a slow sea freight.Once the products arrive at our warehouse, we'll immediately begin fulfillment. For other devices such as Galaxy S9 Plus, Galaxy S9, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 8 as these are additional perks that can be released if we reach the thresholds, we will update as the campaign progresses. Fulfillment will be done sequentially, by device, in order of popularity. What that means is that the devices with the most orders will be filled first.As we go through the process of filling orders, we'll be sure to keep everyone posted on the status. As always, keep an eye on our Campaign Updates for the latest information. If you have any specific questions, feel free to post a comment in the comments section. Thanks so much for your support!iPhone XGalaxy S9 PlusGalaxy S9  iPhone 8 & 8 PlusShipping //All orders will be shipped using a door-to-door tracked service. Regardless of your delivery location, rest assured your package will have a tracking visibility.As is the case with nearly every package you’ve ever received from an online purchase, duties and customs fees will be determined at the time of delivery, and charged by your local authority. Unfortunately, we have no control over that.If you have any further questions about timelines, feel free to post a comment. We’ll be hanging out there all month!

story:
Website

www.base12tech.com

Short Summary

We are base12 Technology (b12T). We are driven by ways of making technology accessible to people. We think the most useful way to use information is with Augmented Reality (AR), in which apps can layer information on to the real world. Currently, only monocular devices are available for the cellphone, limiting the user experience. Binocular devices are expensive, costing thousands. If you want to capture a 3D image for later use in Virtual Reality, you need a separate device, and few are available.

With the Motorola Mod system we can now offer both solutions in one. The AuRama from b12T can be used both for a heads-up AR display as well as a device to capture 3D images and video, and for only 159 USD! We are excited to be the first 2 in 1 MotoMod to provide stereo AR and capture 3D video and images in one.

By helping us reach our goal you will help us achieve our desire of creating groundbreaking devices that will help to merge the areas of digital and physical worlds. This is only the beginning of our journey, and many more devices are coming! We want to help people with disabilities, help to improve education experiences, and assist in improving health outcomes.

Our Motivation

What is the next step in technology? We at b12T realize there is information stored inside of computers and online that can help us in the real world. It would be useful to display digital data to assist navigation, in entertainment, at work, in education, but only IF we can access it and display it. But how to implement so that it is useful for many, and how to share the information with others? What we need is to make a device that will allow the user to see in 3D and take 3D photos, to feed back into the digital realm.

Our Solution

Enter the Motorola Mod platform. This was our chance to make this idea real for many people, and affordably. There are other devices that use special hardware, and are thousands of dollars. But, any owner of a MotoZ series or Motorola Play series smartphone that can use the snap-on mod can have access to this technology! When we were included in the Indiegogo Motorola Transform the Smartphone Challenge, we were on our way to provide this technology for less than 200 USD!

 

Introducing the b12T AuRama. A MotoMod that meets all of our goals! The AuRama MotoMod is both a binocular AR device and a 3D camera and video recorder. Additionally, the lenses are set wider than human eyes, producing a deeper field sensation, making objects stand out more than normal.

What We Need and What You Get

We are now ready to ask for your help. We need about 100,000 dollars to get off the ground, and are aggressively pricing the AuRama at 159 dollars. This seems a bit steep, but we think this is not a lot of units, and thus not to hard of a goal to hit.

Why 100000 dollars? To be honest, we need to be able to continue designing the electronics. We have a good starting point, but it needs refinement and attention from engineers who have experience in this field. Fortunately we are located in an area where these resources are plentiful. Another important step is that we need to have European and USA clearances to begin manufacturing and selling the products. Of course the most important step is that we need to secure manufacturing contracts with partners overseas, and get you your product!

What do you get in return? You get the world's first stereo 3D AR hardware! Also, for those wary of being an early adopter, the first 50 will get  to choose from one of three Motorola mod back covers, designed by our Artistic Director! We feel that to date the standard backs for these phones are a bit bland, and in need of some flavor. If we get good feedback on these, we will find a way to make these available for purchase, and expand our back designs!

Our Future Direction

Is this a one time product for us? Not even close. This success will allow us to grow into our other ideas about how bridge the gap between computers and humans. We think the biggest impact will be in making information accessible to persons with disabilities, who could use better assistance navigating the environment. We also think we can adapt the awesome power of the modern smartphone to improve health outcomes, and even catch diseases in earlier phases. For now, this is a good place to start.

Our Team

Diego Martinez, CEO and Founder

Dr. Martinez’s Journey in science and technology began at a young age, tinkering with early home computers such as the Commodore Amiga, and taking part in his hometown’s Commodore Users Group that his father was president of. The interest in science and technology became a reality when as an undergraduate he became an assistant in the Neurospora Genomics Project in 1998, a cutting edge whole genome project. Here he grew to love bioinformatics, almost simultaneous with the term’s inception. This is a unique field combining data, biology, genetics, evolution, robotic technologies, and was the perfect fit for one who was interested in many diverse fields.

This led him to the California coast, and three years working in the Human Genome Project at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory and three more years in biofuels research at Los Alamos National Laboratories. Throughout his career he has published more than 20 articles, numerous opinions and text book chapters, garnering more than 9000 citations and growing.

Now, he has turned his impressive breadth skill set toward merging digital and physical worlds, with the intent to bring data to life. This merger of realms will be used to create phone attachments to help people with disabilities, to improve health outcomes, and reduce accidents.

Anita Martinez, Art Director

Anita Martinez is currently attending the University of New Mexico and working towards a degree in fine arts with an emphasis on sculpture. She loves integrating electronics, painting, drawing, woodworking, metal smithing, mold making and anything else into her art.  She feels the best product designs are achieved when art, science and design work together and that's showcased in Aurama designs.

Ryan Bradley, Business Manager

Ryan Bradley is a recent MBA graduate at Endicott College with a B.S. in Biology/Biotechnology. Although he is only 23, he has had a well rounded experience in the workforce which has included curation work, business development, and most recently bioinformatics. He is ready to put all of his time and energy into Base12tech to produce the best possible product for the consumer.

Bhanu Gandham, Engineer/Media Person

Bhanu Gandham graduated from Georgia Tech with an M.S. in Bioinformatics and currently works as a bioinformatics scientist at Veritas Genetics. She has also worked as a Systems Engineer in the I.T. industry and as a Deputy Operations Manager at a Facilities Company. Bhanu demonstrates an impressive background and extensive experience.  She is excited and determined to make Aurama the next big thing!

How You Can Help

If you like where we are headed, but cannot contribute at this time, then please share our campaign, website, and our story on your favorite platform!

 

Thank you for becoming part of the b12T family!

story:
eLeash : Don’t let your phone touch the ground! 

 

Our Idea:

Smartphones are increasingly becoming more revolutionary. We have become more reliant on them for our daily use, to pay our bills, run our businesses, enjoying movies and even organizing events. With the high costs associated with their purchase, it makes sense to protect your phones from loss, theft, or damages. If you're not careful enough, severe damages may occur to your phone.

We want to revolutionize the way the world protects their electronic devices. We would like to introduce a device that connects the users with their device via reeling system technology (similar to retractable lanyard). It keeps your phone from falling on the floor and therefore your phone remains protected from damages or even scratches.

Vision behind the drive:

3.5 billion People own smartphones globally and many of them believe that protecting a Smartphone with a case is illogical and useless. 

Over 50 million Americans break their phones every year by accidentally dropping. We found that it is inevitable even if it’s covered with a case. Whether by just standing from a chair, or while clicking pictures or getting out of a car, there are too many instances where we receive such misfortune. It hit us! Thus we created the eLeash.

 

eLeash is a product that prevents consumers from dropping their devices. Our mission is to provide security, durability and fun through handling your device. eLeash values bringing innovation, integrity and fun to your community. We wish to become a forerunner in the field of protecting electronic devices.

Our product is unique because there is nothing like it that already exists. Furthermore, it allows for customization so that you can show off your personality. It can be used by any age. It is so simple that even your grandparents can use it.



 

About eLeash

eLeash is a shock resistant cover which keeps your device safe in case of collision. It uses a reeling system with Kevlar string and carbon fiber components that ensures durability. It will prevent your phone from ever hitting the floor. It also has a kickstand; a model with wireless charging capabilities. This technology can be used by anyone aged 13+. It can be held in your hand, clipped on your pocket or on a belt loop, etc. eLeash is reliable and safe and offers a lifetime warranty to the customers, which is indeed a cherry on the top!

eLeash will retail at $60. Price is really affordable which will give us a competitive edge over our competitors.

 

Budget:

To successfully launch this unique mobile cover, we are looking to raise the sum of $50,000 to spend the money on prototyping, ensuring a quality product, and begin the manufacturing process of the product. 

The amount raised will be used to cover the costs of manufacturing, acquiring office space, marketing, quality management, and distributing the product on a global scale.

So take this opportunity to bring this promising idea into existence. Support our project and be part of our story to create the most sophisticated all-in-one mobile cover ever. 

 

Rewards for Backers

To show appreciation to potential backers, we’re offering some exciting rewards. People who will support us will be given our utmost greetings together with 30% discounts upon the early purchase of eLeash. Moreover, all the backers will be kept updated about where their funds are being used via our website and social media handles.

 

Thus it’s a win-win situation for both of us! Let’s together give rise to the world’s most unique and innovative mobile covers.

 

 

Early Protoype without fully functioning reeling system:

story:
5GNetworkSites.com

I'm Bill Brown from Raleigh, NC. In the early 2000's, I was involved in cell tower acquisitions for several telecoms in various areas across the state. Fortunately, I was successful in signing leases with many property owners. As you can imagine, they were extremely excited to become proud recipients of that monthly income for several years to come.

Now, dozens of telecom operators are deploying the new, high-speed 5G technology around the country. Later this year, SmartPhones with 5G service will become available in scores of US cities. But there is one important factor that makes this all possible.

 

5G data does not travel very far. So, in order to ensure acceptable reception, telecom operators are leasing properties and deploying small cell transceivers about every 250 meters. They are leasing thousands upon thousands of properties, both public and private, to which they can affix these devices. The telecoms are making monthly payments and signing 5-year leases with options.

In order to expedite the deployment of this new technological phenomenon, I'm seeking funding to develop, launch, and market this Site Aggregator website. It will benefit both property owners and telecom operators. More importantly, by enabling this 5G deployment, it helps to enhance the US economy and safeguards our national security. Additionally, it's the key element for IoT, the Internet of Things which will provide connectivity for billions of users, sensors, and devices.

Your minimum contribution of $20, will not only help 5GNetworkSites.com become a reality, but it will also entitle you, for no additional money, to membership in 5GNetworkSites.com. Then, you, too, can post your property information for possible selection as a paid small cell site location.

So, in a word, your $20 kills two birds with one stone. It supports my website funding, and it makes you an accredited member of the site once it is funded! 

Please think about it. You could be doing both of us a favor!

 

Regards,

Bill Brown

 

 

 

 

 

 

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
BNY 1 - Worlds First Practical Charging Case For iPhone & Airpods 

BY Bloc New York

Bloc New York is presenting you concept of worlds first water resistant (IP67) charging case for iPhone and Airpods in 1 case - Model BNY 1

Everything in one - power bank, iPhone case and aiprods case. 

Additional Features 

  • Simple and luxury design
  • iPhone and aiprods in one charging case
  • Water resistant (IP67)
  • No Fingerprints On Your New Case
  • Soft material designed case is presented in 4 colors (Simple White, Solid Blue, Exclusive Yellow, Luxury Black)

 

 

We create for your necessity

Imagine You Have BNY 1:

  • No more case for Airpods in your pocket
  • No more different charging accessories for Airpods or iPhone
  • No more separate power banks and cables
  • No more worries about dust and water
  • No more fingerprints on phone or on case
  • Holding exclusive and innovation case in our hand

 

 

More About Offer

Better to understand what we offer pleas check for prices on the market for separate products which are included on BNY 1 :

  1. Dust and water resistant case for your iPhone
  2. Dust and water resistant case for your Airpods
  3. Power bank with dust and water resistant features

After checking pleas view our offer and think about your next step...

We also offer:

  • Free shipping in USA
  • Compatible iPhone models: X, XS, XS MAX, XR, 11, 11 PRO, 11 PRO MAX
  • Special conditions for dropshipping and/or affiliate business owners
  • Best technical team for your wishes

 

Our Team Is Always Ready For Innovations, We Are Always Wellcome Innovators

We are always looking for new members of our team,

If you have innovation idea and you need any kind of support please contact directly
story_txt:
BNY 1 - Worlds First Practical Charging Case For iPhone & Airpods 
BY Bloc New York
Bloc New York is presenting you concept of worlds first water resistant (IP67) charging case for iPhone and Airpods in 1 case - Model BNY 1
Everything in one - power bank, iPhone case and aiprods case. 
Additional Features 

Simple and luxury design
iPhone and aiprods in one charging case
Water resistant (IP67) 
No Fingerprints On Your New Case
Soft material designed case is presented in 4 colors (Simple White, Solid Blue, Exclusive Yellow, Luxury Black)

 


 
We create for your necessity
Imagine You Have BNY 1:

No more case for Airpods in your pocket
No more different charging accessories for Airpods or iPhone
No more separate power banks and cables
No more worries about dust and water
No more fingerprints on phone or on case
Holding exclusive and innovation case in our hand

 

 

More About Offer
Better to understand what we offer pleas check for prices on the market for separate products which are included on BNY 1 :

Dust and water resistant case for your iPhone
Dust and water resistant case for your Airpods
Power bank with dust and water resistant features

After checking pleas view our offer and think about your next step...
We also offer:

Free shipping in USA
Compatible iPhone models: X, XS, XS MAX, XR, 11, 11 PRO, 11 PRO MAX
Special conditions for dropshipping and/or affiliate business owners
Best technical team for your wishes

 



Our Team Is Always Ready For Innovations, We Are Always Wellcome Innovators

We are always looking for new members of our team,
If you have innovation idea and you need any kind of support please contact directly

story:
Hi, I’m Dan Stevens. For the past 40 years I have been seeking out challenges and providing solutions. 

Over the past several years, we have lost much of our privacy and anonymity in many areas of our lives. This now includes our cell phone life and lifestyle. 

There is nothing more annoying, frustrating and sometimes embarrassing than getting calls from people who you don't want to get calls from, or marketing companies who bought your cell number from another company who you had to give it to. If you're getting bombarded with solicitation calls on your cell phone, then you know what I mean!

As a professional or business person, do you have your personal cell number on your business card? If so, you have both personal and business calls coming to your personal cell number. That can be a bit awkward! 

What if you are dating (on or offline) and have to give your personal cell number to people you don't really know that well? That can be embarrassing and sometimes scary. After all, your personal cell number can be traced to you, and in turn, to your private and personal information.

There are many reasons to have a secondary private, separate, intelligent, intuitive and anonymous cell number that forwards to your current smart phone. Through CallingVault's password protected Free App, you will have total control of who gets through (contacts or non-contacts), when they get through, or even if they get through, before you ever have to say “Hello”! 

You can also text and MMS (pictures and videos) through CallingVault and everything remains separate, secure and private.  You can pick an area code from anywhere in the U.S. with a large variety of phone numbers to choose from in each available area code. You are also guaranteed that we will never give or sell any of your personal or private information out for any solicitation purposes!

The first version of CallingVault  is ready for market, but the public won't know we exist unless we can launch a successful marketing campaign. That's where you come in! 

We need capital to get the word out. Your support would enable us to help the masses who are, or will be experiencing the theft of their cellular privacy!

Let me personally thank you in advance for your interest and hopefully your support in helping build a disruptive force against the powers who are trying to limit our cell phone freedom and privacy!

Please use the Indiegogo share tools to reach others who may be interested in helping the cause!

story:
Say "Hello" to Square One

Square One is the first multi-purpose charger that solves several challenges with chargers and smartphone stands within today’s marketplace.

PATENT PENDING

Square One: SOLO Features:

  • Wireless Desktop Charger

  • LED Video Lights

  • Collapsible Telescoping Stand

  • USB & Battery Power

Enjoy the convenience of wireless charging, by eliminating the need for adapters, cords and plugs. Over time, the charging ports on your smartphone can be broken or become damaged. This could become costly and may even require you to buy a new phone.

Square One: SOLO's size and ability is surprisingly deceptive. Within a 4.25 X 4.25 X 1.25 inch footprint exists a wireless charger, telescoping stand, video lights, powered USB ports and portable battery power.




HOW TO MAKE A PLEDGE

Phase ONE (Early Bird)

Select a rewards package most suitable for your smartphone.



WHY SQUARE ONE? WELL...

No other charger offers the flexibility of a built in height adjustable stand and available dimmable LED lighting, for video related conversations. Also included, is a backup battery providing extra power for your other accessories. Eliminating the need to buy multiple stands and chargers to match the power of just one SQUARE ONE: SOLO .



WIRELESS CHARGER

SQUARE ONE: SOLO is a one of a kind accessory, which offers next generation wireless charging technology, for use with most popular smartphones. Release yourself from plugs, cords and wires. Most USB based plugs could harm or do damage to your phone, with SQ1 just place it and you're charging.

Mounting your device has never been simpler with our unique clamp free, universal mounting surface, which can accommodate most standard and some larger size smartphones such as the Note Series from Samsung.

FACT: IN THE SUMMER OF 2015 SAMSUNG ANNOUNCED THAT "ALL" OF THEIR SMARTPHONES AND DEVICES WILL BE SHIPPED WITH WIRELESS CHARGING INTEGRATED. AN INDICATOR THAT WIRELESS CHARGING SOON WILL BECOME THE STANDARD. YAY! :-)


Please review the short list of Qi® Wireless ready/integrated smartphones and devices below.

LED VIDEO LIGHTS

With the inclusion of dimmable LED video lights SQUARE ONE: SOLO is perfect while using Skype®, ooVoo®, Tango®, WhatsApp®, Google Hangouts® and many more! Now you can broadcast, chat or record those special moments on your smartphone in full detail with available soft, warm lighting built right in.


ENJOY HANDS-FREE VIDEO CHAT CONVERSATIONS AND BROADCASTS


TAKE BETTER PHOTOS WITH THE BLUETOOTH® ENABLED SMARTPHONE APP (COMING SOON)


COLLAPSIBLE TELESCOPING STAND

While most smartphone stands offer limited positions, functions and features, the collapsible telescoping stand found inside of SQUARE ONE: SOLO offers you an unlimited range of positions and flexibility. Allowing you to easily rotate your smartphone from landscape to portrait, horizontal to vertical, and extend the collapsible telescoping arm up to 9" of viewing height!



A "SMARTER" STAND FOR YOUR SMARTPHONE


HANDS FREE VIEWING WHILE AT WORK OR HOME


SMALL, COMPACT, UNOBTRUSIVE DESIGN


POWER YOUR ACCESSORIES


BONUS FEATURE: DIMMABLE DESK LAMP


*SMARTPHONE COMPATIBILITY LIST

A SHORTLIST OF COMPATIBLE PHONES & DEVICES THAT ARE WIRELESS READY OR WIRELESS INTEGRATED. CHECK WITH YOUR PHONE'S MANUFACTURER FOR DETAILS.

Bold = Integrated

HTC Droid DNA, HTC Droid Incredible 4G LTE, HTC Droid Incredible 2, HTC Rezound, LG G3, LG G3 Prime,LG G3 Cat 6, LG G4, LG Optimus G Pro 2, LG Optimus G Pro, LG Spectrum, LG Optimus, LG Lucid 2, Google Nexus 4, Google Nexus 5, Google Nexus 6, Motorola Droid Maxx, Motorola Ultra M, Motorola Droid Bionic, Motorola Droid Turbo, Samsung Galaxy Note 2, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, Samsung Galaxy Note 4, Samsung Galaxy Note 5, Samsung Galaxy Note Edge, Samsung Galaxy S3, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy S5, Samsung Galaxy S6, Samsung Galaxy S6 edge, Samsung Galaxy S6 active, Sony Xperia Z3, Sony Z3v, YotaPhone 2

Do you see yours listed? Some of the devices listed above are considered "wireless integrated" using the Qi® Wireless standard. Other devices that are "wireless ready" may require placement of a wireless receiver (patch) into the battery compartment area. iPhones requires the use of a case with an embedded wireless receiver.

FOR A COMPREHENSIVE LIST OF ALL 2015 SMARTPHONES UTILIZING THE Qi® WIRELESS CHARGING METHOD VISIT:  CLICK HERE FOR AN INTERACTIVE LISTING OF SMARTPHONES AND DEVICES   (THIS LINK GOES TO AN EXTERNAL WEBSITE )

NOTE: We have decided to focus our campaign on the most widely used brands, Samsung & iPhone. As part of your pledge please review and select the correct package with the accompanying receiver patch, and or case for your phone. If your device is wireless "installed/standard" select the base package without a patch/case.


How Square One was born

Over the past three years or more I have been working hard day, night, weekends and a little at a time to take SQ1 from concept to creation. You may have heard the saying, “Oh well, back to square one!” It's not by accident that SQ1 is named after such a popular expression. What literally started out as a need to have my hands free to type and Skype®, has evolved into a great idea packed with new and exciting features and to be candid, Square One's timing is now. Right now.



RISKS & CHALLENGES

Creating a new electronic product can be complex, challenging and require one to constantly re-think the process and ask, “Have I done enough?” I believe so, however, I/we are determined to address and resolve any unexpected challenges in an expeditious manner, to ensure that SQ1 truly will become “The Ultimate Wireless Charger.” We realize that there are several components to this design and all parts must come together and work as one. Our working prototype and CAD files will work as a guide, for the required team of experts, who will reverse engineer my work and remove certain risks from the process. Therefore, extensive testing of all electrical components and Qi® Wireless certification is required before, during and after the manufacturing and assembly stages have begun.


DESIGN ADJUSTMENTS

As with all challenges associated with manufacturing, the biggest one is unforeseen “changes”; from a conceptual prototype, to an actual production ready finished piece. As a result, we may incur delays from the manufacturing vendor. Other challenges to consider is design compromise, adjustments and quality control. You have my word, that I will not rush the process. My goal is to ensure that SQ1 is of the highest quality and that our customers are loyal, not just satisfied. I am in no hurry to just get SQ1 on the market.

MANUFACTURING & PRODUCTION

Creating the tooling and electronics, within a product like this, is expensive and requires expert knowledge to get it correct. Creating the molds for this product typically is estimated to take 30-60 days, which is where delays may come into play. To minimize that possibility, we're working with tooling manufacturers partners with a proven track record for quality,trusted fabrication and construction methods for electronic devices.

FULFILLMENT & LOGISTICS

Let's be candid, in life things happen that one could have never planned for: suppliers may miss a deadline, supply shortage, equipment failures or a shipment may get lost. Many of these real world manufacturing scenarios could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks, we will enter the manufacturing stage with at least one back-up supplier for each component. We will identify and have a back-up supplier on standby who could step in and resolve any major/minor challenges during this process. A tenacious project manager will be tasked to steer the fulfillment process through all obstacles, which could potentially cause further delays.

We will be working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in large quantities. There will be some surprises as we walk through together with you. All obstacle along the road will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge and passion, third party expertise and an overall goal of making SQ1 the best for you and your family.

Remember any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us make Square One the industry standard for smartphone chargers and devices. It is time to evolve again.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

You can help by selecting one of the pledges above, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page. Click on the links below and/or use the IndieGoGo sharing tools.

Thank you eternally
