story:
Short Summary

"Apple; Don't Take My Jack Away!" 

FACT: iPhone 7/7+ has no 3.5mm Jack
FACT: Apple sells "Lightning to 3.5mm" adapter only, no power
FACT: Thanks to Apple's MFI Program we can make an MFI Adapter with POWER with actual Apple Lightning Connectors
FACT: We need your help to fund this project
FACT: We think we can start delivering February

What We Need & What You Get

What we need now:

We are a family owned business and your help is important to our success. The hard part is over, now we need to pay to get Apple's approval to purchase the authentic "Lightning" connectors that are in short supply. The more backers we get, the faster we can ship the POWER AUX 7.

Having Apple approve the project allows us to purchase APPLE CERTIFIED CONNECTORS and proudly display “MFI” or “MADE FOR IPHONE” on our product and packaging. As an Apple Licensed Developer, we refuse to make cheap aftermarket knock-offs that can damage your phone.

What you get:

We have many cool perks that includes kits for your iPhone 7 and Apple device. Each package comes with the POWER AUX 7 that will ship in early March (Target is February, just need to have enough backers to get in the production line ahead of others). 

You get the AUTHENTIC MFI APPLE APPROVED POWER AUX 7 shipped to your door. Great as a gift idea. 

ALL Backers from December 1st through the 24th will get an attached "GIFT CERTIFICATE" they can print out and give as a Holiday Gift.  

How Much We Need and Where the Funding Goes:

GOAL is $10,000/USD

What the funding will be used for:

  • The application fees for Apple PPID: $550/USD
  • Design Engineer fees due: $3000/USD
  • Self-Testing for PPID and Prototype Samples: $2500
  • Contract and Legal Fees: $2000
  • Tooling/Molds and Raw Materials: $10,000 (PAID)
  • Shipping: (average cost of $3.50/ea., via USPS first class, included in all Perks)

Most iPhone users understand the difference between authentic MFI accessories that meet or exceed Apple’s high quality requirements and the fakes, knock-offs, counterfeits, and no name cheap aftermarket accessories.

Ways you can help:

We ask unselfishly that you purchase original Apple products or “MFI” approved accessories to help support those that follow the rules. We want to help you by providing high quality, first to market, unique products such as the POWER AUX 7. We are at the final phase of development and timing for your support is EPIC.

The Impact

Your contribution has a tremendous trickle-down effect making a HUGE difference in many lives, companies, and customers Worldwide. Thank you for helping us during the critical phase of our start-up and bringing logical, practical, and innovative solutions to market.

With your help we will deliver ahead of schedule and follow-up with additional next generation products. A successful campaign means the start of a new company and the American Dream.

Please note; Unlike other adapters, ours are all "Case Friendly" in design. This allows you to use our adapter with most cases on your phone. 

PERKS for our supporters

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Who We Are

We are a hybrid of old school meets new generation with the experience to bring disruptive technologies to market. And with your help, we can succeed..

We have assembled what we call “The Manufacturing and New Products Dream Team” with over 30 YEARS PLUS MANUFACTURING EXPERIENCE. Individually while working for other companies, we have placed hundreds of new products into the market place that have generated over a “BILLION” in sales.   

To date, none of us have financially benefited from our employments other than the typical salary and a modest 401k plan. From the bottom of our hearts, we appreciate your contributions that will catapult our company allowing us to bring many, many IP driven technology products to market in the near future.

We understand lean manufacturing and quality beginning with Six Sigma Quality Control Measures to ensure our products, our ODM customers, and you, the ultimate end users are more than satisfied.

Short Summary

Apple’s decision to remove the 3.5mm port created frenzy around the World with companies scrambling to produce a solution. Fact: Apple was the second company to remove the 3.5mm from the handset.

Simple Solutions backed by experience, passion, and integrity. Our team has over 30 years designing, manufacturing, and managing products that deliver a story.

We are only ONE of MANY companies with a viable solution ready for Q1 2017. Yet, we are one of only a few that took our time to play by the rules Apple established under the MFI program That being said, we need your help in fulfilling our goal to bring you the POWER AUX 7. With your help and support, we can complete the required tooling, packaging, testing, and raw material acquisition for production within the next few weeks.

Risks & Challenges

We have already met some of the biggest challenges to date. You will find this section interesting as we explain the challenges and how manufacturers and brands are approved and supported by Apple to make MFI accessories and our POWER AUX 7.

Challenges Complete to date including:

  • Getting the Apple Developers MFI License: September 2012
  • Hiring an industrial design team for the POWER AUX 7: April 2016
  • Selecting an MFI Apple approved factory: Final selection completed August 2016 using the same factory for other projects since May 2013.

CURRENT CHALLENGES: Our current challenge is getting approval in the form of a PPID and with your help and our experience; we should have this completed by the second week of December. Our team has done this in the past while working for or consulting with other companies. In fact, under the Versio Mobile brand we were one of only a few to ship the original MFI Lightning Cables in January 2013 and shipped over 400,000 units by April of 2017. Back then, C48 connectors where very hard to come by. Chances for success: HIGH

ADDITIONAL CHALLENGE: Today the challenge ensuring we get the connectors required to build the POWER AUX 7 from Apple’s certified supply chain. The new female Lightning connector that allows the charging is in short demand. Upon a successful campaign, we can place the deposits required to ensure delivery in January.

HOW WE PLAN TO SUCCEED: We have done this many, many times for the other companies we worked for. We work closely with the largest, and most influential MFI manufacturers and their teams and usually have great results ahead of time. Relationships are key and we understand the importance after having done business for long periods of time with the same factories.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • We ask everyone and anyone to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • What colors other than Silver do you prefer? See our pink option below...
 
 
 

TIMELINE

COMPLETED THUS FAR:

/September 2012/ Apple MFI Developers License Agreement signed.

/February 2016/ with over 30 years manufacturing in China, we heard through the grapevine that Apple was removing the 3.5mm port from the iPhone 7 and identified the problem: (users cannot listen to sources if the iPhone runs out of power)

/May 2016/ The challenge to find a solution:  Build an adapter that will not tangle, identify the best length, easy to carry while traveling, and hire the design engineering team for ID.

/June 2016/ The Eureka Moment in Design: (Solved the problem and brainstormed and designed a unit that has a female charging port and the required volume/call/answer buttons with 3.5mm Jack).

/September 2016/ creating a prototype:  Wu Ranglin’s genius to design.

/October 2016/ start Crowd Funding Campaign on Indiegogo with a target date of November 23rd. (ACTUAL DATE: December 1st, 2016)

 

TO BE COMPLETED:

/December 2016/ Creating four T1 Samples for PPID approval at UL Labs in China. (DONE)

/December 2016/ after approval, go into tooling phase – 1-2 weeks.

/December 2016/ Order connectors upon PPID approval

/December 2016/ Take possession of connectors

/January 2017/ Purchase raw materials for production

/January 2017/ Pilot test run, confirm mass production QC levels, run additional weather, strain, drop, and bend testing

/February 2017/ After Chinese New Year, schedule production

/March 2017/ Schedule exit inspection, confirm quality levels, ship via ocean to USA

/March-April/ Deliver to customers. (Please note that we will probably airfreight the shipment in at the end of February for February or early March delivery). This is our ultimate goal with a very high probability.

We give thanks to Bensound for the music played in our video. Please visit http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music for royal free music.

"Apple; Don't Take My Jack Away!" 
FACT: iPhone 7/7+ has no 3.5mm JackFACT: Apple sells "Lightning to 3.5mm" adapter only, no powerFACT: Thanks to Apple's MFI Program we can make an MFI Adapter with POWER with actual Apple Lightning ConnectorsFACT: We need your help to fund this projectFACT: We think we can start delivering February
What We Need & What You Get
What we need now:
We are a family owned business and your help is important to our success. The hard part is over, now we need to pay to get Apple's approval to purchase the authentic "Lightning" connectors that are in short supply. The more backers we get, the faster we can ship the POWER AUX 7.
Having Apple approve the project allows us to purchase APPLE CERTIFIED CONNECTORS and proudly display “MFI” or “MADE FOR IPHONE” on our product and packaging. As an Apple Licensed Developer, we refuse to make cheap aftermarket knock-offs that can damage your phone.
What you get:
We have many cool perks that includes kits for your iPhone 7 and Apple device. Each package comes with the POWER AUX 7 that will ship in early March (Target is February, just need to have enough backers to get in the production line ahead of others). 
You get the AUTHENTIC MFI APPLE APPROVED POWER AUX 7 shipped to your door. Great as a gift idea. 
ALL Backers from December 1st through the 24th will get an attached "GIFT CERTIFICATE" they can print out and give as a Holiday Gift.  
How Much We Need and Where the Funding Goes:
GOAL is $10,000/USD
What the funding will be used for:

The application fees for Apple PPID: $550/USD
Design Engineer fees due: $3000/USD
Self-Testing for PPID and Prototype Samples: $2500
Contract and Legal Fees: $2000
Tooling/Molds and Raw Materials: $10,000 (PAID)
Shipping: (average cost of $3.50/ea., via USPS first class, included in all Perks)

story:
The power and simplicity of a walkie-talkie integrated with your smartphone

Upgrade your adventure sports experience with reliable, free and instant communication that works alongside your phone's existing features

Features

How it works

The Airwave is great for


Rewards

We've got some really cool limited edition perks for our backers, check them out here!

Funding

The Airwave has already been funded up to the creation of a fully operational, production-ready prototype and Android app. We now need your support to hit a funding goal of $10,000 which will be used to pay for the following:
1. Manufacturing of the Airwave hardware (circuit board and injection moulded case)
2. Development of the iOS software

Team

FAQ

When will the iOS version be out? Assuming we get funded the iOS version will be available as soon as we ship your Airwave.
When do I select my Airwave colour? Once the campaign ends we will send out a message to you asking which colour you would like. Unfortunately Indiegogo don't provide the functionality to select this at the time of purchase.
When do I select my perk size and colour? Once the campaign ends we will send out a message to you asking which colour and size you would like. Unfortunately Indiegogo don't provide the functionality to select this at the time of purchase.
How do I know if the Airwave works with my walkie-talkie? The Airwave is currently compatible with all major brands including Motorola, I-Com, Baofeng, Midland, Cobra, Kenwood. The walkie-talkie must feature a headset jack, which most do.
How do I connect the Airwave to my walkie-talkie? When you buy an Airwave we also include the connector cable free. We'll ask you by email at the end of the campaign which brand you own. You can also buy them direct from us.
Does the Airwave work with waterproof walkie-talkies? Not yet. Waterproof walkie-talkies have a different type of audio jack connection. We are working on sourcing a custom cable from one of our suppliers and hope this will be available in the near future.
What colours does the Airwave come in? At the moment blue and red.
Does the Airwave interfere with avalanche transceivers? No, transceivers operate on a very narrow spectrum of radio (457 kHz) globally, specially reserved for safety purposes. The same applies to Bluetooth which the Airwave uses to connect to your phone so there is no chance of interference.
Does everyone in my group need an Airwave? No. The Airwave is designed as a stand-alone piece of kit that provides it's user with enhanced functionality from their smartphone. For example, you can be sitting in the bar whilst your kids are on the hill. Just hail them on the radio to call them down.

   That is ClipSum ?

He is a holder to apply to your smartphone and thus provide it with new uses, whose biggest advantage deployment on any device, being fully integrated into it.

We present a device capable of multiplying uses your smartphone wherever you are. Whether at home or in the car, at work or on the street, their applications are extensive.

   ClipSum arises from the need to cover the needs arising from the development of smartphones, positioning in any environment and situation. The combination of high quality material with a polished and sleek design and a simple but efficient application, give new uses your smartphone.

  • simple, effective and elegant.

  • always available on your mobile.

  • place it in the drive vertically or horizontally.

  • can be placed even on sleeves or covers.

story:
All in one wall charger and powerbank

Why Would You Get A Powerbank Or A Wall Charger When You Can Get All In One?

SpinOn is the first  battery charger for smartphones that charges  an inside battery while you charge your smartphone so it can continue to charge your device everywhere

 

Never more out of battery

SpinOn Helps To Prevent Battery Damages Maximizing Its Lifetime

Thanks to the stable flux of charge  provided by the integrated battery, SpinOn  lengthening the life and the efficiency of your battery

Pocket Sized And Easy Portable

Compatible With Any Device

Thanks To Its Design SpinOn Fits With European And American Socket

Charge Your Device Anytime And Everywhere

With Spinon You No Longer Have To Remember To Charge Spare Batteries Or Powerbanks, You Have Everything In One Object!

Tech Specs

Timeline

WITH YOUR HELP CHARGING WON’T BE A PROBLEM ANYMORE

 

We Need Your Help

We've come a long way from where we began.

All the obstacles are behind us now, and the top quality manufacturing partner has lined up! With your help, we will be able to meet the requirement of minimum orders to start production.

With your help charging won’t be a problem anymore. Pledge now and help us spread the words, together we will bring SpinOn to the consumers market and of course your hands!

Other Ways You Can Get Involved!

If you don’t feel like you can contribute the amounts listed, but you want to help us achieve our goal, please consider passing our campaign onto to someone who may be interested! Drop links in tip jars, friends’ emails, social media or post them on your favorite blogs' comment sections! Please help us get the word out!

PRODUCT FAQ

How does SpinOn work?
SpinOn is exactly like your old charger, but when you take it out from the wall, It will continue working like a power-bank

Why Did We Create SPIN-ON?
We create SpinOn because we were tired of being out of charge.
We create SpinOn because we were tired of buying a wall charger AND a power bank.
We create SpinOn because we were tired of charging a wall charger AND a power bank, 
We create SpinOn because we knew that every time we were charging our devices we were damaging our battery.
We create SpinOn to never be out of charge anymore. 
We create SpinOn because we love smart innovations.

How does SpinOn prevent battery damages and extend battery’s lifetime??
A regular charger cause battery damages, experts warn us that it slowly kills the battery with heat and mini-cycles, thanks to an integrated chip,SpinOn is able to stabilize the flux of charge in case of absence or heat of electricity, preventing battery damages and extending battery lifetime 

Why would I buy SpinOn over any other charger?
Because SpinOn is the first all in one wall charger and power bank that extend the life of your battery and more, why would you buy a power bank and/or a wall charger if u can have both?!

Which devices can I charge with SpinOn?
SPIN-ON has the ability to charge a lot of devices including: iPhones, Android phones, Windows phones, iPads, Android Tablets, GoPros, Bluetooth headphones and the list goes on. Connect your own cable and get charged!!

How long is the warranty?
Two years warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship.

SHIPPING FAQ

When SpinOn expected to ship?
SpinOn is scheduled to ship September 2017.

How will my order be shipped?
We will be shipping with the most suitable premium courier and that will vary between countries. All shipments will have tracking which will be emailed to you once the delivery has been shipped.

Which countries do you ship to?
We ship to all countries excluding the following which have been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria & Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any these countries we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more, however we cannot guarantee the shipment's arrival.

Will I need to pay any VAT or import tax?
We will be shipping from Italy. Hence for countries that accept shipments from these countries VAT or tax free there are no additional duties or taxes. 
 

Risks And Challenges

From our  engineering and market experience with daily cross discipline collaboration, we understand what it takes to bring an innovative product to fruition. 
Thinking about former experiences, we've chosen to spend the whole last months going through all the processes, to start the campaign now that everything is all set and ready to go. 
The selected manufacturing partner has demonstrated its experience, attention to details and effective certified management systems, when producing our working prototypes. 
We're going to use the same manufacturer for the next mass production, and we will also supervise the manufacturing and QC process. This way, the project risks are minimized. 
We'll keep you all informed with updates during the campaign as well as during the production!

story: Soon we will be on Android and IOS platforms, as now we need to develope our application more into other platform such as windows, Symbian and Blackberry Platforms and we plan to use the funds to hire more developers and rent bigger server around the world.

story:
Who Are We?

ZeroLemon is created by a handful of smartphone enthusiasts who want more power with their phones and provide the best battery solution. We created the world’s first Tri-Cell Battery Design and apply it to all flagship smartphones so that users around the world can enjoy the world’s highest capacity battery.

ZeroLemon 4000mAh Battery Case for New iPhone 8 

Extend 100% Power to iPhone 8 - The powerful 4000mAh Li-polymer extended battery can effectively provide 100%+ extra battery life to iPhone 8, which is equivalent to add 12 + hours talk time or 7+ hours movie time.

Apple Certified Connector - Built Apple Certified Connector works with all functions with your iPhone 8 charging case. 100% compatible with iOS 11, Apple Pay, and future iOS software updates.

Ultra Slim Protection - ZeroLemon Slim Juicer protects your iPhone 8 from scratches and other daily wears and tear, yet small and convenient enough to fit easily in your hand or in your pocket.

Know Before You Go - 4 LED Lights indicates battery levels and charging status. Integrated button allows you to choose when to charge for when you need it most.

Easy to install - ZeroLemon battery case for iPhone 8 with a good design to make you easier to install,just need three steps to successfully install the battery case onto your iPhone.

Risks & Challenges
We are now in our 5th year of business, so we are very confident in our manufacturing and shipping processes.However, there are always risks and challenges with the production of anything.

There can be delays at the manufacturing facilities if the factory falls behind schedule, or shipping time tables can be delayed due to weather, equipment, carriers or simply human error.

Exporting product over any holiday season can also add unforeseen delays and there is always the risk that items make it all the way to it's destination and they get held up in customs for some unknown reason!


Please understand that a more advanced product than initially planned might postpone deliveries. These additionals may also have an influence on the final size and weight of the product.

Customer Service & Warranty
No matter what uncertains there may be, we are always here to solve for our customer and stand behind ZeroLemon.

  • Reach us at info@zerolemon.com,24 hours / 6 days a week support.
  • 365 days ZeroLemon Guarantee Warranty. 100% Zero Defect Guarantee.

Social Media Share

Don’t worry if you can’t contribute to the campaign – you can still participate by spreading the word!

  • Use the Indiegogo share buttons - let people know you've backed our campaign on your social media outlets!
  • Give us a ' like' on Facebook, or Instagram!

story:
What is crumd?

crumd connects digital things with the real world. It is a digital and free tool kit making your life easier and allowing you to do anything you can imagine. Microchips, at 5 cents each, allow you to play enormous amounts of data while connected to a social media platform.

Everything already exists in our digital lives, everything has already been invented. There is a social network for everything, there are solutions for our everyday lives. Something that does not exist, however, is the connection between the digital and the analog world.

crumds are small crumbs. These crumbs consist of so-called NFC-tags. NFC stands for “Near Field Communication.” They are small, electromagnetic transmitters and receivers. Such an NFC-tag costs but a few cents. Their storage capacity covers merely 888 bytes, which is 0.000888 megabytes, making them appear relatively uninteresting.

Our idea is simple. 
But our idea is revolutionary for all of our lives.

Explanation Video

crumd uses a small memory capacity of just 888 bytes, simply for saving a variable link URL as a reference to your own user area on crumd.com. If you write or read a crumd with your smart phone, merely the path to something is read or written. With this simple technique we've created an open, free platform as a social connection of the digital and analog world. For everyone.

“Whatever you can imagine.” – That is crumd’s claim. Crumd is simply the open platform for your ideas. Users develop the possibilities themselves. Completely free and without limitations.

crumd is not a closed system. Rather, it is like an open source puzzle comprised of many small crumbs. The whole cookie stretches as far as your imagination.

Look at the tool kit right here on your smart phone by moving your device to the left or the right. You can search according to lists that have been pre-configured by other users or create your own and, if you wish to do so, make them open to the community.

Demo

If you write — that is, tag — a crumd with your smartphone, the color scheme is red. Red as a metaphor for record, as in writing and recording. If you want to read a crumd by putting your smartphone close to it, the color changes to green, for the association with hearing, reading, listening.

“crumd is the connection between the analog and the digital world. Small crumbs that make your real life and your digital life easier.”

How it works?

crumd works via simple lists. Simply create a list with your wishes in your secure space on crumd.com. You can attach images, videos, locations, and messages from your smartphone as well. These will be kept safe on the crumd server. Only you are able to determine who is allowed to read the crumd. Be it a boyfriend, a girlfriend, or after all the entire world.

When your list of information or data such as videos, links, or locations is complete, hold your smartphone close to the crumd, in order to write it or look for other users’ lists via hashtags. There are crumds that are open for everyone and crumds that are bound to users within your list of friends. If you hold your smartphone close to the crumb, an individual message will appear after the read-out, which will lead you to the desired content. All list types and elements are individual components which may be mixed together by the user, such as a list element to check off, a list element with a copy tap-function, or a media element.

The crumds themselves are crumbs, which also are made of individual crumbs. Just like Lego … You are able to mix together whatever you want. You can also begin by searching for a list via the hashtag and use it as a template.

 

Examples

Example printer:

Can't remember what kind of cartridge your printer needs? Simply stick a crumd — visible or invisible — on your printer, hold your smartphone close to it, and tag it with information about the printer right in place.

 

Example selling:

The best marketplace for your old stuff is real life. Stick a crumd on your scooter and tag it with information such as price, images, text, and your contact details. By being able to simultaneously save the geodata when tagging, it is very easy to view potential offers from the surrounding area in the marketplace of crumd.com without scanning a crumd. Someone walking past this scooter can scan the crumd and read the related offer. Thus, the whole world becomes your marketplace.

“It's just like eBay, but connected to real life.”

 

Example fridge:

You are out and about at the supermarket and have no idea what is still left in your fridge at home? On crumd, roommates can create a shopping list together. If something is empty, write it down. Contents may be queried right then and there or en route. And after your purchase has been sorted and put away, you simply reset the content. This way, you know what you have and what you are missing, even while you are on the go. If one of your roommates writes the crumd on the fridge, you receive a push notification, even en route.

 

Example restaurant:

You are standing in front of a restaurant, studying the menu and wondering if there is anything in here for you and how it tastes? The written menu will hardly make you any smarter. Simply watch the live videos and reviews of other guests. Even the owner is able to expand his menu by a sort of augmented reality. Restaurants are able to add a crumd to the display window or wherever they want and fill it with useful videos, reviews, and the current menu for example, or perhaps simply with an offer that applies only for that day. This way, users are able to digitally file all information on this restaurant in crumd's cloud. In their space, their social media portal from crumd.

 

Example adventure:

View images, videos, and tips of other visitors, who have been there before you. Location-bound information is exactly where you currently need it to be. In a place where it might interest you right now. Digital information at a local spot, but not bound to locations; that is the solution we are looking for.

Enterprises in the surrounding area have the possibility to advertise for themselves and their products. This works quite simply. Enter a budget and pay comfortably via Paypal right then and there. You only pay if somebody actually views your ad and you are able to control, pause, expand, and adjust your advertising material while being en route as well. Comparable with Google AdWords, but in real life. When the budget is spent, crumd will notify you of it on your user profile and will show the crumd’s location as a little reminder.

 

Example car:

Search for a pre-made service pamphlet in order to leave some useful information for you, your customers, and other repair shops. A car part is always making the same problems in your vehicle? Then make note of it for others as well as for yourself. When the next user sees the crumd, e.g. on the inside of the engine cover, they will have all files, information, and tips at their disposal. Furthermore, it is usable digitally and online worldwide.

 

Those who would like to have more than 2 GB per month can book additional space (similar to Dropbox).

 

Example data storage:

Forget CDs, USB sticks, or hard drives. Select the data you would like to save on a small crumd and upload it to your own cloud. You have 2 GB at your disposal. How does it work? The NFC-tag’s 540 Byte serve as a link to your personal storage area on your crumd profile. Similar to a dropbox, you have access to your data from anywhere, but physically in an actual place as well. As part of a strong community, we gift 2 GB in storage space to each user.

 

Example snap note:

Leave a message for your family or friends. Once scanned the conversation is started and can be continued from anywhere. Don’t miss any new messages by activating push-notifications. Messages, photos and videos can be provided with a limited lifetime, similar to snapchat. You can also enable access for selected devices only. So the crumd always has to be scanned locally in order to reveal the information.

 

Example flirting:

You like someone but are too shy to go and talk to them? Then convey only those pieces of information that you are comfortable sharing. Leave a tagged crumd on your crush’s car, scooter, or bike. Select first whether and what you would like to disclose. If they accept your flirt request, you will be able to see it via their crumd profile. This way you only give a response to exactly that one person, e.g. your phone number.

“It's connected to real life.”

Or you search for the right partner via a fact sheet. Enter your search criteria and find the person you are looking for. Controlling who gets to learn more about you is in your hands. You are able to see people in your area via the surrounding geodata. Creating a link to Tinder, or similar apps, is incredibly easy as well.

 

Example room:

You have selected some nice things online for your bathroom or perhaps taken pictures of something you'd like to have while you were out and about? Beautiful things that would be a perfect fit? Then make a note of them right then and there. Either through your Pinterest account or as a simple link on a crumd in your bathroom. Update and share your ideas with others.

 

Example WiFi key:

Write it down for yourself and others.

 

Example fitness:

Set yourself tasks and goals for the gym, and keep track of your exercises and your progress in your fitness log. If you do sports at home, hold your smartphone close to the crumd. Depending on the day of the week that is saved on your smartphone, you will see what exercises await you today. If you are at your gym, you are even able to read about what you have to do directly from the training device via your account with crumd. Verification through your profile ID allows only you to see the information and data stored there for you.

 

Example calendar:

A family calendar with a reminder. You like analog calendars, but you do not want to miss out on the benefits of the digital world? Then simply do both. Read and write the crumd on your calendar from home or on the go. Feed your events with reminders. Live out your diary. Activate recurring events.

 

Example contacts:

Exchanging contacts is very easy. No matter if a crumd is in your wallet, sticking to your phone, printed on a brochure, or located anywhere else. Simply let others read, save, and process your contacts.

 

Example micro website:

A more local enterprise does not need its own website. A local enterprise needs something faster: A crumd site with information, current promotions, and typical pieces of website info that are located right at the entrance. That way, passers-by as well as online users are able to get to know your company. Directly at the store, quickly writable, quickly updatable, and without any running costs. Your company website is included in your data contingent of 2 GB. Other users can also simply save your shop, including location and location features, which in turn can be used and forwarded.

 

Example voice memos:

Voice memos on crumd. You are in a meeting and can hardly find your way through the paper chaos? Then record the meeting as an audio file and add the crumd with the recordings to your files. Pass them on.

 

Example paying:

Paying with crumd, e.g. for entry into a museum or zoo, spares you a long queue. Picture a crumd hanging in front of the cash register. You scan it and a Paypal payment request of the owner appears. After you pay online, a number is generated, a code for the sender and the recipient of the payment. You show it. Show it. If it matches the one from the cashier, you can get in immediately.

 

Example movies & videos:

Share movie playlists with your roommates via Amazon or Netflix, stored via crumd directly on the TV. Create movie tips and watch lists for yourself and your family.

 

Example finder’s reward:

Things that might be lost get a crumd with information on their owner and their direct contact details. It is possible to determine a small finder’s reward beforehand as well.

 

Example cook book:

Tag an individual page in a cook book with information and data on that recipe.

 

 

Example digital donation:

Send money to designated recipients in a quick and uncomplicated manner.

 

Example backup:

Use your crumds as a backup for your data. They are protected since only you have access to them with your device. Furthermore, unlike with analog storage methods, your data can be stored for eternity.

 

Example social:

Similar to Instagram, Twitter, or Facebook, crumd offers all possibilities which you are accustomed to through social networks. Subscribe to people, follow them, or follow individual crumds that you like.

 

The example of multi lists:

Create a number of functions on one and the same crumd and switch back and forth between the functions. For example function 1: a predefined question with a response option. That way, others can inform you about important matters quickly and with very little effort. Function 2: Use crumd as a time-recording system. Every time you come and go, you briefly scan the crumd. The time data is saved in your profile as a clear list.

 

So a crumd can:

1. be used by different users that will see different content according to their ID.
2. contain multiple functions for you. You can always reset the master between the crumd and any function.

All of this is possible on the same crumd for only 5 cents and you can create it yourself.

“The possibilities are endless; we could show you another million examples.”

And what are your ideas?
Send us your idea. We will post all user ideas here on Kickstarter.

 

Social

crumd offers the typical social media features.

Follow

Website owners are able to offer a follow button. That way, users can see their public crumds in a timeline, similar to the way it is on Instagram or Facebook, and they can follow them.

Share

Website owners are able to offer a share button. That way, you can share the information from your website on your own crumd.

Pin

All crumbs and all crumds can be collected virtually, similar to Pinterest.

Login

Social login via crumd.

Even without crumds you can access its advantages. With the hashtag search you can discover exciting things about the world around you. Over the radar, you can find all crumd activities in the vicinity. You can follow crumds and other users and stay informed about your friends‘ activities. You can share, like, comment and even crumd without having tags of your own.

iOS, the wavering obstacle

Technology:

On devices with Android and Windows, the short-range wireless technology NFC is already up and running. This technology is also a fixed component on Apple's iPhone or iPad in the iOS 11 to be released in the fall of 2017.

 

Summary

crumd has parallels with and connecting points to many systems and links them with your ideas and the actual, real world.

“Bring them all together.“

  • Dropbox: data storage with the connection to something physical and location-bound.
  • Pinterest: online catalogues of endless ideas.
  • Facebook, Instagram, Twitter: messages, friend lists, posts.
  • Google: places, images, ads.
  • XING, Linkedin: contacts and company information.
  • Whatsapp: send messages.
  • Snapchat: short-term messages.
  • Tinder: flirt possibilities.
  • Airbnb: find lodgings.

There are already certain redundant solutions here, just like the dog toilet idea (http://www.stadtzeitung.de/schwabmuenchen/lokal...). It is crumd’s goal to replace these hundreds of different standalone-solutions with a single portal. One app, one solution.

Costs

No costs for users; the portal is free and available to everyone worldwide.

Only the crumd tags themselves cost a few cents apiece and can be ordered online through crumd.com. People who only wish to read do not need any crumds. As a long-term goal, we aspire to provide a fixed free contingent of crumds for each user. These crumds are supposed to be manufactured from natural materials. Materials that are both weatherproof and environmentally friendly.

 

Seed money is needed for

Point 1: Development of the online portal and its Android and iOS apps. 
Point 2: Costs of the NFC-tags. 
Point 3: Costs of the free packages (incl. shipping costs) for distribution and the creation of a community. 
Point 4: Marketing measures, especially via Facebook, YouTube, and online press work. Each and every user receives a free starting package upon registration.
Point 5: Foundation of a private or public liability company.

It is an open, independent, and free platform. Open for everyone and everything. Each and every person is able to realize their own individual ideas with these components.

concept paper (EN)
concept paper (DE)

Packages

 

#lifewall

The #lifewall is an exclusive Ontop feature. This huge crumd synchronizes and saves all your data automatically in a 1 TB large cloud on crumd.com. We provide the synchronization service based on your smartphone ID. Only you get access to it. Should your smartphone change in the future, we will change the synchronization for you based on your new ID. These nice-to-have tags are only available in a limited edition of 150 pieces.

 

crumd company solutions. For example the Amazon Dash Button

Our goal is to develop individual software solutions for businesses. crumd solutions are tailored to specific requirements. So that users can, for example, register their own crumd instead of their own Dash Button at Amazon. In other words, we will develop tailor-made business solutions and extensions for companies.

crumd.com ᗧ•••

Further questions?

Contact us: hey@crumd.com

That way, passers-by as well as online users are able to get to know your company. Directly at the store, quickly writable, quickly updatable, and without any running costs. Your company website is included in your data contingent of 2 GB. Other users can also simply save your shop, including location and location features, which in turn can be used and forwarded. Example voice memos:Voice memos on crumd. You are in a meeting and can hardly find your way through the paper chaos? Then record the meeting as an audio file and add the crumd with the recordings to your files. Pass them on. Example paying:Paying with crumd, e.g. for entry into a museum or zoo, spares you a long queue. Picture a crumd hanging in front of the cash register. You scan it and a Paypal payment request of the owner appears. After you pay online, a number is generated, a code for the sender and the recipient of the payment. You show it. Show it. If it matches the one from the cashier, you can get in immediately. Example movies & videos:Share movie playlists with your roommates via Amazon or Netflix, stored via crumd directly on the TV. Create movie tips and watch lists for yourself and your family. Example finder’s reward:Things that might be lost get a crumd with information on their owner and their direct contact details. It is possible to determine a small finder’s reward beforehand as well. Example cook book:Tag an individual page in a cook book with information and data on that recipe.  Example digital donation:Send money to designated recipients in a quick and uncomplicated manner. Example backup:Use your crumds as a backup for your data. They are protected since only you have access to them with your device. Furthermore, unlike with analog storage methods, your data can be stored for eternity. Example social:Similar to Instagram, Twitter, or Facebook, crumd offers all possibilities which you are accustomed to through social networks. Subscribe to people, follow them, or follow individual crumds that you like. The example of multi lists:Create a number of functions on one and the same crumd and switch back and forth between the functions. For example function 1: a predefined question with a response option. That way, others can inform you about important matters quickly and with very little effort. Function 2: Use crumd as a time-recording system. Every time you come and go, you briefly scan the crumd. The time data is saved in your profile as a clear list. So a crumd can:1. be used by different users that will see different content according to their ID.2. contain multiple functions for you. You can always reset the master between the crumd and any function.All of this is possible on the same crumd for only 5 cents and you can create it yourself.“The possibilities are endless; we could show you another million examples.”And what are your ideas?Send us your idea. We will post all user ideas here on Kickstarter. Socialcrumd offers the typical social media features.FollowWebsite owners are able to offer a follow button. That way, users can see their public crumds in a timeline, similar to the way it is on Instagram or Facebook, and they can follow them.ShareWebsite owners are able to offer a share button. That way, you can share the information from your website on your own crumd.PinAll crumbs and all crumds can be collected virtually, similar to Pinterest.LoginSocial login via crumd.Even without crumds you can access its advantages. With the hashtag search you can discover exciting things about the world around you. Over the radar, you can find all crumd activities in the vicinity. You can follow crumds and other users and stay informed about your friends‘ activities. You can share, like, comment and even crumd without having tags of your own.iOS, the wavering obstacleTechnology:On devices with Android and Windows, the short-range wireless technology NFC is already up and running. This technology is also a fixed component on Apple's iPhone or iPad in the iOS 11 to be released in the fall of 2017. Summarycrumd has parallels with and connecting points to many systems and links them with your ideas and the actual, real world.“Bring them all together.“

Dropbox: data storage with the connection to something physical and location-bound.

Pinterest: online catalogues of endless ideas.

Facebook, Instagram, Twitter: messages, friend lists, posts.

Google: places, images, ads.

XING, Linkedin: contacts and company information.

Whatsapp: send messages.

Snapchat: short-term messages.

Tinder: flirt possibilities.

Airbnb: find lodgings.
There are already certain redundant solutions here, just like the dog toilet idea (http://www.stadtzeitung.de/schwabmuenchen/lokal...). It is crumd’s goal to replace these hundreds of different standalone-solutions with a single portal. One app, one solution.CostsNo costs for users; the portal is free and available to everyone worldwide.Only the crumd tags themselves cost a few cents apiece and can be ordered online through crumd.com. People who only wish to read do not need any crumds. As a long-term goal, we aspire to provide a fixed free contingent of crumds for each user. These crumds are supposed to be manufactured from natural materials. Materials that are both weatherproof and environmentally friendly. Seed money is needed forPoint 1: Development of the online portal and its Android and iOS apps. Point 2: Costs of the NFC-tags. Point 3: Costs of the free packages (incl. shipping costs) for distribution and the creation of a community. Point 4: Marketing measures, especially via Facebook, YouTube, and online press work. Each and every user receives a free starting package upon registration.Point 5: Foundation of a private or public liability company.It is an open, independent, and free platform. Open for everyone and everything. Each and every person is able to realize their own individual ideas with these components.concept paper (EN)concept paper (DE)Packages #lifewallThe #lifewall is an exclusive Ontop feature. This huge crumd synchronizes and saves all your data automatically in a 1 TB large cloud on crumd.com. We provide the synchronization service based on your smartphone ID. Only you get access to it. Should your smartphone change in the future, we will change the synchronization for you based on your new ID. These nice-to-have tags are only available in a limited edition of 150 pieces. crumd company solutions. For example the Amazon Dash ButtonOur goal is to develop individual software solutions for businesses. crumd solutions are tailored to specific requirements. So that users can, for example, register their own crumd instead of their own Dash Button at Amazon. In other words, we will develop tailor-made business solutions and extensions for companies.crumd.com ᗧ•••Further questions?Contact us: hey@crumd.com

story:
Like many of you, we’ve long had to choose between over-priced “brand name” iPhone cases that cost a small fortune, and low quality cheap iPhone cases that disrespect the beauty, and sleekness of your iPhone.

Even with their outrageous price point, most of these cases weren’t providing the necessary protection, and the ones that did, were too bulky, fitting uncomfortably in our pockets.

We knew there had to be a better option.

We wanted a sleek case that was minimal in design, but could provide premium protection for our devices. Something that looked, and felt great in both our hand, and our pocket, but was still rugged enough to tackle the obstacles of everyday life.

And that’s exactly what we did, we created the new Minimalist Premium iPhone case!

  

Combining the best of both worlds with an elegant design that protects both your phone, and your budget, we’d like to introduce the ZAR Minimalist iPhone Case.

It’s inevitable-- everyone is going to drop their phone eventually.

With the ZAR iPhone Case, you’re allowed peace of mind, knowing that when the day comes, you’ll be prepared.

Through various testing, and prototyping, we’ve developed a premium iPhone case at an affordable price.

 

Be one of the first to receive an iPhone 7 case in the ZAR Minimalist design.

We wanted to make the slimmest case possible, offering you an experience like no other. Now, there’s no need to sacrifice looks for protection. With the ZAR Minimalist Case, your iPhone will look amazing, feel amazing, and protect amazing.

We went with a minimal design, taking little away from your phone, while still adding a whole lot of protection.

Our case highlights the beauty and elegance of the iPhone, adding to the experience while keeping your phone safe.

We wanted a slim case that was as sleek as possible. A case that feels good in your hand, as well as in your pocket.

The smooth designs allows for a seamless transition from your pocket to your hand, while our eco-synthetic leather provides plenty of grip, keeping your phone secure.

 Easy snap on installation

When crafting the ZAR Minimalist iPhone Case, we wanted to make sure our materials would be durable enough for everyday wear, but still feel nice enough to keep on our phone everywhere we go.

We use a lightweight plastic internal frame with a soft textured synthetic lining on the inside that helps absorb impacts. The exterior of the Minimalist case uses premium, eco-synthetic leather that complies with universal stewardship standards, helping preserve wildlife.

We know you’ll absolutely love the feel of your case, anywhere you go. Aside from feeling great, our leather also provides water resistant shielding, making sure your phone stays protected, even in the rain.

 Designed with you in mind-- The ZAR Minimalist Case is for the adventurer, the professional, and the minimalist.

 Simple design doesn’t take away from the beauty and complexity of the iPhone

 Synthetic leather skin for your phone's protection

 Our case fits well with any screen protector and gives 360 degree protection for your iPhone.

 With the ZAR Minimalist Case you can rest assured that your phone is protected. With our state of the art material blend, we’re confident the ZAR case will serve your needs for many years to come, in fact we are so confident in the quality of our cases that we will offer a lifetime warranty against any manufacturing defects.

Comparison of our Minimalist case versus Apple's leather and silicone case, cases were heavily used for approximately 2-3 months in every condition imaginable. 

The Apple leather case had significant wear on the edge and had stains from being exposed to sweaty and wet hands. The Apple silicone case started to peel around the edges and had silicone chip off at the corners from being put in and out of pockets. 

Our Minimalist case on the other hand looked just as new as it did from day one. The picture below says it all!

Our wrap around design ensures that your phone is covered from all angles, leaving no spot left behind. With each corner covered, your phone will be elevated when facing downward, protecting your screen from any scratches. 

Keep your phone blemish free, and get rid of those annoying greasy fingerprints that make your phone look gross.

Our Minimalist Case doesn't stain and fingerprints comes off with a simple wipe.

All our cases come equipped with premium eco-synthetic leather that grips 30% more than standard leather cases. Never again worry about your phone slipping off a table, or through your hands.

 When we set out to create the ZAR iPhone case, we looked at many premium leather cases on the market. They all looked, and felt great, but we weren’t certain we wanted to use real animal leather for our cases.

That’s when we decided to go with our eco-synthetic leather, that acts and feels just as tough as real leather without the harming of any animals.

Not only do our cases protect your phone, but they protect the environment as well.

What good is protecting your iPhone if you can’t charge it too? For too long, we’ve had cases with charger cutouts that were too small for any off-the-shelf chargers.

 With the ZAR iPhone case, you have options. Our wide cutout bottom leaves enough room for any charger, or any pair of headphones-- something that most iPhone cases can’t offer.

Our new Minimalist Case is extremely thin and weighs a lightweight 16 grams for the iPhone 6 model.

We are offering our cases for the iPhone 6/s, 6/s PLUS, and for the iPhone 7, 7 PLUS models. 

Each case will be available in two colors: Coffee Brown and Charcoal Black.

 

Here at ZAR Designs, we believe in eliminating the middleman, and delivering a quality product for a fraction of the price. 

 We ensure that our backers get the most bang for their buck with our ridiculously low price point.

 

For the ZAR Minimalist Case, we'll be working side by side with an established manufacturer, known for their rigorous quality control. We have developed a great relationship with them, and will be in constant communication, every step of the way. 

With various stages in the manufacture, and quality control process, we're extremely confident that our partners will deliver a quality product, exceeding all expectations. 

All we need now is your help to help us reach our goal so we can start mass production and bring this amazing premium iPhone case into the market!

If you like our project please take the time to share our campaign with your friends. Together we can make this project a success!

story:
Standap is now Adappt - www.igg.me/at/adappt

Standap stands for Standard Strap and is simply an adapter for 22mm bands for the Apple Watch.

Apple Watch has some official bands, but what if you want to install your own one?

You just can't, because Apple made a proprietary plug that's absolutely incompatible with classic straps. This way they can sell their straps to the price they set.

However, that's not just a money issue. You can't customize your watch as you might want. If you want a strap that Apple doesn't like, you just can't wear that.


That's why you need Standap! Standap plugs into your Apple Watch just like any official band, but, on the other side, it features classic strap plugs, so you can install any compatible band.


Standap will come in different material, colors and sizes, to match your Watch style.

We might develop larger or smaller versions of Standap to support 24mm and 20mm bands if funds are enough!

story:
click to view our KICKSTARTER campaign


Organised and neat - By inserting one end of your cable into the slots of MaCO, you can secure the cable by rolling it into a bundle and lock it with the magnets.

Quick detach and tangle-free - MaCO is specifically designed to swiftly attach and detach. Just pull the two ends of a cable, MaCO will be released and you can use your cables right away without any tangling problems.

Small, Light, Beautiful - MaCO is small, light and also a beautiful accessories to carry with you wherever you go. You can also match MaCO to your clothes, mood or use it for color coding your cables.

Incorporate MaCO and cable into ONE - The secure locking stays tight incorporating the both cable and MaCO into one. There are no worries of losing it.

Attach cables to wall or on desk - MaCO Platform allows you attach cables with MaCO onto it, to keep cables from falling. You can stick the Platform on the desk or to the wall with provided micro-suction pads or 3M Command Damage-free double sided adhesives. Consolidating all the cables onto one platform allows you to pick the cables you need easily as opposed to finding each one on the floor. We have 2 sizes of Platform which are Mini-Platform (small) and Premium-Platform (big). 


Keep cables organised for storage - MaCO keep your cables organised and tangle-free for storage. Coming in a variety of colors, you can use it for color coding your cables.

Secure headphones on shirt - The magnets on MaCO allow you clip your headphones onto your shirt when you are walking or jogging, so that it will not swing around. MaCO also keep your headphones from falling when the earpieces come off from your ears.

Keep handsfree ready - With the use of MaCO and Mini-Platform, you can keep your handsfree at a spot in car you can get easily.   

Additional feature - Apart from cables management, MaCO offers additional feature to keep things organised. For instance, attach bills to wall (with Mini-Platform) or to fridge. 

Note: After the campaign finishes, contributors will have the option to choose color and we will also ask you which items (if any) you are ordering from the Add-on Menu.
 


Our Kickstarter campaign was successfully funded by end of August 2014. The fund has been used for the fabrication of toolings, first round of mass production, logistics, and rewards fulfillment. As we are a start-up company, we need your help to run second round of mass production, as there is a required minimum volume for manufacturing.  

With love and Thank you,

-The MaCO Team  (Elsa and Loke)

For more information about the MaCO: http://www.three1design.com/

Follow us: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram. 

We offer FREE shipping in Australia, please add the shipping fees (refer to perks detail) for shipping outside of Australia. We will be using regular shipping to dispatch your perks. Tracked or Insured shipping are extra and highly recommended and can be paid once the campaign finishes. The amount will depend on the weight, value of the reward and destination. 

Unlike other projects we don’t make this fee mandatory. This allows the project to be accessible to budget conscious backers and other countries where tracked shipping can be very expensive. It's up to the backer to decide the level of service and risk they are comfortable with. We believe this is the best method, as it gives the backers a higher degree of control over the shipping options.

We have every intention of shipping your perks during the month of June. We will do everything in our power to expedite fulfillment, and if all goes well we could be sending out the products even earlier. But such is the nature of crowdfunding projects that we cannot guarantee a ship-by date for all. Please see the Risks and challenges section below for some examples of things that could potentially delay fulfillment.

The first round of mass production has been successfully completed despite little delays as we spent time on fining tune to ensure quality products. As you can see the feedback of our backers from Kickstarter, our products are great, quality, and nice in packaging. Therefore, plus our past experience, we believe the manufacturing risk of second run is at a minimum. 

About the shipping, our past experience thought us that anything can happen to cause delays: (i.e: production delays, parts delivery, carrier delays, holidays etc.)  We will do everything to make sure your perks arrive on time. Should there be any unexpected issues or delays, we promise to keep you updated on our progress.

story:
1st Social App Against Mass Shootings, Terrorism and Other Crimes!

Vigilantes is unique as it is the first attempt to use the power of the social media like never before with the main purpose to keep us all safe and stay connected with our loved ones.

For first impression you can download the Android beta version with limited functionalities on Google Play by clicking the icon below:

Let us start with some good news: Did you know that if the world stands together as a community, we can defeat terrorism, mass shootings and other crimes?

The call for smarter ways to fight terrorism, mass shootings and other crimes has never been more important with famous world leaders encouraging the world at large to find better and innovative approaches in dealing with this menace. As Barack Obama famously said:

That is why we created Vigilantes, a social mobile application to fight terrorism, mass shootings and other crimes. In fact, Vigilantes uses the eyes and ears of every user to help you stay safe. Imagine a thousand eyes and ears watching over you. That is what Vigilantes is for.

How Vigilantes Works!

With Vigilantes you are never alone anymore. That is because you are connected to the largest community of safety conscious people on the planet. By uploading posts of events you see happening around you, you are contributing massive information, that helps others around you to stay safe in real-time.

Vigilantes, rounds up all the information shared by users of the community in real time and give you safety alert reports of your current location, even suggesting to you safer areas in your vicinity. Vigilantes also informs you in real-time of the safety of your friends, loved ones (children, husband, wife, father, mother, son, daughter, other relatives). Even Vigilantes situation awareness reports update in real-time. With our facial recognition feature Vigilantes will be able to detect criminals and notify law enforcement, of course with your permission.

The basic principle is simple: Before during or after an event occurs, a Vigilante around the event uploads a post on the map, at the same time people around the event are alerted to stay safe (see figure below).

How Terror Attacks/Mass Shootings can be Prevented with Vigilantes

Did you know? There has been so many terror attacks since the last 20 years, not leaving out  mass shootings which are gradually becoming the norm in our societies these days. In America alone, the 3 of the worst mass shootings have happened within the past 6 months. The map below shows the hot spots of terror activities from all over the world.

In the scenarios today, a terror attack or mass shooting is easily executed by the perpetrators,  and mostly only after the attack has occurred, is the law enforcement notified. But with Vigilantes the scenario completely changes in favor of the innocent people and the attacks can be prevented.

How Other Crimes can be Prevented with Vigilantes

Crime is an ever growing menace in our societies today. A smart an intelligent way is needed to tackle this growing menace. The map below shows the spots where there has been criminal activity only for the past year alone.

In the scenarios today, crimes are easily executed by the perpetrators,  and mostly only after the crime has occurred, is the law enforcement notified; But with Vigilantes the scenario completely changes in favor of the innocent victims and the crime can be prevented before it even occurs.

How Vigilantes can Assist Victims of Natural Disasters

Though Vigilantes focuses mainly on crimes, natural disasters also pose a great threat to human safety. So, Vigilantes integrates this aspect to warn users when there are events such as earthquakes or  weather storms like Hurricanes, cyclonic storms etc. The map below shows the distribution of natural disasters all over the globe.

In 2017 Hurricane Maria devastated Puerto Rico, other Caribbean islands and parts of the US, not to talk of Hurricane Katrina that devastated New Orleans and others areas. Hurricanes have been of common occurrence throughout the past years with many loss of life just because rescue teams could not locate and rescue victims in time. But with Vigilantes, victims just needs to pin their location on the map and rescue teams can get their precise location.

Why Choose Vigilantes!

Vigilantes is a social platform, so it offers the basic social media functions like Chat, Post Upload, Like, Share etc.  Vigilantes is unique because it  connects you with your friends, family and tracks what is happening around you in real-time and keeps you updated.

Uploading a post, your family and friends get notified immediately as well as the people around you. Imagine a shooter on rampage in the streets and you get notified to find shelter and stay safe!

 

Connects you to local emergency services: In case of an emergency, were someone is hurt, or people need rescue, Vigilantes connects you to the local emergency services with just a push of a button. It automatically detects your location (country, city, town) and pops up the right emergency numbers and local emergency facilities around you.

 

What Functions will Vigilantes Support?

Present functions supported:

  • Different situation awareness categories: Gives you the possibility of categorizing your posts according to the threat around you, and automatically notify users of unsafe situations.

  • Get notifications of events happening around you: When users around you upload a post about an event happening around you, you get instant notification to stay safe.
  • Stay connected, chat and get updates from friends and family
  • You can see the number of Vigilantes around you
  • You can see and access Vigilante posts on the map
  • You can follow/see you friends and family on the map
  • You can select the posts that only friends can see and what the public can see
  • You can react to posts, share and comment on them
  • You can add people to your circle of friends
  • You get access information to emergency facilities like: law enforcement, firefighters and hospitals and clinics

 

Future functions planned:

  • Emergency Room (Premium Functions): This room gives you instant access to special features for rapid response on instant alert to friend, family and law enforcement

  • Facial recognition: If you choose to use Vigilantes facial recognition, it will be able to identify and alert law enforcement should a criminal use your phone.

  • Situation awareness report: Especially useful for travelers or people in new locations unknown to them, Vigilantes will be able to give situation awareness reports of their current location with suggestions of safer areas.
  • Exact location notification to rescue teams in case of natural disasters
  • A Vigilantes website for uses with computers

Activities Planned with Funds Raised:

If we raise enough funds we plan to: expand our team to increase our efficiency; release an IOS version for Apple users;  add more functionalities to Vigilantes and much more. We also have a vision to develop extra safety gadgets connected to Vigilantes to further enhance your safety.

 

Your Pre-Order Includes

Select Your Perks

 

 

 

 

 

Other ways you can Help: Share with friends & win prizes

From now until the end of our campaign in August 2018, you can refer your friends to get additional articles for free! How it works!

3 simple rules:

  1. Copy your unique sharing referral link​​​​​​​​.
  2. Share your unique sharing referral link with your friends and ask them to join us by backing our campaign on Indiegogo. A successful referral is only counted if someone backs one of our campaign perks through your link. 
  3. Depending on the number of referral backers tracked through Indiegogo, you’ll receive FREE referral prizes!

Prize options:

For every successfully referral, you will get access to the release version of Vigilantes with access to one of the three Premium Functions of your choice for a lifetime!  For 10 or more referrals you will get  access to Vigilantes with all three Premium Functions for a lifetime.

Who can Share and How?

  • Who: To participate in sharing, you must be a backer on Indiegogo. As a backer, your unique Indiegogo ID and referral URL grants you access in participating.
  • How: Log in to Indiegogo --> visit our campaign page on Indiegogo --> on the right of the main video you will find the share tools for Indiegogo, shown below --> SHARE!!.

4 simple steps to tack your results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page and select the "My Profile" option.
  3. To see the latest number of funders and your total referred contribution amount click on the tab that says "Referrals".
  4. Your prize will be sent to you at the end of this campaign, based on the total points you've earned.

Compatible with iOS and Android

 

About Us

Vigilantes App is our first product which was borne from the search of a smarter way in solving the growing menace of terrorism, mass shootings and other crimes. The idea is simple, billions of people today already use smart phones. They also like taking pictures and videos and sharing on the social media. Then they idea came: why not build an App which uses the social media to solve this growing menace? Then the idea of an open social media platform dedicated to safety and counter-terrorism, and other crimes was borne. Vigilantes App!.

Who we are
J&A Bureau is a start-up with a strong focus on using Technology for the well being of People and Planet.
Our mission
Our mission is to contribute to the development of a sustainable world for the present as well as future generations
Our core value
In order to support our mission, we aim at  building sustainable products for People and Planet

 

Frequently Asked Questions

About Vigilantes

Vigilantes App is the first attempt to use social media like never before. Though it functions as a social media App, where you stay connected and receive updates from friends and family, it also serves as a platform to notify users to stay safe and also law enforcement in case any criminal activity is on going. Vigilantes is created as the first product of J&A Bureau, located in Germany for anyone the world over, who is interested in keeping others stay. Vigilantes works by using the collective effort of every user to prevent terrorism, mass shooting and other crimes. It can also be used in natural disaster scenarios by rescue teams to find exact locations of victims. The basic version of Vigilantes is free and gives you access to all basic social media functions. In addition to that, it offers some paid functions to enhance user safety awareness. Finally, we are crowdfunding to finance the development of the App.

Technical Specifications

Though only the Beta version of Vigilantes (with limited functionalities) is available for Android users for testing on Google Play Store,  Vigilantes in built on a hybrid platform, thus will be able to run on both IOS platforms in the near future. Vigilantes works by using the collective effort of its users to determine safe and unsafe areas and situations. The posts categorized and uploaded by users are rounded up and analyzed  by Vigilantes for appropriate safety awareness reports. The functionalities of Vigilantes undergo constant updates as we learn from user experience and feedback. We also intend to build a website which will function as a web version of Vigilantes.

Safety and Regulation

At the moment are terms and conditions specify age limits according to other social media platforms restrictions in respective countries. In the future we plan to introduce parental guidance for under age kids. We will be keeping user data secure both on their phones and in connection with our servers. We're early in design, so the specific technologies we'll be using to keep data secure are still getting decided. We also provide the possibility of other users to report posts which may have been wrongly categorized, or with wrong locations etc. These reports are then verified by our team before any action is taken on the concerned post.

Customer Service

Everybody is eligible for beta testing and the beta version with limited functionalities of the Android platform can be downloaded following this link. In the App, we also offer the possibility to send us feedback.

Credits

Many thanks to the extraordinary members of the Vigilantes App team, who have been putting in long hours to get this project ready!

To our readers and backers, we love you. Thank you.

Risk and Challenges

Developing such a complex product is very challenging, but with our dedicated team, putting in long hours we are able to solve the hurdles on the way. Each time a new idea pops up, our team seats together to examine and refine it, after which a decision is taken whether to include it or not. So far it has been an exciting journey, in developing something with a positive impact to the world. Knowing the our product will have a positive impact in the world keeps us very motivated and engaged.
story_txt:
1st Social App Against Mass Shootings, Terrorism and Other Crimes!
Vigilantes is unique as it is the first attempt to use the power of the social media like never before with the main purpose to keep us all safe and stay connected with our loved ones.
For first impression you can download the Android beta version with limited functionalities on Google Play by clicking the icon below:


Let us start with some good news: Did you know that if the world stands together as a community, we can defeat terrorism, mass shootings and other crimes?
The call for smarter ways to fight terrorism, mass shootings and other crimes has never been more important with famous world leaders encouraging the world at large to find better and innovative approaches in dealing with this menace. As Barack Obama famously said:

That is why we created Vigilantes, a social mobile application to fight terrorism, mass shootings and other crimes. In fact, Vigilantes uses the eyes and ears of every user to help you stay safe. Imagine a thousand eyes and ears watching over you. That is what Vigilantes is for.
How Vigilantes Works!

With Vigilantes you are never alone anymore. That is because you are connected to the largest community of safety conscious people on the planet. By uploading posts of events you see happening around you, you are contributing massive information, that helps others around you to stay safe in real-time.
Vigilantes, rounds up all the information shared by users of the community in real time and give you safety alert reports of your current location, even suggesting to you safer areas in your vicinity. Vigilantes also informs you in real-time of the safety of your friends, loved ones (children, husband, wife, father, mother, son, daughter, other relatives). Even Vigilantes situation awareness reports update in real-time. With our facial recognition feature Vigilantes will be able to detect criminals and notify law enforcement, of course with your permission.
The basic principle is simple: Before during or after an event occurs, a Vigilante around the event uploads a post on the map, at the same time people around the event are alerted to stay safe (see figure below).


How Terror Attacks/Mass Shootings can be Prevented with Vigilantes 

Did you know? There has been so many terror attacks since the last 20 years, not leaving out  mass shootings which are gradually becoming the norm in our societies these days. In America alone, the 3 of the worst mass shootings have happened within the past 6 months. The map below shows the hot spots of terror activities from all over the world.

In the scenarios today, a terror attack or mass shooting is easily executed by the perpetrators,  and mostly only after the attack has occurred, is the law enforcement notified. But with Vigilantes the scenario completely changes in favor of the innocent people and the attacks can be prevented.




How Other Crimes can be Prevented with Vigilantes 

Crime is an ever growing menace in our societies today. A smart an intelligent way is needed to tackle this growing menace. The map below shows the spots where there has been criminal activity only for the past year alone.


In the scenarios today, crimes are easily executed by the perpetrators,  and mostly only after the crime has occurred, is the law enforcement notified; But with Vigilantes the scenario completely changes in favor of the innocent victims and the crime can be prevented before it even occurs.




How Vigilantes can Assist Victims of Natural Disasters

Though Vigilantes focuses mainly on crimes, natural disasters also pose a great threat to human safety. So, Vigilantes integrates this aspect to warn users when there are events such as earthquakes or  weather storms like Hurricanes, cyclonic storms etc. The map below shows the distribution of natural disasters all over the globe.


In 2017 Hurricane Maria devastated Puerto Rico, other Caribbean islands and parts of the US, not to talk of Hurricane Katrina that devastated New Orleans and others areas. Hurricanes have been of common occurrence throughout the past years with many loss of life just because rescue teams could not locate and rescue victims in time. But with Vigilantes, victims just needs to pin their location on the map and rescue teams can get their precise location.




Why Choose Vigilantes!

Vigilantes is a social platform, so it offers the basic social media functions like Chat, Post Upload, Like, Share etc.  Vigilantes is unique because it  connects you with your friends, family and tracks what is happening around you in real-time and keeps you updated.

Uploading a post, your family and friends get notified immediately as well as the people around you. Imagine a shooter on rampage in the streets and you get notified to find shelter and stay safe!

 
Connects you to local emergency services: In case of an emergency, were someone is hurt, or people need rescue, Vigilantes connects you to the local emergency services with just a push of a button. It automatically detects your location (country, city, town) and pops up the right emergency numbers and local emergency facilities around you.
 What Functions will Vigilantes Support?

Different situation awareness categories: Gives you the possibility of categorizing your posts according to the threat around you, and automatically notify users of unsafe situations.



Get notifications of events happening around you: When users around you upload a post about an event happening around you, you get instant notification to stay safe.

You get access information to emergency facilities like: law enforcement, firefighters and hospitals and clinics

 
Future functions planned:
Emergency Room (Premium Functions): This room gives you instant access to special features for rapid response on instant alert to friend, family and law enforcement


Facial recognition: If you choose to use Vigilantes facial recognition, it will be able to identify and alert law enforcement should a criminal use your phone.



Situation awareness report: Especially useful for travelers or people in new locations unknown to them, Vigilantes will be able to give situation awareness reports of their current location with suggestions of safer areas.
Exact location notification to rescue teams in case of natural disasters
A Vigilantes website for uses with computers

Activities Planned with Funds Raised:

If we raise enough funds we plan to: expand our team to increase our efficiency; release an IOS version for Apple users;  add more functionalities to Vigilantes and much more. We also have a vision to develop extra safety gadgets connected to Vigilantes to further enhance your safety.
