story:
Here comes Xpot!

  • We're building a robust, cross-platform mobile app that could revolutionize how drivers find and share, public parking spaces, and help ease congestion and greenhouse gasses in our major cities! We need your help to grow and launch! We are here to disrupt a $100 billion industry that badly needs innovation. 

  • An amazing fact  is that 30% of vehicles driving on your city streets have already arrived at their destination: they're just driving around looking for a parking spot. Our parking network can reduce that by 5-6% so we spend less time looking for a parking space and reduce traffic congestion from this problem.

How does it work?

Share... Simply download the free app, verify your phone, and begin sharing your parking space location whenever you approach your car or turn the key. Xpot can work in the background, or you can easily notify nearby drivers with one tap.

Then Find. Then when you need to find the next nearby spot to park, the network shows and directs you to that location. Xpot doesn't reserve the space, so it could be taken by the time you get there.

  • Xpot could reduce the amount of time we spend looking for parking, reduce traffic congestion in your city, and reduce vehicle emission pollution in cities, by 3-5%. That's a huge win-win-win. It's simple, but powerful.
  •  The more of us who use Xpot to automatically (and anonymously) share our parking space, the better it Xpot will work when we need to find a parking spot.

 

  • Your contribution will make Xpot the coolest and simplest product possible. Xpot will save millions of hours of driving and millions of gallons of gas (and the resulting vehicle emissions) if implemented far and wide. This campaign is a way for us early adopters to join up and give Xpot the super powered launch it needs to reach that goal. 

 

  • We need to make Xpot a great mobile app from the get-go, so that's why we're running this campaign. We also need to spread the word with targeted and effective marketing, so some of the budget is set aside for that. We want to pour every dime we raise into making a world class, cross-platform mobile app and getting it into the hands of early adopters and evangelists, so it catches on like wildfire.

Contribute today and check out these awesome perks!

We've determined that we need $45K for app development to get the fantastic app we envision. Apps that deal with driving and networking need to be dead-simple and intuitive. The remaining budget will be frugally spent on scalability, legal and administration essentials, and a go-to-market strategy and ad buy. Because Xpot will work best with a certain critical mass in our target market, we need to give it a boost.

Every dollar you contribute gets us closer to the goal of making parking faster and easier, and reducing vehicle emissions and street traffic. If you live in a city or bustling town, you will probably benefit from Xpot when you need to park your car, and your city will benefit as well.

We are going to launch a beta version 'soft' launch around Christmas 2018, so it will be available in your app store early in 2019!

Other Ways You Can Help Xpot (remember: say 'spot'!)

We are super grateful for those dollars you can contribute. Here's other ways you can help make this campaign a grand slam home run:

  • Take a moment right now to share this to your social feeds, using the available Indiegogo tools! It gives us a huge boost when folks share the word!
  • Get on the email list. We want to update power users on our progress and announce the release of Xpot. Get informed when it's coming to your city! We value your privacy and won't cram your inbox. Scouts honor!
  • Tell us how we're doing. Your feedback is essential to goal of making this a reality. We welcome any and all feedback, questions, comments, and critiques.

We chose a fixed funding campaign because this is the minimum budget we need to achieve our goal of getting a product into the hands of users who will be the vanguard of a parking revolution. We only get funded if we hit our goal, so please be a backer and spread the word on social media and by word of mouth. Thank you.

the Xpot Team

story:
Introducing Sanag Powerbank

Sanag Powerbank: your all-in-one portable charger! Our powerbank is 2x faster than the competition and charges up to four devices at once, such as Google Pixel, Surface, iPhone and iPad. It includes four embedded cables and Qi wireless charging so you’re never caught unprepared.

If you rely on portable devices, you need Sanag. The most comprehensive, convenient all-in-one charger.

Stay Connected with Sanag Powerbank whether you’re:
  • Commuting to work or school
  • Traveling for a business trip
  • Meeting clients
  • Giving presentations
  • Providing power to clients or customers (great for Uber/Lyft drivers, cafes, and anyone working in customer service!)
  • Creating the next big sound, app, portrait, podcast, or video series with friends
  • And more!

Never worry about your life being disrupted by a low battery notification, thanks to Sanag’s fast, convenient, portable, all-in-one charger. 

Features

4 Embedded Cables + Wireless Charging + LED Display

Sanag Powerbank’s embedded cables makes charging all your devices easy and seamless.

Micro-USB cable (Android and Kindle) 


Lightning cable (iPhone and iPad)


Qi Wireless charging


The most comprehensive, convenient all-in-one charger

 

10,000 mAh capacity  

        

  • Charge iPhone X up to 3.6x
  • Samsung S8+ up to 3.3x
  • iPhone 7 up to 5.1x
  • Google Pixel up to 4x 
  • iPad 1.5x

Charges 60% faster than the average portable charger

With our Qualcomm Quick Charge technology, our Powerbank charges 60% faster than the average portable charger, fueling your active life. 

Compatible with over 90% of devices

Sanag Powerbank is compatible with over 90% of brands, including the Apple iPhone, iPad, or iPod, Samsung Xiaomi and Galaxy, Google Pixel, Amazon Kindle, and more.

Small enough to fit in a pocket or purse

Additionally, we know that portable means easy to transport, so we designed our Sanag Powerbank to be slim and lightweight, so it can fit seamlessly in a pocket or purse.

Meet all US and EU certifications

Sanag Powerbank meets and exceeds all US and EU relevant certifications and is recyclable.

LED Sensor and USB C Input

When the Sanag Powerbank needs to be charged, an LED sensor will light up to alert you that it’s time to power up your powerbank. The USB C input allows you to connect the device to your laptop, or any other USB charging port.

Advanced Technology Protection 

Two Color Options 

The Sanag Powerbank comes in two sleek colors to fit with every lifestyle and to provide a canvas for self-expression.

Specification 

Product Design

Sanag is a start-up based in Los Angeles with a focus on designing quality, high-performance, ergonomic, consumer electronic products that make your daily life more convenient and efficient. You have enough to worry about each day, your electronic devices shouldn’t be one of them.  

Product Timeline

The powerbank is ready to start production as soon as we reach the funding goal. We already have a manufacturer in place and have finished all preparations. Our engineering team has a proven track record of of bringing products to market for over 15 years running.

Production Ready

Rewards

Sign up for our exclusive Indiegogo and Early Bird rates, and save on your powerbank! Order includes free shipping worldwide!

The Sanag Powerbank will retail for $69 MSRP. Be one of the first 500 to purchase the powerbank at our Super Early Bird price, and get yours for only $39. 

Double your savings! Want to have multiple Sanag Powerbanks for home, the car, the office, or to share with friends and clients? Purchase two powerbanks for just $78! That’s a retail value of $138 MSRP and savings of $60!

A Powerbank You Won’t Soon Outgrow

Your Sanag Powerbank is designed to be a trusty friend for the long haul. Easily switch from Android to Apple (or vice versa); power an additional device that charges wirelessly; buy a new tablet...whatever your portable needs, Sanag Powerbank’s multiple charging options keep up with you.

Why Sanag Powerbank? 

You live a busy, connected life, and you need to rely on your devices to keep up with you. The team at Sanag knows how valuable your time is—you can’t be spending it charging your devices. We developed a powerbank that charges faster than the average competitor so that you’re always connected, even when you’re on the go.

Additionally, we know that portable means easy to transport, so we designed our Sanag Powerbank to be slim and lightweight, so it can fit seamlessly in a pocket or purse. 

Our Story 

Sanag cofounders Colton Brayden and Lucas Bennett love traveling, but they hated keeping track of all the tangled cables they had to pack for their trips.

In search of a solution, Brayden and Bennett surveyed the marketplace for a multi-use, transportable powerbank that they could easily take with them anywhere. Unable to find a product that suited all their needs, Brayden and Bennett decided to create it themselves.

After outlining the powerbank’s features and capabilities, they found a great team with experience manufacturing electronic products, who could fulfill their vision and bring the Sanag powerbank to life.

One year later, Brayden and Bennett are thrilled to introduce you to the versatile, lightweight, and quick-charging Sanag powerbank. The only device you need to power you through whatever the day brings!

Risks and Challenges

As with all projects, unforeseen manufacturing or shipping problems are a possibility. We believe we have taken all reasonable steps to prevent such issues, and believe that we will be able to deliver a high quality, fast charging, and reliable product. We are thankful that you're on this journey with us!
story_txt:
Introducing Sanag PowerbankSanag Powerbank: your all-in-one portable charger! Our powerbank is 2x faster than the competition and charges up to four devices at once, such as Google Pixel, Surface, iPhone and iPad. It includes four embedded cables and Qi wireless charging so you’re never caught unprepared.If you rely on portable devices, you need Sanag. The most comprehensive, convenient all-in-one charger.Stay Connected with Sanag Powerbank whether you’re:
Commuting to work or school
Traveling for a business trip
Meeting clients
Giving presentations
Providing power to clients or customers (great for Uber/Lyft drivers, cafes, and anyone working in customer service!)
Creating the next big sound, app, portrait, podcast, or video series with friends
And more!
Never worry about your life being disrupted by a low battery notification, thanks to Sanag’s fast, convenient, portable, all-in-one charger. Features4 Embedded Cables + Wireless Charging + LED DisplaySanag Powerbank’s embedded cables makes charging all your devices easy and seamless.Micro-USB cable (Android and Kindle) 

Lightning cable (iPhone and iPad)
Qi Wireless chargingThe most comprehensive, convenient all-in-one charger

 
10,000 mAh capacity  
        
Charge iPhone X up to 3.6x
Samsung S8+ up to 3.3x
iPhone 7 up to 5.1x
Google Pixel up to 4x 
iPad 1.5x
Charges 60% faster than the average portable chargerWith our Qualcomm Quick Charge technology, our Powerbank charges 60% faster than the average portable charger, fueling your active life. Compatible with over 90% of devicesSanag Powerbank is compatible with over 90% of brands, including the Apple iPhone, iPad, or iPod, Samsung Xiaomi and Galaxy, Google Pixel, Amazon Kindle, and more.Small enough to fit in a pocket or purseAdditionally, we know that portable means easy to transport, so we designed our Sanag Powerbank to be slim and lightweight, so it can fit seamlessly in a pocket or purse.Meet all US and EU certificationsSanag Powerbank meets and exceeds all US and EU relevant certifications and is recyclable.LED Sensor and USB C InputWhen the Sanag Powerbank needs to be charged, an LED sensor will light up to alert you that it’s time to power up your powerbank. The USB C input allows you to connect the device to your laptop, or any other USB charging port.Advanced Technology Protection Two Color Options The Sanag Powerbank comes in two sleek colors to fit with every lifestyle and to provide a canvas for self-expression.Specification Product DesignSanag is a start-up based in Los Angeles with a focus on designing quality, high-performance, ergonomic, consumer electronic products that make your daily life more convenient and efficient. You have enough to worry about each day, your electronic devices shouldn’t be one of them.  Product TimelineThe powerbank is ready to start production as soon as we reach the funding goal. We already have a manufacturer in place and have finished all preparations. Our engineering team has a proven track record of of bringing products to market for over 15 years running.Production ReadyRewardsSign up for our exclusive Indiegogo and Early Bird rates, and save on your powerbank! Order includes free shipping worldwide!The Sanag Powerbank will retail for $69 MSRP. Be one of the first 500 to purchase the powerbank at our Super Early Bird price, and get yours for only $39. Double your savings! Want to have multiple Sanag Powerbanks for home, the car, the office, or to share with friends and clients? Purchase two powerbanks for just $78! That’s a retail value of $138 MSRP and savings of $60!A Powerbank You Won’t Soon OutgrowYour Sanag Powerbank is designed to be a trusty friend for the long haul. Easily switch from Android to Apple (or vice versa); power an additional device that charges wirelessly; buy a new tablet...whatever your portable needs, Sanag Powerbank’s multiple charging options keep up with you.Why Sanag Powerbank? You live a busy, connected life, and you need to rely on your devices to keep up with you. The team at Sanag knows how valuable your time is—you can’t be spending it charging your devices. We developed a powerbank that charges faster than the average competitor so that you’re always connected, even when you’re on the go.Additionally, we know that portable means easy to transport, so we designed our Sanag Powerbank to be slim and lightweight, so it can fit seamlessly in a pocket or purse. Our Story Sanag cofounders Colton Brayden and Lucas Bennett love traveling, but they hated keeping track of all the tangled cables they had to pack for their trips.In search of a solution, Brayden and Bennett surveyed the marketplace for a multi-use, transportable powerbank that they could easily take with them anywhere. Unable to find a product that suited all their needs, Brayden and Bennett decided to create it themselves.After outlining the powerbank’s features and capabilities, they found a great team with experience manufacturing electronic products, who could fulfill their vision and bring the Sanag powerbank to life.One year later, Brayden and Bennett are thrilled to introduce you to the versatile, lightweight, and quick-charging Sanag powerbank. The only device you need to power you through whatever the day brings!Risks and ChallengesAs with all projects, unforeseen manufacturing or shipping problems are a possibility. We believe we have taken all reasonable steps to prevent such issues, and believe that we will be able to deliver a high quality, fast charging, and reliable product. We are thankful that you're on this journey with us!

story:
Today we live at the time of era smartphones, where technology is developing rapidly. Almost everyone of us has a smartphone. At first glance, the smartphone looks like a universal thing. However, it has flaws... We need to fix these flaws, isn't?

For example, you came to an uninhabited island. What do you need to do to stay alive? Fire. The fire is a source of light that protects from cold and from predators as well as it's important for cooking and turning salt water into fresh.

So, fire is important but it's impossible to have it with you all the time but the smartphone is possible. We want to introduce you a small electric cigarette lighter, that fits into your smartphone.

You will not even notice her presence. Because it will be located in the handle of the holder, and it is necessary for smartphones with have large displays. With this holder, you will not worry about the accidental fall out the smartphone from the hands. In addition, it allows you to use your smartphone with one hand — your finger can reach the top of the device without the aid of a second hand, which allows you to use your smartphone conveniently. 

Another advantage is that the holder's handle serves at the same time as a backrest so that the smartphone can stand freely on the table while watching the video.

and there is also a car mount

story:
The wait is over. It's here.

The highly anticipated campaign is finally here and ready to kick-off! We're super excited and equally proud of the work everyone has put in to make this happen. We're now officially ready, set, GO! to bring this beauty out to all of you.

iOS App: Ready!

https://apps.apple.com/co/app/datacar/id1461708331

Android App: Work in Progress...

We believe that the pleasure of driving should not depend on whether you have a standard car or a sports supercar, in DataCar™ we are gamifying the driving experience to make it more efficient, safe and fun from any car.

ALL MOTORSPORT ASSISTS RIGHT FROM YOUR PHONE:

  • Real-time performance information
  • Intelligent gear shift indicator
  • Current gear
  • Speed
  • Temperatures
  • G forces

Feel like you are in a race car, you will not want to get off your car

Img: McLaren Senna

 

 

You are driving and suddenly you see that you have 1/4 of gas, it is time to enter saving mode: activate the ECO MODE function and your display becomes an intelligent computer whose main function is to make you save gasoline.

Let the action begin

In real time, you will see visual and auditory alerts that you will have to follow to reach your savings goals. These alerts are your co-pilot who will tell you what to do; follow the instructions and you will get positive points, the higher the score, the greater the savings in real life.

Gamifying the driving experience means playing a video game with the most advanced video game console of all: your car.

 

We don't mean a virtual car, you´ll race from your own car! Let's be honest, street racing is fun, but also illegal and dangerous. With DataCar™ you'll have all the adrenaline, fun and passion of street racing in a safe way.

Feel the adrenaline in every race

Go to a safe place and do a drag race, then you can race against anyone without being in the car.

Every race has been recorded from real cars and real people, compare and bet against your friends or similar cars. Compare performance or just bet for fun. Run as many races as you wish, compete with as many racers as you'd like. It's legal and won´t wear out your car!

 

Embark the efficiency of a true dyno inside your car!

Measure your real engine power and torque within a 2% margin by performing a simple acceleration with your car!

Make sure your tunings are effective using a completely objective and independent way, without any excessive expense!

Is your Check Engine Light on? Just open the app to see what's wrong and save yourself a trip to the mechanic for minor issues.
You can share the information with your trusted mechanic if you wish.

 

 

Lastly, we want to invite you to Join in our Referral Program:

【Share to Win!】

After your contribution to DataCar, with more Friends you bring, you will get more Rewards:

How to join the Referral Program?

  1. Log in your Indiegogo Account.
  2. Go to our Campaign Page.
  3. Share your personal Indiegogo Link to your friends.

    4. Your friend successfully pre-order DataCar on Indiegogo.

    5. You will receive the referrals in your account.


How to check your Referrals?

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account
  2. Select the “My Profile” option
  3. Click the tab “Referrals”
  4. Count the number of backers you’ve accumulated


After the completion of our campaign, we will count your referral number and ship out the corresponding reward with your perk (We can track the referrals in our dashboard, every conversion count!). So, come and share it with all your friends! Get it for free!

 

*Our Referral Tips:

1, Share your pixel link to the place that more people can see, like Facebook, Twitter, Emails, Blogs, Groups, forums and so on. The more you share, the greater the chance you can win!

2, Share with more interesting topics, like: “Check out this Gamified Driving Experience I ordered on Indiegogo” or “It's time to turn your car into a videogame!”

3, Share on some good forums, like some cars forum, gadget forum, tech forum, etc.

4, ...Spread the 'Gamified Driving Experience' across the World!

 

Thanks for all your Support!

 

Meet the makers

This is the story of a great friendship! we met in an entrepreneurship workshop, and we started discussing the idea. Our goal was to create an awesome driving experience. We got so excited about it so much that we started to work on it from the very next day!
Not everything ran as smooth as planned, what we thought we could accomplish in a few months turned out to take a couple of years.
But finally, after hard work and dedication, we have come up with a product that we are very proud of, and we love to use it! With the help of several beta testers, we make sure that anyone who loves to drive and play video games will love this product.

George and Andrew

DataCar Team

Cómo Adquirirlo?

  1. Selecciona tu producto en la columna derecha desde tu PC o clicando en el botón “Select Perk” desde tu dispositivo móvil.
  2. Haz clic en “GET THIS PERK”
  3. Puedes realizar la compra como invitado o te puedes registrar hacienda clic en “ Log In” *
  4. Completa tu dirección de envío y los datos de pago.
  5. Clica en “Submit Payment” para finalizar la orden.

*Recomendado para acceder al programa de referidos, comparte el link y recibe DataCar gratis.

 

La espera se acabó. Ya esta aquí!

Esta campaña tan anticipada finalmente esta aquí lista para despegar! Estamos super emocionados e igualmente orgullosos por el trabajo que todos han hecho para hacer esto realidad. Ahora estamos oficialmente listos, en sus marcas, FUERA! para llevarles este hermoso proyecto a todos ustedes.

 

Creemos que el placer de conducir no depende de si tenemos un carro normal o un superdeportivo, en DataCar™ estamos gamificando la conducción para hacerla más eficiente, segura y divertida para cualquier carro.

TODAS LAS AYUDAS DEL DEPORTE MOTOR PARA TU CARRO:

  • Potencia utilizada y disponible en tiempo real
  • Indicador inteligente de cambio de marchas
  • Marcha actual
  • Velocidad
  • Temperaturas
  • Fuerzas G

Te sentirás como en un carro de carreras, no te querrás bajar!

Img: McLaren Senna

 

 

Estás conduciendo cuando te das cuenta que te estás quedando sin gasolina, es momento de entrar en el modo ECO. Tu display se convierte en un computador inteligente cuya función principal es hacerte ahorrar gasolina.

 

Que comience el juego

En tiempo real recibes alertas visuales y auditivas que tendrás que seguir para conseguir tu objetivo de ahorro. Estas alertas son tu co-piloto que te indica lo que debes hacer; Sigue sus instrucciones y ganarás puntos, entre más puntos acumules mayor será el ahorro en la vida real.

Gamificar la conducción significa jugar un videojuego con la consola de videojuegos más realista de todas: tu carro.​

 

 

 
No es un vehículo virtual, correrás desde tu propio automóvil! Seamos honestos, los piques callejeros son divertidos, pero también son ilegales y peligrosos. Con DataCar™ sentirás toda la adrenalina, diversión y pasión de las carreras callejeras de una manera segura.

Siente la adrenalina en cada carrera

Primero haces una carrera en un lugar seguro, después correrás contra muchos otros pilotos sin necesidad de estar en el carro.

Cada carrera ha sido grabada con datos de personas reales en carros reales, corre y apuesta contra tus amigos o personas en carros similares. Compara resultados o tan sólo por diversión. Corre tantas carreras como lo desees, compite con tantos pilotos como tú quieras. Es legal y no desgasta tu auto!

 

Disfruta la eficiencia de un verdadero dinamómetro dentro de tu auto!

Mide la potencia y el torque de tu motor dentro de un margen del 2% realizando una simple aceleración con tu automóvil!

Asegúrate de que tus afinaciones sean efectivas utilizando una forma completamente objetiva e independiente, sin ningún gasto excesivo!

 

Se te encendió la luz de "Check Engine"? Simplemente abre la aplicación entra en Diagnose para ver qué está mal y ahórrate un viaje al mecánico por problemas menores.
Si lo deseas podrás compartir la información con tu mecánico de confianza.

 

Finalmente, queremos presentarte nuetro Programa de Referidos:

【Comparte para Ganar!】

 

Despues de contribuir con DataCar, entre más amigos traigas, más recompensas obtendrás.

Cómo unirte al programa de referidos?

  1. Loguéate en tu cuenta de Indiegogo.
  2. Dirígete a la página de nuestra campaña.
  3. Comparte tu link personal de Indiegogo con tus amigos.

   4. Your friend successfully pre-order DataCar on Indiegogo.

   5. You will receive the referrals in your account.

 

Cómo comprobar tus referidos?

  1. Loguéate en tu cuenta de Indiegogo
  2. Selecciona la opción “My Profile”
  3. Clica la pestaña “Referrals”
  4. Cuenta el número de referidos que ahs acumulado

Una vez finalizada la campaña, contaremos el número de tus referidos y te enviaremos el número correspondiente de unidades (Podremos monitorieas los referidos en nuestro tablero, cada converisón cuenta!). Así que, adelante empieza a compartirlo con tus amigos y obten el tuyo GRATIS!

 

*Concejos para referir:

1, Comparte tu link único en el lugar donde más gente lo pueda ver, como Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Email, Blogs, Grupos de whatsapp, foros, etc. Entre más lo compartas, más posibilidades tendrás de ganar!

2, Comparte con un texto interesante como: “Mira este juguete para gamificar la conducción que ordené en Indiegogo” or “Convierte tu auto en un videojuego!”

3, Comparte en lugares especializados de tu nicho, foros de autos, de tecnología, etc.

4, ... Ayuda a propagar la 'Experiencia de Conducción Gamificada' por todo el Mundo! Recuerda que entre mas usuarios, será más divertido utilizarla!

Gracias por tu apoyo!

 

Conoce a los creadores

Esta es la historia de una gran amistad! Nos conocimos en un seminario de emprendimiento, y desde ahí comenzamos a discutor la idea. Nuestro objetivo era crear una experiencia de conducción única. Nos entusiasmamos tanto con la idea, que empezamos a trabajar a partir del día siguiente!

No todo fue tan fácil como lo imaginamos, lo que pensamos que íbamos a poder terminar en unos cuantos meses, resultó tomar un par de años.
Pero finalmente, despues de mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio, hemos creado un producto del que estamos muy orgullosos, y nos encanta usarlo! Con la ayuda de varios beta testers, nos aseguramos de que a cualquier persona que le guste conducir y jugar videojuegos ame este producto.

 

Jorge y Andrés

Equipo DataCar

Nos entusiasmamos tanto con la idea, que empezamos a trabajar a partir del día siguiente!No todo fue tan fácil como lo imaginamos, lo que pensamos que íbamos a poder terminar en unos cuantos meses, resultó tomar un par de años.Pero finalmente, despues de mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio, hemos creado un producto del que estamos muy orgullosos, y nos encanta usarlo! Con la ayuda de varios beta testers, nos aseguramos de que a cualquier persona que le guste conducir y jugar videojuegos ame este producto. Jorge y AndrésEquipo DataCar

story:
It's Time to LAWYERUP!

In noncapital cases involving lesser offenses, prosecutors and judges sometimes force defendants to plead guilty before receiving counsel to move them through the system. In addition, the American Bar Association noted the justice system lacks the basic accountability and oversight needed to ensure decent legal representation or correct these problems.

  • LawyerUp is an app created to connect those in need of legal representation with highly-qualified lawyers.

​In light of the recent protests surging across America and throughout the world, lawyers have taken to social media in hopes to provide aid activists that may benefit from pro bono legal services.

  • PRO - Lawyers and entire law firms are rallying against institutionalized racism and social injustices. 
  • CON - Social sharing creates unorganized mayhem and lawyers are being contacted by those in states they are not licensed to practice in. 

LawyerUp ensures that you can easily access someone within your state and that understands YOUR COMMUNITY. 

Visit www.LawyerUp.app

What You Get

Free Access - Access to the directory is completely FREE to all users seeking legal representation. You will never pay to get access to our listings.

  • Search Locally - Locate practicing attorneys that live and work within your community or expand your search nationally.
  • Compare Listings - Review each lawyer's profile to compare qualifications for your legal needs. Check their specialties, years of experience, and get to know them before connecting.
  • Quick and Easy - Narrow your results by filtering through specialties, rating, distance, and cost of services. Instantly call or book an appointment without leaving the app.
  • Pro Bono Services - View filtered lists of attorney's across the United States that are offering free representation to those currently protesting racism and police brutality regarding the deaths of unarmed African Americans.

  • In-App Video Chat  (BONUS GOAL) - Live video chat with your attorney.

  • Push Notifications (BONUS GOAL) - Get alerted when new professionals register in your area, legal tips, and more!

 

$5K+ Raised -------- 8-10 WEEKS TO LAUNCH APP

$8.5K+ Raised ------ 6 WEEKS TO LAUNCH APP < OR LESS

$50K+ Raised ---- UNLOCK IN-APP LIVE VIDEO CHAT FEATURE

Should we exceed our maximum goal of $50,000, we will donate proceeds to the National Bail Fund Network to assist those arrested while protesting during these times.

When you back this project, you will be helping us with:

  • Team of Professional App Developers
  • Managing Tech Accounts
  • Marketing & Advertising

The Impact

LawyerUP App works to combat negative experiences and perceptions of the U.S. legal system and connect capable lawyers with people in need. 

  • Negative experiences coupled with negative perceptions of the United States criminal justice system, whether through dramatic shows like Law and Order or around-the-clock coverage of real-life criminal trials, means that seeking formal legal help is off the table for many minorities. - Duke University School of Law
  • Court appointed attorneys are often disconnected from their clients, overwhelmed with other cases, and may not always have their clients' best interests. 
  • Majority of minorities are unrepresented or have difficulties accessing legal representation.
  • Protestors are often being wrongfully arrested or victims of police violence. It's important for activists/protestors to have access to a lawyer BEFORE finding themselves in need of representation.
  • African-Americans represent 5% of licensed attorneys in the United States. LawyerUp aims to connect them with minority groups and people with their own communities that are in need of legal representation.

Risks & Challenges

Most of the risks and challenges have already been overcome in the process of creating the prototype and completing Stage 1 of concept creation.

Special features such as geofencing, Google Maps integration, and Live Videochat require higher funding to integrate into the app via software coding by professional app developers.​

COVID-19 has the potential to cause delays or changes in the delivery of the physical rewards and also the development lead-time of the app. But hopefully, the main challenge from this point on will be to make the user interface as smooth and intuitive as possible, and to "dial it in," so it works flawlessly. 

Join the Movement

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise! Please Like & Share!
  • Reach out to lawyers in your community and ask them to register.
  • If you are a black-owned business and would like to donate products to place into our LawyerUp Donor Giftbox, contact our team at info@lawyerup.app

story:
What is Knowtify?

Home Known is a company dedicated to enhancing your knowledge of the functionality of your home.  

Knowtify is a smart outlet with brains.  It monitors the energy consumed by a connected device and alerts you when important conditions are met.  One Knowtify can independently monitor the energy consumed by two separate devices in one outlet jack.  So not only will you be able to monitor energy usage in your home – you have no loss of outlet space.

While consumption data is great, Knowtify provides you with actionable information.

- Plug Knowtify into your garage door opener and the app can tell you if the door is open or closed.  No need to buy a new garage door opener, this is an affordable add-on.

- Add Knowtify to your washer and dryer, and you will get a notification on your phone when each cycle completes.

- Plug Knowtify into your entertainment center, and you can tell if your teenager is still awake and watching TV.  If so, you can turn the TV off using Knowtify's app.

- Couple Knowtify to your sump pump and you can quickly verify the last time it discharged.

- Use Knowtify with a floor lamp to automatically turn the lamp on or off when you get home at night, or leave in the morning.  

- Add Knowtify to an iron or curling iron so you will get an alert if the device has been on for too long.  Knowtify will also let you verify that you turned these devices off.  


How Does it Work?

At Home Known, we aim to make data-driven products easy and enjoyable to use. From our products to our apps and websites – ease of use is our main priority. 

Plug Knowtify into any 110 VAC outlet, then plug your device into Knowtify. From there, setup is simple:

  • Download our app.
  • Put the Knowtify's serial number into the app.
  • Tell the app which WiFi network you want to use and enter the password.
  • Load the appliance type and the types of alerts you want.
  • The app configures Knowtify for your network, and you are all set.

When the preset conditions are met, Knowtify sends a notification to your smartphone.  You can open the app at any time for an instant update of which devices are consuming energy, and historical data for each of your Knowtify connected devices.


The App

The Knowtify App Notification


Timeline

Our team already has many of the features and functionalities in place. A beta website and app have been programmed and are in the midst of full design. We have hardware for an electrical prototype and a head start on the software. It has been a very exciting and full throttle effort. We anticipate shipping Knowtify to our first adopters in January of 2016, and the remaining devices by March of 2016.  

Funding of this project will keep our current timeline at full speed. With your help, we can speed up the sourcing of materials, electrical compliance testing, safety testing, and manufacturing. It will also get this exciting product to you quicker.  In order to keep you updated, a monthly e-newsletter will be sent to all backers showing video updates as well as screen captures of the Knowtify and app in progress.

We are so excited to show you the Knowtify, and appreciate your contribution to Home Known. We hope you’ll enjoy your Knowtify as much as we do.



For more information, email us at info@yourhomeknown.com

Disclaimer

Note, to use PayPal to handle the payment process, we are required to make the following disclaimer: "Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."
